title: Shop Samsung
description:
The Best Way to Shop Samsung
* See how a TV or Appliance looks in your home using your phone's camera with our Augmented Reality experience.**
* Discover Samsung's latest offerings in mobile phones, accessories, televisions, home theater, smartwatches, home appliances, notebooks, Chromebooks, tablets, smart home and more.
* Find the product for you with tailored recommendations.
* Get exclusive offers ONLY available on the app.
* Checkout is quick and easy with flexible payment options, including Samsung Pay** and Samsung Financing.***
* Earn Samsung Rewards points with purchase of select Samsung products.
* Track your order with notification updates.  When it arrives, register your new product right from the app.
* Free shipping and easy online returns.

Pay over Time with Samsung Financing*** 
How It works: 
1) Fill your cart: add at least $250 worth of Samsung products to your cart and select "Pay Over Time" at checkout.
2) Review your plan: Apply for credit, find out if you've been approved in seconds, then simply check out. If approved, you'll pay $0 at purchase.
3) Pay over time: Receive monthly billing statements with plan details and due dates for your low monthly payments.
4) Keep using it: Samsung Financing is a revolving credit line, so you can apply once and keep using it on any future Samsung.com purchases.

Get Rewarded with Samsung Rewards 
How It works:
1) Enroll - Log in to your Samsung account and accept the Samsung Rewards terms & conditions. 
2) Earn - After making a purchase, check your Samsung Rewards point balance on Menu > My Rewards screen, 15 days after your product delivery.
3) Redeem - Go to Menu > My Rewards and redeem your points in the Samsung Rewards catalog, accessed through Samsung Pay app (on Samsung devices) or SamsungRewards.com.

Learn more about Samsung's latest products:
* The Galaxy S10, Galaxy Note9, and Galaxy S9 smartphones -- discover a world without limits.
* The new Galaxy Watch -- everything you need on your wrist and you can leave your phone behind.
* The latest QLED TVs featuring exclusive Quantum Dot Technology that turn light into perfect color, achieving 100% color volume. That means color doesn't fade, even in the brightest scenes.
* The Frame TV -- the most beautiful TV you've never seen.
* Make your kitchen the center of your home. With the Family Hub, you can shop for food, organize your family's schedules and even entertain - all right from your fridge.
* Meet the all-new Chef Collection: refrigerators, ranges, ovens, cooktops, hoods and dishwashers - The perfect blend of chef-inspired design, innovative technology and ultimate flexibility-thoughtfully crafted for your kitchen.
* Gear IconX earbuds let you enjoy the freedom of wireless.
* The POWERbot robotic vacuum -- Powerful long-lasting suction provides optimal cleaning, while smart technology allows you to control your POWERbot from your smartphone.
* SmartThings -- the easiest way to turn your home into a smart home.
* Innovative Samsung accessories such as the DeX Pad and DeX Station, Fast Charging Stand, LED Wallet Cover, Gear VR, Gear 360, and more.

Start Shopping!
Learn more: 
http://www.samsung.com/us/explore/shop-samsung-app/

* Limited time offer. Subject to availability. Open the app for details, and to see devices eligible for trade-in.
** Compatible devices only.  Samsung Pay is available with select cards from participating banks on Samsung devices.
*** Subject to credit approval. Terms apply. Open the app for details.

developerAddress:
645 Clyde Avenue
Mountain View, Ca 94043
recentChanges: Stability/Bug Fixes
comments: This app now always displays horizontally on my screen and will not rotate to display vertically. I have a note 4 and it is annoying I have to hold my phone horizontally when using this app. I don't have this issue with any other app. Deleting the app cache and stopping the app and rebooting phone did not fix this.

Real PIMA 90 percent of the time. Seldom works correctly and loads slow. Support is absolutely terrible. Use Amazon, Best Buy or a carrier store unless you ABSOLUTELY have to use this app for something like a promo redemption. I just used it for my $200 credit from pre-ordering the S20 Ultra. Took 8 days to complete, and even with $200 worth of free stuff, it was barely worth the time, effort and trouble!

Every time I try to pick a specific item by pressing "get started" for more details, I just get a blank screen. This is kind of useless. Your app is still terrible. Every time I try to look at anything beyond the main page I still just get a white screen. I did email and no one ever responded.

I paid for the Samsung upgrade program when I purchased my S10+. However, I was not able to use it to upgrade to the S20. I paid the same price that was offered to all other pre-orders. Samsung customer service rep said it does not apply ??? Another misrepresentation (a big word for a lie) by Samsung USA.

Horrible. Live chat with 3 different agents & still can't preorder Samsung Galaxy 20!+. I followed the directions from the agent which I cleared my cookies & cache then restarted my phone. Didnt work. Used 3 other browsers. It wouldn't login to my Verizon account. Originally it stated I get $180 - trade in & $185 Samsung Credit. Now it's $180 for the trade & $150 Samsung Credit. Used Firefox browser went through the order process & click for Verizon financing and it sent me to Affirm. No good

title: Shop Titans: Epic Idle Crafter, Build & Trade RPG
description:
YOU are the new craftsman in town. Help the heroes in epic battles against fearsome monsters that lurk in the dungeons. Personalize and design your store, build epic armor, swords and gear for the heroes to defend your village. Team up with blacksmiths, tailors, priestesses, carpenters and herbalists to make your business prosper. Trade, sell or auction your products to the highest bidders from other shops. Sell your goods to warriors and even add a surcharge!

Show off your medieval style by customizing your avatar. Choose from different types of clothing, hairstyles, eye color and more to make your avatar unique. Once you’re ready, the adventure begins! Follow the Elder, Owen, in the tutorial of this RPG simulation game, and learn how to build and manage your store to become the kingdom’s greatest tycoon!

Now it’s time to build up your very own store.

First, you’ll dust off the accounting table. How are you going to become a successful business mogul if you can’t keep your accounts? This is the most important part of every store. You must be ready to take orders from the champions and heroes! 
Next, you’ll learn how to craft epic gear to outfit the heroes and champions to get them ready for battle. You’ll design the layout of your store for optimal shopping, customizing it to attract as many customers as possible. Ensure that you manage your store well to become the top shopkeeper in this fantasy kingdom and build your fortune! Make offers, discount, and trade for new gear to equip heroes for battle.  Become a medieval kingdom Tycoon and embark on adventure to hidden lands!

In this fantasy adventure you can:
• BECOME a master shopkeeper!
• CREATE and CUSTOMIZE your own fantasy shop ... in 3D!
• TEAM UP with your friends and build a prosperous town!
• RECRUIT and customize your own heroes, each with their own skills and equipment!
• TRADE with players from all over the world!
• BATTLE bosses and CONQUER mysterious dungeons to acquire rare loot!

Shop Titans is a simulation RPG game that consists of building your own shop within a fantasy kingdom. In it, you can craft and sell armor, swords, potions and all kinds of gear and equipment to heroes to help them in their adventures. With the money from the sales you can expand and customize your shop to become a business mogul in the village. Heroes of all kinds can enter your store: warriors, wizards, dwarves... even ninjas! Help your heroes and champions in legendary battles against the most powerful bosses!
The quest mode of Shop Titans is similar to other famous RPG and simulation style games. You will recruit a team of heroes who will battle against ogres, orcs and other creatures in epic combat. Use sword or magic to defeat them and receive gold coins to spend in your store. In addition, these quest rewards will give you materials to help create new weapons and gear, enabling you to access increasingly difficult duels.

Build up your store as fast as possible to support the heroes who will protect and defend your village. Get rich by selling items you craft in your store, building a crafting empire! For each epic war a hero fights successfully, you will receive rewards for equipping them with weapons and armor. Open a chest to discover what new items you have available to build new swords, shields,  armor and more!

Install Shop Titans for free NOW to design, craft, build and quest your way to the top as an epic mogul in this fantasy simulation RPG game!

Note: Shop Titans is a free game which allows purchases with real money within the app.

TERMS OF SERVICE:
Please read this Terms of Service Agreement and our Privacy Notice before using our services as they govern the relationship between you and Kabam.

www.kabam.com/terms-of-service/
www.kabam.com/privacy-notice/

developerAddress: 1118 Alberni Street, Suite 200, Vancouver, v6e1a5, Canada
recentChanges:
Tier 9 content
New blueprints, quests, and more!

Streamlined Questing
A new quest flow to enable faster questing with less loading times.

Flashback Offers
A new opportunity to snag premium offers you may have missed!

Read more here: https://playshoptitans.com/news/version-3-4-0-release-notes/
comments: I found the game very addictive. It has nice graphics, the game flow is pretty fast. Beside its component of crafting and selling, one also participates in adventure of his or hers heroes. The game also has some in-game lottery, various random events that in the way helps a player to accomplish goals. The difficulty levels might get stuck without options to change back or make harder. If you restart a game, it may fix the issue, but not always.

Writing this again since the last review was removed. I down voted this because of the paywall you hit. It is $50 in order to craft wands and guns. Seriously... $50??? I don't mind putting 5-10 here and there into a game I am playing but that is ridiculous. Not to mention the cost of champions every few levels that would take months to grind for if you don't purchase. Otherwise, it's a good time killer. It is NOT worth the cost of a triple A published title game though. Extremely off-putting.

My biggest issue is when I craft some items or go on a mission, then I come back to it, nothing was crafting and the mission I set up never got set up. It's been happening a lot over the last couple days. **EDIT**It looks like there might be a fix, I'll check it out and after a couple days I'll re-edit this review.

I am really enjoying this game. It is fun, engaging, and there is always something to do. I like how you can customize almost everything and tailor the look of your shop to your own desires. I also enjoy how it seems you can do everything without selling out large amounts of money. However, I do wish there was a way to maybe close your store so you could have a moment to restock and organize your shelves without being pestered or losing customers.

The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because of the fast track system. It still costs 10 diamonds even if there's only 2 minutes remaining, but at 11 minutes it costs 11 diamonds. I think that should be corrected. Also it'd be nice to see more graphics during the quest. Some fire balls or earth shards, Other than that, superb game. The quest system, the hero abilities, everything really is fantastic. It's the only game I've actually kept for months at a time. The p2p prices are great.

title: Wish - Shopping Made Fun
description:
Style doesn’t have to be expensive.
Wish is a mobile shopping app that lets you shop over 100 million high-quality items at 60-90% off!

HOW IS WISH SO AFFORDABLE?
Wish connects shoppers directly to over 100 million manufacturers, so shoppers can find affordable goods. There’s no middle man, so prices are lower and the quality is the same as what you’d get at the mall.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE
We take your security seriously and process your purchases securely.

JOIN 500+ MILLION USERS
Over 500+ million people use Wish to shop affordable goods. So skip the shopping mall and find lower prices on Wish.

REVIEWS, VIDEOS & PHOTOS
Read through customer reviews, view photos, and watch videos of their purchases to find the best deals. 

TRACKING
Track your purchases.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have questions about your order, reach our customer service easily through the app. Our customer service responds quickly.

30-DAY RETURN POLICY
Plus, if it’s not perfect, we have a 30-day return policy.

SAVE ON BRANDS
We now offer brands at affordable prices on Wish Outlet. Find discounted Apple, Samsonite, Burberry, Coach, Michael Kors, Ray Ban, Fossil, Guess, Tommy Hilfiger, Champion, Sperry and more!

5-7 DAY SHIPPING
Get faster shipping with Wish Express! Items with the Wish Express truck icon arrive at your door in 5-7 days.

SAVE BIGGER
Spin Blitz Buy to win more savings. When you spin Blitz Buy, you win access to extra discounts.

EARN REWARDS
Collect points with each purchase and redeem them for reward coupons.

60-90% OFF THESE CATEGORIES
Find discounts on trendy fashion, shoes, gadgets, kitchen tools, home goods, kids items, beauty, jewelry, watches, accessories, and more.

SKIP THE MALL, SHOP ON YOUR PHONE FOR....
Trendy womens fashion: dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, sweaters, athleisure, swimwear, lingerie...

Quality mens fashion: jackets, sweaters, jeans, shirts, button-up tops, workout wear, underwear...

Accessories: hats, socks, scarves, belts, jewelry, watches, gym bags, travel bags, purses, backpacks...

Electronics: fitness trackers, cameras, drones, phone cases, battery packs, headphones, gadgets...

Beauty: brushes, skincare, perfume, lipstick, eyeshadow, foundation...

Shoes: sneakers, running shoes, boots, sandals, heels...

Home Goods: kitchen tools, cookware, knives, trendy home decor, lights, sheets, furniture...

Kids: clothes, toys, school supplies, baby gear...

Sports: exercise gear, weights, soccer, basketball, mens workout clothes, women’s athleisure...

Auto: organizers, cleaners, phone chargers...

WISH and the W logo are trademarks of ContextLogic Inc., registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and in other countries. All rights reserved.

summary: 🔥 Your endless supply of sales, promos & crazy-low prices. 💸
comments: I found and purchased several Items that I can use at fabulous prices. At first I thought that they only carried things I would never use, but I found they have things for everyone. Try hitting the find icon and you will be amazed. Their selection is vast. I found things I need right away and placed an order. Then I searched and found hundreds of things that I want, so after I pay my Bill's I can't wait to come back for more.

Good, just frustrating and time waster at times.You think that you bought an item and then they tell you that you did not get it. Delivery is expensive, but overall a good experience. It doesn't really let you search for what are you looking for, so that is why I give 3 starts, and because of delivery. Quicker to purchase on other sites. Good, because you can see lots of different items if you have the time.

Whenever I try to order my items, the transcation doesn't go through. It either says "oops, try again" or "please contact your credit card.." I am using a prepaid gift card and nothing is working. Not to mention you guys accept gift cards so what is there that is not going well? I typed in my information correctly and yet, it's still not accepting it. Plus, the prices on the items are off. For example, a shirt will say $7 but when you select your size, the price increases.

It's a good app where you can get things pretty cheap. I wish there was an option to get rid of the items you already have bought on there. It'll pop up on the newsfeed more than once and it gets pretty annoying at times. It would also be great if when you click on something cause you don't know what it is, for that reason alone and not wanting to buy it, that it wouldn't pop up on your newsfeed anymore. That gets annoying real quick cause most of the time I don't want that item.

I really dont know what to say about this app. It has been showing me "payment pending"since yesterday even though I have given my complete card details and everything!! It's really disappointing because it's my first purchase with Wish and they are already giving me a very poor service!It really glitches so many times!!!

title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Offer Up
description:
Buy. Sell. Simple.

Join the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers! 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with people you can trust.

How it works:

• Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds. 
• Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
• Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you’re dealing with and build trust. 
• Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily. 
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app. 
• Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page. 
• Browse items by image and sort by category or location. 
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country. 
• Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics and home goods.
2. OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby, right in your neighborhood. 
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; shop anything you want at a discount, right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community: 

We’re making local buying and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

developerAddress:
OfferUp Inc.
227 Bellevue Way NE #57
Bellevue, WA 98004
recentChanges:
Enhanced user experience and stability.

Thanks for using OfferUp and keep the feedback coming!
You can contact us by going to the Help Center in the app or on the web.
comments: Update: app sucks. When not let me in and keeps giving me an error code. So tired of this inconsistency and being locked out. SNAP!! it locks you out of your messages and then asks you to register as if you don't have an account. I've only been using this for about six months and it's already happened three times. Can't reply to people's messages. Missed sales. very frustrating. Not sure why they aren't fixing this problem because according to other people it's been going on a long time

No support on bugs at all. I do not get audio notifications for items I'm selling. example: a person messages me wanting to buy an item, I see it FOUR HOURS later. response .metrics/times are way up to an hour because of this bug. could have lost the sale and look like a clown for not responding when OFFERUP NEVER NOTIFIED ME. What's up guys? This sucks. Update: There literally is NO support. Just random comments trying to look like they are actively doing something. they definitely aren't

The app works well for the most part and does have some consistently great deals. After their last update I had to reinstall the app in order to do a new post, which has me a bit concerned on their regression testing process. Just an annoyance, I would still recommend folks trying it out.

Seems like it could have been a good marketplace with good deals but you can't actually buy anything. Sellers just never respond to even full price offers or worse accept then cancel the sale. Days or even weeks wasted. Unreliable or inactive sellers/listings need to be removed. Too frustrating as is, uninstalled.

OfferUp used to be so good. Now it's riddled with bugs, scams, and overall just a terrible experience. For the past year I've been unable to post from mobile data and now I can't log in. No way to contact support, not that they do anything anyway. Time to ditch OfferUp and find a better app to sell on.

title: Get cash back, gift cards & daily deals: Shopkick
description:
Earn rewards and get FREE gift cards with Shopkick! Use the Shopkick app to earn rewards & get cash back on the shopping you already do at the stores you love. Earning free deals & discounts has never been easier! Add pizzazz to your shopping and start earning free cash back, coupons & discounts. 

Save & redeem your points to the store of your choice: Amazon, Target, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Sephora, Nike, Best Buy, plus many more. Discover exclusive deals, get shopping rewards and turn them into gift cards or cashback. Sound too good to be true? Simply download now to earn rewards (we call them ’kicks’). 

With Shopkick, earn shopping rewards, get cash back & FREE Gift Cards: 

How to get started:
⭐️ Deals & rewards await! Download the app today (it’s FREE).
🛒 Shopping at Target, Walmart, Sephora or Best Buy? Open the app when you’re in stores to earn rewards. You don’t even need to buy anything!
✅ Shopping made fun - Find select items to scan or purchase & rack up kicks to earn your gift cards.
💰 Purchase the items & scan your receipt to earn even more kicks. Shop with a linked card to earn more kicks.
🎁 Gift Cards & cashback - Redeem your kicks for amazing rewards.

Shopping online? No problem! You can earn cashback, discounts, free coupons and shopping rewards online as well, at stores like Amazon, Target, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, eBay, Hotels.com, Groupon & and many more. Earn cash back from the comfort of your couch. Don’t want to buy anything? Discover our exclusive deals and promo codes by watching videos in the app and earn your more kicks!

Download Shopkick for a fun & guilt-free shopping experience: invite your friends and enjoy free cash backs together. Easily walk in stores, scan products & receipts to get your kicks. Once you have enough, discover our exclusive deals & partnerships with your favorites retails! Save on all your favorite stores and get cash back.

Join the millions of Shopkickers who have earned over $85 million that they use to redeem FREE Gift Cards to shop at Starbucks, Amazon, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Sephora, Target & more. Download the app to discover all the ways to earn free cashback.

No more need for rummaging for coupons and cutting each coupon individually: enjoy having all your rewards & coupons on your phone so you can collect on the go! Have 30 spare minutes? Quickly hop in a store to get more kicks. Want to relax on your couch? Watch videos online to watch your kicks add up. Getting free gift cards has never been easier. Download our app to explore your options of redeeming your rewards: Sephora, Lush, Nike, Starbucks, Target, etc.

The savings you earn will help keep your grocery, dining, or shopping budget healthy. With Shopkick, you can indulge in your shopping: no more need to feel guilty every time you shop. Earn your free deals & Gift Cards from your everyday shopping & save now. You can even earn bonus kicks if you purchase products & submit your receipt! 

🛍 Use your shopping rewards to earn FREE Gift Cards to shop at stores & retails including:
Amazon
Target
Walmart
Starbucks 
Best Buy
Nike
Sephora 
Uber 
TJ Maxx 
Marshalls
Lowe’s 
Nike
GameStop
& Many More!

Download the app now to start getting your kicks! Redeem your kicks for free gift cards, exclusive deals and jaw-dropping discounts! Shopping has never been this guilt-free. 

⭐️The buzz about Shopkick: “This app is addictive.” – Oprah.com

summary: Save & earn promo codes & rewards: Shop at Target, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Best Buy.
recentChanges: For this release we're continuing our experiments to improve our look and flow. We're increasing the number of users who will see changes to the nearby and online stores lists and the profile options screen, and we're making some new changes to the store pages. We're also fixing bugs and improving performance, and everyone gets those changes.
comments: Works most of the time. Been getting harder to get walk in kicks. And I've notified them, but nothing happens still. Doe the most part, I love it, and it gives some great gift cards. But I think it needs to give you the kicks you miss out on when you tell them you didn't receive them.

I'm so tired of this app. I haven't been able to receive walk-in kicks larger than 25 since the end of February. Anything more than that, and the store won't even acknowledge that I'm there. I've done laps around these stores, left and come back, to no avail. I've missed out on at least 1000 kicks worth because of this. I've reported, I've emailed: no response. The app is just taking up space on my phone at this point.

Love watching videos. Helps me learn of new products. Enjoy scanning items, when they are available at the stores that I go to. I earn points and will keep stores competitive on pricing. Plus I get kicks!!! Win, win for everyone. Wish i lived near more participating stores.

This app is getting really irritating. Some of the stores I go to are not very close and after I get there I can't get the kicks. Marshall's did not give me 150 and now not even available at all. Also TJ Maxx. I tried to email my frustration but it said not a valid email and it's the only email I have. OK I tried to email Shopkicks again and it said my email is invalid. This is getting ridiculous not worth the trouble. Looked in my sent emails and it said it was sent. 🤔

For the past 3 weeks I have been having trouble with the Walk in point for stores like TJ Maxx, Carter's, and Oshkosh. I have reported the problems n I have yet to receive my pints n now today I am having the same problem with Marshall's. Very frustrating cause I live 45 to an hour from these stores so it's not like I can come everyday. Also very upsetting when u can not get anyone to help because supposedly they r doing upgrades to there help support. Ready to cash in drop this App

title: Hollar - The Online Dollar Store
description:
Bring the fun and addicting dollar store experience straight to your phone! Find thousands of amazing deals across our wide selection of categories with 50-90% off retail! Join our growing user base of over 5 million savvy shoppers and start saving today!

Reasons to Download:

App-Exclusive Deals 
Get instant access to app-only promotions and deals on thousands of top brands starting at $1—the lowest online prices, guaranteed!

Browsing Made Simple
Enjoy infinite scrolling for an effortless browsing experience. Looking for something specific? Quick search to find what you need, when you need it. 

Buy with Confidence
Securely check out with your credit card or PayPal and experience fast domestic shipping—straight from our fulfillment center in Los Angeles, CA.


What We Offer:

Endless Variety
Shop popular products in Home, Kitchen, Toys, Beauty, Office, Apparel, Household, Health, Grocery, Baby, Party, Pet, Electronics, and so much more!

All Your Favorite Brands
So many products from Disney, Nickelodeon, Star Wars, Marvel, Minions, Shopkins, My Little Pony, TONYMOLY, e.l.f., Nivea, Neutrogena, O.P.I., Crayola, Mega Bloks, Play-Doh, Cotton On, Hanes, Fruit of the Loom, Zak!—to name a few.

New Products Daily
Get them before they’re gone! New products are available daily at low, LOW prices. Check back daily to find something new.

Fast Shopping with Bundles
Easily add related products to your cart with our bundles. It’s a simpler, more streamlined way to shop and discover.

summary: Big deals in every department!
recentChanges: Spoiler alert: your Hollar app just got way better! In a nutshell, we’ve made it easier to shop for the things you love. Because we believe every day is a great deal.
comments: Absolutely love this app. They have good discounts on great products and fast delivery. they can't be beat. 6 months later and still loving it. I order at least once a month. They have anything you could need at an affordable price. Free shipping is offered once you spend a certai amount. If not it's only 3.99. What else could you ask for?Trust me when i say try it, you will love it. I need VIP status guys. Maybe a special discount. I have every person that I know and encoun wl

App started out decent, until i sent a couple emails re: a couple products that vanished, they never replied back, then they sent a message that my account has 5.00 credit to use on next purchase, but it didnt show in my account, i sent them a screenshot of the message, and 1 week later they respond with: send us the message that you recieved, i replied: already did that! No response back from them..
The app used to work great now it lags and my cart takes forever to load. Theres always an error message. Please fix because I used to buy from Hollar all the time. Samsung Note Plus
The app is really amazing. I really love this app. I ordered some products from this app and all products are really of good quality. Fully worth of money.

I found hollar when they first started and wow i got amazing things for an amazing price and yes prices go up with stores but hollar has got even better!There toy bundles rock and yes in the process of trying to teach austic grandson to go to the potty and yes its been so hard to do and i hope he goes so he can pick a toy out of the POTTY FUN PRIZE BOX we made from the things we bought fr this store!great app,great prices and nice toys

title: Shop Heroes: Adventure Quest
description:
Craft legendary items, gear up your heroes for epic quests, and fight for the top of the Trade Wars and PvP Leaderboards in the original smash hit fantasy tycoon: Shop Heroes!

Grow your simple shop into a vast empire! 

Become a medieval fantasy tycoon! Build, trade, and craft your way to riches and fame. Recruit a team of RPG heroes to fight a dragon, quest for you, and wear your finest weapons and armor in battle. Risk your honor in PvP battles with your strongest heroes. Team up with other player merchants & builders to create the greatest City in all civilization. All of this adventure and more awaits you - join the millions of players that have made Shop Heroes their phone’s design home.

What’s that mysterious Relic that you can craft? It seems that the more of them we make, the more powerful they become. Fascinating.

NEW: It is said that war is the forge of empires - now, work together with your City to conquer Shop Heroes’ Trade Wars! Invest in your City’s success, craft and Contribute important items, or Dominate your rivals in a special PvP mode to earn Domination Points for your City. Climb the City Leaderboard to earn valuable rewards for everyone involved!

~~~~~~~~~
BUILD A FANTASY EMPIRE
~~~~~~~~~
◆ INTERIOR DESIGN your dream item shop with beautiful decorations
◆ CUSTOMIZE your shopkeeper avatar with stylish outfits
◆ CRAFT powerful items to sell to adventurers and players alike
◆ ADVANCE through unique tech trees to discover incredible weapons and armor
◆ TRADE with other players to build your wealth and fame
◆ FUSE items together to unlock the rarest and most powerful equipment

~~~~~~~~~
CONQUER THE KINGDOM
~~~~~~~~~
◆ RECRUIT and gear up a diverse cast of RPG heroes
◆ LOOT exciting treasures in Aragonia’s many quests and adventures
◆ BATTLE other players in PvP combat for wealth and glory
◆ TEAM up with friends to build a powerful and profitable City
◆ RAID massive dungeons with your City to earn exclusive loot
◆ TRADE WARS give Cities a new axis and allies to consider - will you be victorious?

Regular events, updates, and new content are always happening. Meet and love Nikki and all the Shop Heroes characters! Come see what Shop Heroes has in store for you.

~~~~~~~~
SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~
Experiencing any problems? Got some suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at https://cloudcade.helpshift.com for immediate assistance.

A persistent network connection is required to play.

PLEASE NOTE! Shop Heroes is completely free to play, but you can purchase some game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at http://cloudcade.com/tos/
Collection and use of data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at http://cloudcade.com/privacy-policy/

Like Us: http://facebook.com/shopheroes
Follow Us: http://twitter.com/shopheroesgame

http://shopheroes.com

summary: TRADE WARS give Cities a new competition - will you be victorious?
developerAddress:
414 Brannan St.
San Francisco, CA 94107
recentChanges:
◆Ninja vs Samurai Bundle
- New craftable items
- New shop decorations
comments: I really enjoy this game. The 2 minute crafting helps fill the time of the 8 hour upgrades. I also like how you get to keep your investment if you decide to leave the city you joined. I also like the lack of greedy adds. There is no stress to pay money but I will since I have enjoyed this game for over 100 hours

The game itself is good. I would highly recommend it. 5 stars for game - 10 for in game offers. Don't expect to get the gems rewards . I have played for a couple of years but after the trouble i am having trying to get my gems from a offer I am thinking of giving up. The rewards of free gems are run via tapjoy and shop heroes say it's nothing to do with them. Easy solution stop being paid by tapjoy to advertise in your game and award a few gems for daily log in.

I am a returning player, years ago I played on kongregate. The game is great and it has added new events, but it definitely hasn't improved much on quality of life changes or user friendly interface. Fusion cauldron: the starting and finishing animations are way too long, stupid but frustrating. Interrupts whatever I am doing with a whole screen pop-up that fusion finished. Trade house could have a comparison on price difference between offers and requests. Shows the profit that can be made.

The best mobile game I've ever played. No intrusive ads (you can CHOOSE to watch ads to speed up certain processes), long gameplay and raids on the weekends. Possible to play on your own and easy to pick up after a break. Has only crashed when my internet connection has been bad. Very, nice art and atmosphere.
Nice game, but a lot of bugs in the mobile version.

title: Target
description:
Now the Target app can help you have a more rewarding Target run! Introducing Target Circle, which gives you access to hundreds of deals, a birthday gift and the chance to support your community.

Plan your next Target run by checking out Target Circle offers, the Weekly Ad and item availability all in one place. Then streamline your run with store maps and aisle locations, and scan item barcodes for prices, reviews and available deals.

Wallet is the fastest, easiest way to pay and save in store. With one scan, you can pay with your credit or debit RedCard and redeem Target Circle offers, gift cards and Target Circle earnings.
descriptionHTML:
Now the Target app can help you have a more rewarding Target run! Introducing Target Circle, which gives you access to hundreds of deals, a birthday gift and the chance to support your community.

Plan your next Target run by checking out Target Circle offers, the Weekly Ad and item availability all in one place. Then streamline your run with store maps and aisle locations, and scan item barcodes for prices, reviews and available deals.

Wallet is the fastest, easiest way to pay and save in store. With one scan, you can pay with your credit or debit RedCard and redeem Target Circle offers, gift cards and Target Circle earnings.
summary: Plan, shop and save with the Target App, now with Target Circle.
recentChanges: We're constantly fixing bugs and making changes to improve your experience. Turn on your updates to stay on top of our latest and greatest.
comments: Pictures of items do not expand past the initial tap. Sometimes I have to take a screen shot and expand picture in my gallery. Other times I just go to another website. There are a lot of retailers out there carrying the same items. Target's prices aren't that great anyway. Although I periodically buy things from Target online, I mostly avoid it.

Right now, the "offers available" prompt is very confusing to follow. I searched for a good 30 minutes for the, supposed, "discount offer" as a circle member before finally giving up and just placing my order. Target devs, you have a long way to go. Especially considering the fact that you're simply taking advantage of the fear and panic everyone is experiencing at this time in our lives. Please step your game up. We all need you. Be that beacon of hope you promised you'd be.

I love this app! I can shop and add my savings at the end. I have different delivery options that are on the app. This is a great featurewith the store becauseI have a smallchild and I dont always want to get her out of the car if she is asleep. There are also times when I dont want to have to get dressed to go into the store for one item. It is amazing!

I find it frustrating when the app freezes up and has to be closed and reopened frequently. I was unsure about the notations in red indicating a possible delay in that particular item being available.which is certainly understandable under the current conditions. Did that also mean that the current gift card offer might no longer be available as well?

Have been using this for about 2 months now. It does just about everything that I need. Thanks! Update - love this app except for one thing - the search engine needs to be better. Even if you search for one specific item, it will bring back way too many different items. Update 3/11/20- love it, but PLEASE tune the search engine. Brings back way too many non-specific results.

title: SHOP.COM
description:
The official SHOP.COM Mobile is continually enhanced to offer the shopper the ultimate experience in mobile shopping. 

- Get paid to shop with our Cashback program: Look for the products and stores with the SHOP.COM Cashback symbol and find deals on the products you want while earning 2-50% Cashback. 

- Offering millions of products thousands of SHOP.COM Partner Stores, searching for what you want has never been easier. Search using category keywords (i.e. toys, cosmetics), brands (i.e. Isotonix, Motives Cosmetics), or anything else you want. 

- SHOP.COM Mobile allows you to compare prices to save you money, view product images and information, find what you are looking for, while offering the security and ease of our One Cart™ patented checkout process available for most stores.

- My account section allows you to view your available Cashback for use on future orders plus adding and deleting shipping addresses and payment methods to speed up future SHOP.COM orders.

summary: SHOP.COM Mobile has been completely redesigned for the best shopping experience.
recentChanges:
Stay up to date on deals and promotions with push notifications!
User Enhancements
Bug fixes
comments: Since 13 Nov 2019 I can't access this app through my mobile. Tried to uninstall and reinstall still the same. On 14 Nov 2019 there was an pop up update for it. As usual I updated the app but still unable to access. The weird part is I was able to enter late night on 12 Nov to their partner store. Please assist.
I see comments saying the app won't open on droids but it opens fine on mine and I have no problem with it at all. I love this app.
This app is so user-friendly! I also love that customers earn cash back at major stores!
I've downloaded the Apps since yesterday & tried to login. However, it unable still now... mentioned that my email address is invalid.
So easy to use. Hundreds of stores, millions of products. Up to 50% Cashback.

title: Wayfair - Shop All Things Home
description:
Wayfair offers a zillion things home. Shop the largest selection of home furniture and décor across all styles and price points. Explore unique and exclusive products, or shop for the best bargain through our daily sales on everything from bedding sets and curtains to desks, pillows, and tables. With the Wayfair app for Android, you can find your next great bargain through app-exclusive sales, and explore the largest online catalog of home furniture and décor—whether you’re searching for something contemporary, antique, rustic, or coastal. 

Find exactly what you’re looking for among zillions of high-quality products—whether it’s bedding and rugs for your bedroom, or décor and furniture to spruce up your kitchen, patio, or bedroom. 

- Shop every style of home furniture for all tastes, including antique, contemporary, traditional, or your own eclectic style 

- Browse new, limited-time sales that launch daily at 12PM EST to find a great bargain on our high-quality items 

- Build a wedding registry that works for you and your guests

- Enjoy Free Shipping on orders over $49 

- Save and share your favorite furniture and décor items through Wayfair Idea Boards, where you can store your bathroom remodel ideas, living room concepts, patio plans, favorite beds and bedding sets, and much more

- Use Augmented Reality (AR) to see life-sized versions of products in any space using our "View in Room 3D" feature

- Find furniture to add style to any room, including your kitchen, bedroom, living room, patio, outdoor space, kid’s room, game room, and more

- Explore décor for every style, whether you need chic bedding sets, contemporary pillows, rustic coffee tables, traditional rugs, antique desks, or eclectic chairs

- Browse various curated collections to design your dream—be it a modern and contemporary bedroom, a creative and eclectic lounge, or an antique and rustic patio

- Shop seamlessly using our app-optimized Checkout 

- Tackle any ambitious remodel project with ease. Our zillions of options will allow you to remodel bathrooms, kitchens, and beyond (all at the perfect price)

New features roll out every week! Check the “What’s New” section to see our latest and greatest in furniture and décor. From unbelievable deals on beds to incredible discounts on desks, tables, and curtains, there will always be a bargain to excite you.

Don’t have an account with Wayfair.com? Sign up now using the app to access our great features, high-quality products, and more!
Whether you want to remodel an entire house or find that one item that tops off your look, shopping for your home has never been so easy and enjoyable.

- Explore décor for every style, whether you need chic bedding sets, contemporary pillows, rustic coffee tables, traditional rugs, antique desks, or eclectic chairs

- Browse various curated collections to design your dream—be it a modern and contemporary bedroom, a creative and eclectic lounge, or an antique and rustic patio

- Shop seamlessly using our app-optimized Checkout

- Tackle any ambitious remodel project with ease. Our zillions of options will allow you to remodel bathrooms, kitchens, and beyond (all at the perfect price)

New features roll out every week! Check the “What’s New” section to see our latest and greatest in furniture and décor. From unbelievable deals on beds to incredible discounts on desks, tables, and curtains, there will always be a bargain to excite you.

Don’t have an account with Wayfair.com? Sign up now using the app to access our great features, high-quality products, and more!
Whether you want to remodel an entire house or find that one item that tops off your look, shopping for your home has never been so easy and enjoyable.
summary: Furniture, Décor & Design Tips
developerAddress:
4 Copley Place
Floor 7
Boston, MA 02116
recentChanges: Thanks for using the Wayfair app to shop everything home! We regularly bring updates to our app that make shopping easier and more fun than ever. As exciting new features become available, we'll let you know right in the app.
comments: It's easy to navigate, love the stuff they have but for some reason now, when I click on a product it doesn't show at the bottom similar products anymore. Idk if it's just my phone but point is, I don't like that. I like seeing similar options as it makes it easier to find things I like so I've not been using it much cus of that.

Prices displayed are deceiving/misrepresented of "actual price" . For example: when shopping bed frames, when you select the size of bed frame (like a king) then select the color, it will show you the price of the full (but doesn't indicate this anywhere on the screen. I had to call customer service who snottingly advised me of this and offered no apologies). Then when you select the color, on the main screen it will show the "actual price".

This app used to work fantastic. Unfortunately after multiple updates it has become nothing more than wasted space on my mobile device. As many other people have mentioned 95% of the time it will not load any searches. Will not allow to scroll photos but only enlarges the initial photo as well. I have had some great experiences with Wayfair but this app has forced me on many occasions in the last few weeks to make my purchases elsewhere. I have deleted/ redownloaded as well as much more.

Not sure what happened to this app but I can no longer view any of the color selections. No matter what option I select the photo doesn't change. Please fix this. Buying online from stock photos is already a gamble but not being to preview a color sample is just bad. I've used this app many times and have had no other issues until recently with this problem.

Very cumbersome and slow to use in all aspects: searching for items, filtering items, accessing orders, viewing the cart, etc. The only thing that happens quickly is placing an order. However, it happens so quickly that you don't get to review items or delivery options.

title: Crazy Shopping
description:
Crazy Shopping will have you in hysterics! This fun, crazy shopping game uses ragdoll physics to create as much chaos while you shop!

Upgrade your shopping squad and time to collect as much stuff as you can carry, the better the item the more money you get.

Can you buy everything?

Crazy Shopping features:
- Crazy and wacky ragdoll physics
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Colorful graphics
- New stores and items to unlock

SUBSCRIBE TO CRAZY SHOPPING
 
Subscribe to Crazy Shopping for all of the following benefits:
* Unlock All VIP Areas!
* Receive x2 Earnings
* No Ads, which removes non-optional adverts from the game
 
SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
 
Crazy Shopping VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, you will unlock; all VIP areas to discover, receive x2 earnings for your shopping and no ads, which removes non-optional ads from the game. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The prices notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased
Cancelling a trial or subscription:
- In order to cancel a subscription during the free trial period you need to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.

recentChanges: + Bug fixes and improvements to keep you shopping
comments: At first,game might seem good,but after a few rounds it got worse and worse!Ads were Poppin up too much,and after a few rounds game isn't that good anymore!If you want,you could buy free trial but it is very expensive!Game says it is offline,but it is really not!Why do they want us to play online?So they can show us ads!Till they don't fix it I'm giving it 2 stars!

It's a really fun game but I hate how every time I finish a stage, I have to watch an ad. I can't even play it offline because being online is a requirement so that the ads are viewable. Its making the game unplayable and irritating to be honest, I hope it wasn't that pushy with watching advertisements. The ads are ruining the game.

This game has way to many adds it makes it unplayable as you get a choice to watch an add to increase your income or just collect however if you press on just collect you are forced to watch an add anyway ( which you are unable to cancel unless you leave the game ) overall I would not recommend anyone to support such greedy behaviour unless they make it actually optional to watch adds for extra in-game profits

It is a good game and all but once I got 41 people when the time was almost up they disappear and it keeps the map view it's weird please fix and easy 5 stars. Edit: it's super awesome not saying don't get also I have to close out to keep playing.
Why do I need internet connection to play, it should work perfectly fine without it, but no, then they can't shove dozens of ads down your throat!

title: Overstock – Deals on Furniture, Decor, Rugs & More
description:
Shop the best deals on stylish furniture, home decor, area rugs, and other home goods for your space, all from the palm of your hand.

Download the Overstock app now to:
- Get app-exclusive coupons and daily deals on stylish furniture and home decor
- Receive notifications for order updates and deals on products you’ll love
- Checkout quickly and securely with PayPal and Apple Pay
- Use augmented reality (AR) to visualize how furniture and decor will look in your home with realistic 3D models
- Receive personalized shopping recommendations
- Shop with your Club O account and earn 5% rewards on every purchase
- Save items and create lists of favorites to personalize your shopping experience
- Log in with Touch ID

The Overstock shopping app makes it quick and easy to transform the look of your home for less. Explore our huge selection of the hottest furniture and home decor, including sofas, area rugs, mattresses, beds, bedding, jewelry, clothing, and more, to find just what you want at prices you'll love. When you shop on the app, you'll find clearance shopping, huge deals on the latest styles, and you'll get FREE SHIPPING on every order of $45* or more! Sign up for an account today to get 10% off your first purchase!

recentChanges:
We know you'll love this release. Order Tracking improvements, Buy Now option, ClubO enhancements, and other nice changes! We even fixed the Can't Tap Anywhere problem that a few users reported!!
**** Want to see the latest improvements before anyone else? Join our Beta in the Google Play Store. ****
comments: Impossible to navigate to even the most basic of categories. You have to use their dumb categories of "rustic" or "traditional". You can't just see office chairs. At best, you can see office chairs that are "New arrivals". Giving up and using the website.

Updated to 4 stars because they company corrected the app and now it works great. I'm not sure why the previous update broke it up, at least the company listens and corrects things. It's appreciated since I do a lot of online shopping for my customers. Horrible. The app freezes everytime I try and use it. I thought it was a needed update, tried that, still freezes. Then I tried uninstalling and reinstalling just to be sure, freezes as soon as I open it.
It seems like everytime I go to my phone's home page I get a notification from overstock. At times this is a little aggravating.

App is great, but the emails are crazy!!! If you look at one thing, even by accident, you get bombed with emails about it. If you search for an item, you get many emails about it. Too many emails!! The selection of items is great.

App works just fine on my phone. No issues. But not impressed with stunted selection/variety in departments other than decor. Take kids/girls clothing for example. Horrendous. Other than basics, I have a hard time believi anyone is buying those horrible prints, dumb slogans, and ridiculous color options for their kids. Reminds me of my local Marshalls- fairly decent decor but girls clothes consists of 3 pairs of sparkling animal print stretch pants and a pink tshirt with a cat wearing sunglass

title: Urban Outfitters
description:
Urban Outfitters is a lifestyle retailer dedicated to inspiring customers through a unique combination of product, creativity and cultural understanding.   
The UO app brings the best of Urban Outfitters to your mobile device:

- Shop — Find the newest arrivals, exclusive collections and more. Explore our expanded product selection with enhanced search and express checkout. Easily shop by look or favorite brand from any product page and watch videos of select products.
- Discover — Explore our curated feed for the latest trends and looks, plus get real-time inspiration from our @urbanoutfitters community.
- Wish Lists — Create, customize and share up to 5 UO Wish Lists.
- UO Rewards — Get special offers and discounts, earn exclusive rewards and enter to win prizes as a UO Rewards member.
- Account — Keep track of your orders, get delivery details, access previous purchases and more. Locate and bookmark nearby UO stores using our Find a Store feature.

summary: Use the UO app to shop FILA & adidas clothes, plus new furniture & décor.
recentChanges:
Use the UO app to quickly browse clothing collections from favorite brands like Champion, adidas and FILA, plus new home furniture and décor arrivals.


Our latest version of the UO app is updated with performance enhancements for a seamless experience.
comments: Love the app & love shopping with UO. However, there's some bugs that are annoying esp pertaining to the loyalty perks. I don't have the option to leave reviews at all on the app. Even when I'm prompted to leave reviews for a contest the link takes to a blank page. Also, the app only lets me enter giveaways every 2 days instead of 24 hrs. Please fix!

The contests are a great perk... Except I live in Quebec and we're excluded in all of them. Also, I sometimes find it hard to navigate the app, I can't always find the features I'm looking for (leaving reviews, changing email settings...) Other then that it's a great app and there's no bug so far
I like this app and there is good quality items for reasonable prices. Urban Outfitters is also trendy and I like the aesthetic of the app as well as the items.
It's easy to browse and purchase from this app but rewards are sometimes not processed immediately. Great app!

Good for shopping, not for loyalty. I have happily bought stuff on this app for way over a year, and it is easy to use and find what o want. However, the loyalty aspect is severely lacking in development as whenever I have bought something, I haven't got the points. With some purchases it has been over a month. I feel like this issue should be looked into, especially with how promoted the loyalty is.

title: Famous Footwear - Shop Shoes
description:
The Famous Footwear App is the only place to get exclusive deals on all your favorite brand-name shoes! Shop the latest shoes from brands like Nike, adidas, Birkenstock, Vans, Sperry, Converse and Skechers.

EARN WITH FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS
•	Collect $5 Reward Cash for every 100 points – up to $250 a year. 1 point = $1 spent. Plus redeem any time on the app!
•	Rewards members enjoy FREE SHIPPING on all orders!
•	Celebrate your birthday with $5 Reward Cash and 2x points per dollar spent for your entire birth month.
•	Stack coupons on top of sales for the biggest savings.
•	Access your Rewards card, current points balance and available Rewards Cash all on the home screen.
•	NEW! EXTRAS WHEN YOU WANT: Activate your Extra BOGO 1/2 Off purchase and 2X Bonus Points Day when you want.
  
SHOP YOUR FAVORITE BRANDS
•	Easily shop for shoes and enjoy Free Standard Shipping on orders of $75 or more.
•	View current order status, past purchase history and account activity in the account center.
•	Check out faster with PayPal and Google Pay integration.
 
BUY ONLINE, PICK UP IN STORE
•	Shop your local store’s selection, checkout online, then pick up your new shoes (usually ready within 2 business hours).
•	Get FREE In-store Pickup when ordering online.
•	Receive a text message when your order is ready for pickup at the store (opt-in)!
•	Plus, Rewards members earn 50 bonus points (that’s halfway to a reward) after picking up your order!
 
MAXIMIZE YOUR SHOE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
•	With nearly 1,000 stores across the country, quickly locate the shoe store nearest you.
•	Use the app barcode scanner on any shoe box in the store to see all available colors, read reviews and get additional product details.
•	Find the best shoe size and width for you with TrueFit® profiling technology.
•	Stay up-to-date on the latest footwear trends each season with Trend Shops – featuring fashionable sneakers, sandals, boots and more.

Famous Footwear features athletic and casual shoes from hundreds of nationally recognized brands for women, men and kids! With stores nationwide and even more selection online, Famous Footwear is your place for the shoe styles that help you put your best foot forward every day.

comments: Easy to use! Tracks all my points and I can shop right from the app.
It always tells me error connection cant see any points I had to uninstall 4 times and still does the same thing....disappointed

Until couple of weeks ago, this app was great. From then on, I always get access denied message when choosing the shop tab, uninstalled and reinstalled. Still nothing, reported to feedback, still no fix

I use this app a lot but recently it has not been working I can not update my information I can't locate stores or even shop through the app it's very disappointing and they still have not fixed the issues
I like it you can shop comfortably in your house and dont have to go the store it's great and convenient

title: PacSun
description:
Sit back, relax, and shop PacSun.com from the comfort of just about anywhere with our brand new app. The easy-to-use PacSun app elevates your shopping experience and provides you with the best in shoes, clothing, and accessories. Don’t believe us? Download the PacSun app now to:
∙ Skip the lines and shop our online store and Instagram account with ease
∙ Be the first to know about new and exclusive products that you won’t find anywhere else
∙ Manage your myGSOM REWARDS points, rewards, & activity
∙ Receive notification of rewards and offers right on your phone
∙ Get access to offers delivered exclusively through the app
∙ Add your favorite items to our convenient Wish List feature
∙ Review your order history
∙ Locate your nearest PacSun store
Save while you shop by joining our myGSOM REWARDS Program. Members enjoy these sweet benefits:
∙ 10 points for every $1 spent
∙ $5 reward for every 1,250 points
∙ Earn points for things that you already do—download now to learn more!
PacSun is dedicated to delivering an exclusive collection of the most relevant brands and styles to a community of inspired youth. Curated just for you in Los Angeles, we serve up the latest styles for men & women from coveted brands including PacSun Denim, Kendall & Kylie, FOG – Fear of God, adidas, Champion, LA Hearts, Calvin Klein, Nike SB, Vans, Tommy Hilfiger, Me to We, Diamond Supply Co., Hurley, and more!

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance optimizations
comments: Too much like a webpage. Every time I try to add an item to the wishlist it doesn't work. Please fix.

This overall a great app., however it kind of annoys me that when you are scrolling through a thread of clothes, if you click on something you have to rescroll through the whole thread instead of having the option to pick up where you left off. This is a major inconvenience for me. Fix that glitch and the app would be perfect.

This app was extremely convenient and easy to use before it updated to the latest version. Now, I can't access my account (but I can access it on the computer) and it's almost impossible to place an order on the app. Still convenient to look at clothes and sales and can track orders as long as you have the order number
It's a good app overall. Only issue I have is that it keeps signing me out every damn time whenever I want to use the app again.

Dont know what's wrong with your app can't make my purchase cart loads go thru loading payment then says pick shipping address. Then repeat payment, ship over and over. So the app is just for looking can't buy anything here.

title: Shoe Carnival
description:
Shoe Carnival is one of the nation's largest, fastest growing and most exciting family footwear retailers. We offer customers a completely unique and fun shopping experience with a broad assortment of great brands, and value priced footwear for the entire family. Download our FREE app to see what fun and exciting surprises await!

-Rewards at your fingertips! Sign up for our Shoe Perks Rewards program to start earning points and receive exclusive offers. Existing Shoe Perks Members can use their virtual Shoe Perks card, view current points and redeem rewards when in store or shopping online.

-Make room in your closet! Our new and improved shopping experience makes ordering quick and easy. You can also buy online and pick up in-store the same day!

-No shoes, no problem! Can’t find your size, or the color you want while shopping in-store? Simply scan the barcode on the box to pull it up on shoecarnival.com to get more info, read reviews and place an order.

summary: We’ve made some changes and fixed some bugs based on your feedback
recentChanges: We've made some changes and fixed some bugs based on your feedback.
comments: This is the third time I've attempted to download this app and use it, but it won't let me log in. It just does nothing every time I hit "log in" it just buffers. I really hope you fix all of these bugs soon.

It either takes forever to load or it won't load a new page at all. I've also tried logging in to my account and hitting the "remember me" box and every time I open the app it didn't save my info and it just won't load up another page when I do try to log back in. This app needs serious bug fixes and updated.

The app is really slow. It doesn't "remember me" when I go to login so I have to reenter my information everytime. Doesn't keep me logged in. If I add something to my cart, click out of the app and go back to it moments later my cart is empty and of course have to sign in again.
This app is incredibly slow to load. It takes easily over 5 minutes to even get logged in. It's too slow to be usable.
This app experience is great. I also had online savings when I went to buy some new shoes.

title: Google Shopping: Discover, compare prices & buy
description:
The Google Shopping app enables you to shop millions of items across thousands of stores with confidence. Buy directly on Google with an easy and secure checkout, using your Google account.  When you buy on Google, your order is backed by a Google guarantee - with simple returns and customer support 7 days a week.

Easier shopping, all from one spot, no membership required
Whether you’re shopping for an everyday necessity, a gift, or something new and unique, you’ll find it easy to browse departments and products with the Google Shopping app. Google Shopping is free and doesn’t require a paid membership to enjoy all its benefits.

Thoughtful recommendations
Get deals and product recommendations just for you, inspired by your Google activity. 

Compare stores, prices, and more
The Google Shopping app brings thousands of stores together in one place, so you can shop your favorite places or try somewhere new. Quickly compare prices, reviews, brands, and store availability to find the best option for you - both online and nearby.

Exclusive deals and free shipping
Save time and money on the go, with app-exclusive deals and promo codes from stores. Get free shipping on qualifying orders, with most items arriving within 3-5 days. Save even more with daily deals and frequent flash sales.

Download the app now to start shopping millions of items across thousands more stores - all in one convenient place.

summary: Shop with confidence & buy with the Google guarantee
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
• Buy directly on Google, backed by a Google guarantee. Enjoy easy checkout, simple returns, and customer support 7 days a week.
• Expand your search with a direct link to shopping.google.com on the web to find even more prices and places to buy across online and local stores.
• A new name and a new look.
comments: The Google Shopping experience is pretty clean and intuitive, and the selection of products from various stores is nicely varied. I really appreciate that my purchases are "carbon neutral" thanks to Google's sustainability commitments and the checkout process is simple and smooth. My only complaint is that I don't have a simple way of submitting feedback on products that don't correctly show up in my search or on reviews that are incorrectly associated to a product.

This shopping application is very inclusive. The Google assistant explained that "Google play balance "was an acceptable payment method. But, the application does not include these playstore card amounts as a alternative. Please assist orvell Burrell with "registering "for this payment method. This method will be very convenient.
App is aesthetically nice. Selection and categories are great. Better integration with Google Keep and your Shopping List would be nice. The UX is a bit hard to get used to as well.
Great shopping experience. Best part is the accuracy of the search results. Found exactly what I was looking for in 3-words-or-less!!!
when i scan a bar code for an item search, it shows nothing unless i clink a link and then it takes me to the result page. its sloppy. please look into it...

comments: Some things will trick you if you don't pay attention! The pictures aren't always what you are trying to buy. Learned lesson Got a couple things that were nice. The rest not so sure. Half of thev time no instructions. No charger with Fitbit type thing. I have spent too much in shipping fees. Watch and pay attention and fully read everything what selling.

So far, so good. Seems to have interesting items. Read the comments on the item before making your purchase. Item may be not exactly what your looking for. Sizes run a bit smaller. Shipping times and/or pricing, can be a bit tense at times. Especially when you select color and/or other options at the "Buy" button. However, with the sales, discounts, and promos, shipping & pricing can be forgiving. It says its a WISH app. Seems a bit more interesting then WISH, maybe cause its new, (to me). 😊

I really love this app but don't change anything because every developer keeps changing their app and makes it lousy that I have no choice but to find something else to replace it but can't. I can never find what I'm searching for: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 550 9.7 cases but in it gives me anything but what I'm looking for!☹️😡

Totally awesome! I love it & every single item I have ordered. Usually items arrive early or by their delivery date. I have had a couple things never arrive at all. They refunded the money immediately. I be mindful, and pay attention...some things are misleading, size, quality and quality... that being said R FAMILY GIVES THIS APP 5 STARS & 10 THUMBS UP!
Love the app really low prices, however, most items listed/or attempted to purchase are usually not available. I have only received 1% of the items I tried to purchase for $0.50.

title: Amazon Shopping - Search, Find, Ship, and Save
description:
Product Features

* Customers are able to shop millions of products on any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app
*Use Alexa to help you shop—just use your voice to search for products on Amazon, track your orders, and reorder your favorite items. Tap the microphone icon and say “where’s my stuff?” to access open orders. Reorder products by saying “reorder paper towels” or “buy more batteries”.
* Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, customer support, Wish Lists, create or find a baby or wedding registry, order tracking, and more
* Scan product barcodes and images to compare prices and check availability using Scan It
* Check out Gold Box Deals - including the Deal of the Day and Lightning Deals, and get automatically notified when new deals become available
* Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more
* Sign-up for automatic shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives
* Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processed


Product Description

The Amazon Shopping app lets you shop millions of products and manage your Amazon orders from anywhere. Browse, shop by department, compare prices, read reviews, share products with friends, and check the status of your orders.
Compare prices and availability by typing in your search, scanning a barcode or an image with your camera, or using your voice. Never miss a deal with easy access to Lightning Deals and the Deal of the Day. You can also sign-up for shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives. You have full access to your Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, payment and Prime shipping options, Subscribe & Save order history, and 1-Click settings, just like on the full Amazon.com site. All Amazon Shopping app purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers to encrypt and safeguard your personal information.


Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera. The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

recentChanges: AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favorite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
comments: It's a wonderful app and wonderful site but it's beyond frustrating that whenever you preorder something, you aren't able to pay right then. It's that the whole point of preordering? Pay now, so you can get it when it first comes out? It's not even an option on the app, which has led me to thinking I've bought something already only to be charged months later. Overall a great app but it could have certain aspects executed better.

App is generally really nice, clean interface smooth action, crisp transitions to next product. The reason for 3 stars is, I have a few items I "save for later" , everytime I log on there is always a message in my cart about "new information of a product Your cart" when I click on this link, well nothing happens. System freezes on a blank screen.

Lately the app has become frustrating 😠. Normally when I've made a purchase, I click the continue shopping button at the bottom of the order confirmation screen. Just recently, Amazon has starting putting small banner adds that are timed to pop up right where the Continue Shopping button is located a split second before I click it. It happens almost right before I click, and I inadvertently click the ad instead. As a result, I'm adjusting my habits to close the app after a purchase instead.

The daily deals/lightning deals/watching deals tab has disappeared. It was available a few days ago but it's not there anymore. I was using the home page to find them but they disappeared from there as well today. Tried doing a Google search and I still can't find them. I've searched through every tab and category in the app and it's still not there. Where have they gone?

This app is clunky, frustrating, and slow. Whether it's between info not displaying correctly, to crashes (on my Pixel 4XL), to just how slow and confusing it is to browse product listings, reviews, and essentially everything you need for a good shopping experience. Many times I just swap to my computer after failing with the app.

description: Get trending products at 50-80% OFF what you would pay at your local stores. Get the smartest deals on headphones, watches, speakers, phone upgrades, car accessories, and electronics directly on your phone.
