comments: I like it. Some items are good comes on time. Some items don't come at all. If you order cream comes empty and open items. If you try to get money back which i paid in full they compensate very small amount or nothing. But still like it because there is some stuff you can't find it in the stores and they cheap. Overall thanks.

Over all i like the app. It could use some work. Tracking of packages leaves a lot to be desired. Also, if there is a way to deal with a lost package, i couldnt find it. Last package was lost for over a week. Lost between county post offuce and home delivery with no way to arrange for replacement other than just ordering, paying, and waiting all over again.

App was good until last month. It is now asking me for a bank statement to prove a previous purchase, every time I open the app. And then it cancels all my orders automatically without reason. I've lost tons of discounts this way. I've written to them several times WITH the proof they wanted. Even wrote to their support team as the developer asked. Been more than a week. ZERO response. Looks like they don't want my money.

It has some good deals but be careful with the way the app works. The prices change from one screen to the next for no apparent reason. You can't talk to a live person. It does some shady things like offer you 5% off if you are ready to check out. BUT, doesn't give you the chance to look over your order fore it instantly checks you out. This is where I have seen the prices change for no reason and by then your order has been placed. AND, to undo that you have to cancel one item at a time. Why?

Like all apps and sites, it has it's downsides. Some of this stuff is the definition of builders grade BS. But for the people with common sense...you get what you pay for. One of the really big draw backs is not having a [ BUY NOW] button. If I'm filling my cart with stuff I want to purchase all at one time next week, but pass something I want to buy now but don't want to empty my cart to do. I should be able to click [BUY NOW] to bypass my cart without emptying it out.

title: letgo: Buy & Sell Used Stuff, Cars, Furniture
description:
🏆 letgo is Google Play Editor's choice
Join one of the biggest marketplace apps! Install our selling and shopping app to start trading up secondhand items in the mobile marketplace!

letgo is a go-to marketplace app to sell your stuff and find the best offers on secondhand finds like used cars, secondhand electronics, and used video games!

Find the best deals on preowned items today! Even better than buying in secondhand shops or an online thrift store!

Find the best offers online on secondhand items that you actually need, and make the best offers to sell your used items and earn money! 

Looking to buy home goods and vintage furniture? Seeking used video games or secondhand electronics or a used car? Get used items and vintage stuff on letgo! 🎉

letgo is the perfect online marketplace to buy and sell locally! No need to visit a used car dealership or thrift store to find the best local deals on used items and vintage stuff! Here you’ll find a wide selection of like-new products, from used cars for sale, home goods, used electronics, vintage clothes, used furniture, used books, used vehicles, exercise equipment, retro games and electronics, to houses and apartments for rent or sale. It’s everything you can wish for!

letgo is one of the biggest and fastest growing app to buy and sell locally. Over 100 million downloads and 200 million listings! Here's why tens of millions of people are buying and selling on letgo:

MILLIONS OF LISTINGS
• USED CARS - Think of us as your used car dealership. Whether you are looking for a used toyota, a pre owned ford or an old chevrolet, we’ll help you find the best used car for you. Explore used cars for sale, used trucks, used suv, used motorcycles, dirt bikes, and many more.
• HOUSING - Looking to sell your property or into real estate investing? Find and list properties like: apartments, houses for sale, studios for sale and other real estate!  
• SELL ELECTRONICS - Used PS4 and other used video games, used electronics, used laptops, used computers, used smartphones and much more.
• Shop for the best deals on anything you need in an online garage sale. From used furniture, dresses, shoes and watches, to vintage books, used toys, used laptops a new iPhone or Samsung Galaxy, a secondhand car and even real estate for sale or rent! You can even find listings for free stuff!
• Find and offer barter deals or services at affordable prices.

FAST AND CUTTING-EDGE
• List items in seconds, as effortlessly as taking a photo. letgo's the only app with advanced technology that automatically titles and categorizes your listing, whether you’re selling a used iPhone or a used car! Find the best deals at letgo today.
• Make money selling your like-new items. It’s safe and easy.

FUN, SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE
•Discover stuff for sale nearby or search for something specific.
•Check out other users’ profiles, ratings and reviews, and chat instantly in the app.

* Buying a used car or selling your used car? We’ve made it even easier to buy and sell used cars, SUVs, trucks, motorcycles and other vehicles. Find your dream car on letgo - at a fraction of the price!
 
Download letgo and start selling your stuff, shopping for the best brands and finding discount deals on anything from fashion, electronics and used cars!

Less Stuff, More Living. Live & letgo!

Team letgo

comments: The old version is way better than the new version because the old app was simple and easy to follow and you can see everything on the page together. The new version has too much information that you don't need scattered in-between too many pop-ups and if you don't know to keep strolling down you will miss the other items the seller is selling and they loose out. Go back to the last version. This version doesn't make sense.

Great app. The distance setting in the search filter was a little off. Like I tried putting in items up to 30 miles away but it had some stuff in there that was to me like 40-50 miles away. It seemed better when I narrowed it closer to my location though. That's the only issue I've experienced with it. The process to post what you want to sell is NOT overly complicated, it's simple to use, but it's kind odd looking for me though. But that's just my opinion there, everything else seems great.

I've had great success with this app, my only complaint is regarding the ads. I do understand to keep this app 100% you need to show ads but I find them to be repetative, rather intrusive and very large. If you don't know to keep scrolling once you see a large ad then you will miss out on a lot things for sale.

It's a great way to make extra money. It's fun to meet with all the interesting people however there are a few flaws to the game. For instance, it is a turn off when a person promises to purchase and they give a date and time then they never show up! Its It's frustrating, and a waste of time I wish that LETGO could implement some kind of consequence for the people that stand people doing things

This is a platform that works and is built well. However the app still has many bugs. They're mostly annoying, some are a little inconvenient. None of them inhibit use of the platform though. They've got a ways to go, and are founded on solid ground. Personalized recommended searches must be based on nothing, because I get recommendations for electronics but all I search for a bit are clothes. Notifications to my phone duplicate themselves, lag, and are sometimes broken.

comments: To much detail showing, and looking for more youth styles.
I have ordered from this website I have gotten my items at a decent time I hope when I order again that it's the same. Still waiting on one more item!!

Horrible. All Items I ordered from this website were cheap and looked nothing like the pictures. One of the dresses I bought was held together by a pin needle. If you want to buy perfect fitting and perfect clothes I suggest just downloading the Fashion Nova app. Don't waste your time here.

My wife bought a dress with this app. When the dress arrived it looked different than it did in the app (photos), so we printed the return label from the app and returned it. After they received the package the told us they couldn't find it and wanted us to send them the weight of the item, tracking number, photos of the package and proof of shipping payment. Since we could provide some of these items, they told us they couldn't give us a refund so they keep the returned dress and our money.
App crashes everytime and will have to uninstall and install multiple times

To enter Birthday you have to scroll through a calender. That's 56 years for me. What a pain, cant you just make it where we can type it in instead of scrolling?

This is 🚫🧢 a bad app like DONT GET THIS bc it glitches all the time, every time I get on this app I have to keep signing in and thats aggravating and every time I search sum up it says sum like I can't find what u r looking for so no just don't get this app 🙄🙄
I love this app. It's a very good/great/AMAZING app. Very good prices and more. I love the bags theri so cute. Keep doing what your doing👍

title: Nike
description:
Your Own Personal Nike Shop
• Shopping – The best Nike products selected just for you, with free shipping on every order.
• Member Profile – Easily track your activity, orders and purchase history, and enjoy receipt-free returns.

NikePlus Unlocks
• Reserved for You - Shoes we think you'll want, set aside for you on launch day. 
• Exclusive Shop – Products designed and created  exclusively for members within the Nike App. Innovations, collaborations and upgraded materials. 
• Nike Experts - Available on-demand to NikePlus Members. A team of Nike Experts to help you track down or recommend the perfect product from sport to style. 

Expert Advice from the World’s Greatest Athletes, Personal Trainers, and Coaches
• News Feed – A customized feed with content tailored to your interests, delivered daily by Nike athletes and experts. 
• Training & Coaching – Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches and personal trainers. 
• Daily Recommendations – The gear and apparel you need for your favorite sports, activities and more. 

Special Events
• Nike Events – Reserve spots at the best events Nike has to offer, from New York to Los Angeles.

Check the Latest Trends
• Seasonal Gear – Go shopping for this season’s must have looks with access to gear in your size.
• New Style Trends – Discover new ways to wear your favorite Nike products with the world’s top stylists.
• Nike Editors – See what products the editors recommend and this week’s top picks for shoes and clothing.

No matter which sports you follow, we've got you covered:
• Running
• Basketball
• Lifestyle

comments: It works but there's no option for dark mode, which would be great. When checking out, it isn't clear on how you can opt to pay for 2 day shipping. You must edit your shipping address in order to choose the two day option for shipping. They offer a military discount, but it can't be used with other promotions. Your competitor allows this. In order to get the code for the military discount, you have to use your desktop and upload documents to SheerID and wait for an email with a single use code.

The app is good. However, there is a glitch when checking out to pay. When i paid at checkout, the app kept giving me an error message and try again. I tried twice and i kept getting the error message. So i decided to check my acoount and appears that 2 two tranactions were made. I had to call and cancel one of the orders. Please fix. At this time, the same item is in checkout like i never bought them. Please adjust the app. Thank you

biggest issue is the slow loading times for pictures, search results and everything else. This app also takes a lot of energy. The positive is they have a good selection in stock. Hundreds of items. They just need to make this app run faster so I can find what I want before I give up from waiting

This app is amazing. I totally think that people should get this app, that is if u are a nike person. Yes shopping in store is a little better I think. But if u dont have a store near you, its perfect. Because you dont have to travel all that way if you are a home person. If you like shopping in store and they dont have the product you need, I guarantee they will have it on this app. If not they will update you when they have the item you want.

Very easy app to navigate. I actually have ordered several pairs of shoes through the app and I have yet to have any issues with purchasing. Every time is always quick and easy. Also love the fact that I get little promotions every now and then😊

title: T.J.Maxx
description:
Thanks for downloading the T.J.Maxx App. You can shop amazing styles & savings anywhere, anytime!

Discover two new exciting ways to shop:
• Use the maxx lens to search in a snap. See something you like? Take a photo in store (or out & about) & shop similar styles right here.
• Explore my maxx matches by selecting the styles you love & we’ll create a personal shop just for you.

Plus, fresh enhancements to familiar features:
• Use the store locator to  nd our family of stores near you.
• Upload your e-gift cards and Rewards Certi cates to your account.
• Manage your TJX Rewards Credit Card account on-the-go.
• Register for the T.J.Maxx App to create a mobile account (you can use your HomeGoods App account here as well).

comments: It's never been a great apo. Someone else used the word "glitchy". Good one. Now since the latest "update to improve our experience", the app won't even load when you click "shop" at the bottom. It Freezes on a blank screen. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I wonder if anybody from TJM reads these reviews .......

Not user friendly at all. Very confusing and unorganized. Wish it was easier to access card information and rewards without being redirected. App has a lot of work to do to compete with other store apps.
Last couple of times I have tried to use the app, it isn'tworking and when it has worked it is very slow.

I have reset my password 2 times and it still won't let me in my account it keeps saying password or email is wrong but i enter my email to reset the password and it sends the link to reset it but when i try to log in it just will not let me.
Your app does not load. I've tried several times, even uninstalled and reinstalled.

title: Fashion Nova
description:
Fashion Nova is the fastest-growing social media & e-commerce platform in the world, growing bigger every day! We are dedicated to curating the hottest and newest trends for both for women and men. Hundreds of new styles are added on a daily basis because we want to make sure you have everything you need to express your authentic self. The Fashion Nova app is here to make your shopping experience as convenient and enjoyable as possible. 

Babes, make sure to tag @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, and #NovaBabe so we can see you in Fashion Nova and interact with your posts on Instagram & Twitter. You always have a chance to be reposted! 

Gentlemen, your time has come, FashionNovaMEN is here! Tag @FashionNovaMEN and #FashionNovaMEN to show how well you rock our new line. Show the ladies how it’s done!

Follow us for outfit inspo, gorgeous photos, hilarious memes, and behind-the-scenes exclusives.

comments: I love the clothes. I just have a couple reccomendations for the app fixers: 1. The review section for each product needs to have picture options. And what size each girl ordered and what height she is. So that I can understand the bigger picture. 2. The app keeps crashing and closing. Work on that please. 3. The shipping to Israel is very expensive. Thats a little downer...
Love the new app update, buying clothes every time payday comes now.
Love the fact that I can shop online and see the different deals going on. Everything is online which I love. You can also track your order on the app. 10/10
I downloaded app EVERY time I get to check out I fill out all the info and it redirects me to a blank page ‼️😡 This has happened 4x about to uninstall app...very frustrating
Everytime it closes at random and refuses to save any favorites so forget going back through to decide what I wanted to buy.

title: Wanelo Shopping
description:
Wanelo (from Want, Need, Love) is the best way to shop on your phone. Millions of people use it to find and buy products they love.

1. Every day, Wanelo will show you new amazing products just for you. As you save products you like, Wanelo learns about your style. The more you use it, the better it gets!

2. Use the app to browse and search across all of your stores in one place! From tiny boutiques to all the big brands you know and love, you can keep all of your shopping organized on one place.

All products on Wanelo are posted by users. Products include fashion, clothes and accessories for women, men, and kids, as well as home decor and furniture. Find the best dress, shoes or gadgets. Create a universal wishlist with products from stores around the world!

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I used this app pretty frequently but very recently the app started acting like what the other reviews here are saying.. can't view products.. nothing is loading.. can't see the customer reviews anymore. Need to fix this asap! I want to purchase more items but don't feel comfortable to do so until these problems are fixed. Being able to view customer reviews and comments are the main reason why most of us will purchase something. I've tried reinstalling and signing in and out of my account.

This app is so cool. Unfortunately I've had it saved everything I liked and now it's not showing the reviews, comments or pictures of other people that have ordered the same item. This helped me know how the item looked like in real life. It's been doing it for a year now. I just uninstalled the app and install the app but it's still doing it!!! Please fix this issue. It's sad I haven't ordered nothing and wont until I see the comments and pictures of people that have ordered these items

I use to love the app but I haven't been able to see the stuff I've saved or any reviews on any of the products I've tried looking at also all related items don't load. I've uninstalled the app and reinstalled it twice and still nothing. Ive read some of your replies to do an update but there is no update. So I'm not sure what to do.

I love this app, unfortunately it has been crashing lately, the search engine kicks you out and doesn't let you search for anything. Every few minutes the website kicks you out as well. I read other reviews that have been having the same issues and it says to upgrade the version, however I deleted and re-installed the app and it keeps doing the same thing.

When I can use the app it seems to be pretty decent... I mean it could be... but it kicks me off alot so it's very frustrating. I couldnt tell you what the checkout looks like bc I dont make it that far without getting the boot. I wish I could give it a 0 star rating, honestly a ( - ) star rating would be more fitting. Hopefully you fix the bs!

title: Zulily: A new store every day
description:
Shop Zulily for amazing savings on big brands you love and boutique brands you haven’t met yet. 

This is fun shopping at its finest. Each day, we deliver a new store chock-full of unique finds you never knew you needed, plus essentials for the people and places in your life: trendy clothes and shoes for kids and adults, home décor, beauty products and so much more. Best of all? You’ll enjoy up to 70% off prices every day. If you don’t mind waiting a little longer for shipping, you can really save a bundle!


New sales begin at 6am PT every morning and typically last three days, so when you see something fabulous, you’ve gotta get it before it’s gone! Whether you’re leveling up your health game or reorganizing that junk drawer (hey – everybody’s got one), we’re here to help you get on track. We reinvent our store daily, so you always have an opportunity to find what you’re after – and cool, unexpected items too. Get the app so you don’t miss out.

Here are just a few great things you’ll find every day:

On-trend women’s apparel for every season: tunics, casual dresses, tanks and tees, work dresses, kimonos, denim, sweaters, cardigans, coats and jackets, activewear, jewelry, scarves, hats, European fashions, bras and intimates, loungewear, athleisure, designer glasses and sunglasses, handbags

Shoes for every outfit: boots and booties, wedges and pumps, flats, leather loafers, fashion sandals, stylish sneakers, running shoes, walking shoes, orthopedic footwear, rain boots, snow boots, western boots, clogs, men’s work boots, men’s dress shoes and men’s sneakers

Home and office essentials: quilts, bedding, bathroom textiles and towels, sheets, pillows, kitchenware, cookbooks, storage and organization, dishes and mugs, pots and pans, kitchen appliances, home décor and entertaining essentials, pet beds and toys, indoor and outdoor furniture, DIY and craft supplies, gift wrap, party supplies, stationery, office organization, planners, food, snacks and drinks

Everything kids and babies need: Graphic tees and jeans, hoodies and jackets, activewear, pajamas, dresswear, coats, boots, sandals, sneakers, hats and scarves, rain gear, toys and games, books and school supplies, outdoor toys, puzzles, car seats, car seat covers, babyproofing gear, cloth diapers, feeding supplies, bedding, bedroom décor and playroom furniture

Beauty and wellness products: luxury skincare, makeup, designer cosmetics and fragrance, lotions and soaps, salon-quality haircare and nail polish, aromatherapy, essential oils, workout gear and yoga mats, healthy snacks and vitamins and supplements

Maternity essentials: maternity bottoms, nursing bras, maternity dresses, convertible tops, nursing covers and sleepwear

An important privacy note: Signing in signals your agreement with zulily’s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Practices.

https://www.zulily.com/terms-conditions
https://www.zulily.com/privacy-practices

Bug fixes.

Keep submitting feedback about our app — we're always listening! Happy shopping.

-Zulily
comments: I was going crazy throwing things in my cart about to spend a few hundred.... then it gave me issues checking out. Every time I enter payment information nothing happens... wasn't able to submit my order. Tried the whole process again a few more times but with no success. This was gonna be my first time shopping on this app, after a few hours of surfing through I pretty much wasted my time!!! Maybe I'll check back later but as for now you left me no choice but to uninstall :(
Cant use this app due to embedded ads. Get knocked off of website every time i try to scroll through, so im sick of trying to use it. Most ridiculous frustrating thing ive ever seen on a website/app.

I have bought alot from this app !I dont like the shipping Policys pay to ship + return ? Shipping should be free returns damaged refund policy blocking pics beware return shipping not $8.95 I payed $17.95 on two packages then then they blocked me from sending them Gmail's about overcharge blocked free shipping on mutli orders till 11:59 changed time ordered ? Block Gmail's calls are just as bad saying I didn't call soon enough I contact on delivery ! Make sure items + size are correct !
Just continuously says, "we've hit a small snag." Used to be a great app ... Not sure what the new update did but it screwed everything up.

The app was very user friendly until the new update. It's impossible to browse, now you just have to scroll through hundreds of items. Loved the way it use to be. Edit: just downloaded the new update and it is still impossible to navigate the app. Please put the search options back the way it was last year where you could search by groups, not where hundreds of items are together. It's too time consuming and impossible to navigate. I get so frustrated with the search options I give up!

title: Poshmark - Buy & Sell Fashion
description:
Poshmark is the leading marketplace to buy and sell fashion.

***Shop over 5,000 brands in every size—including plus size, petites and juniors— at up to 70% off retail
***Sell and turn your closet into cash. List your items for free!

40-70% OFF EVERYTHING
Find discounts on trendy fashion, shoes, beauty, jewelry, watches, accessories, handbags, mens fashion, kids fashion, or anything on your wish list! 

FAST SHIPPING
All Poshmark orders are shipped using expedited USPS Priority Mail. Once your seller ships, your order will be delivered in 1-3 business days. 

Shop, sell, party.

SHOP
Whatever you’re shopping for, Poshmark’s got it—for much less than at discount clothing retailers and outlet malls. With over a million dollars worth of new and gently used merchandise added to the marketplace daily, you'll find amazing fashion and beauty products from today's hottest brands, like Nike, Adidas, Lululemon Athletica, Michael Kors, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Christian Louboutin, Coach, Kate Spade, Tory Burch, Express, Anthropologie, Free People, Birkenstock, Converse, Vans, Supreme, and more! 

STYLE
Need ideas for what to wear to your next date or that upcoming wedding? Do you hate getting dressed in the morning? Poshmark has millions of of outfit ideas for you. Shop the personal style and closets of other Poshers today!

SELL
Do you have items in your closet that didn’t work out? Maybe a designer handbag, statement shoes, or even your old wedding dress you wore once and won’t ever wear again? Poshmark is the #1 online consignment solution to to sell your unwanted clothing and buy new things you love, providing an alternative to consignment stores that only offer pennies on the dollar. 1 in 50 American women have their closets open for sale on Poshmark—you could be next!

PARTY
Party on the go, no matter where you are! Join the thousands of women who come together every day to participate in our themed virtual Posh Parties. You can browse, buy, and even list with your friends. With a wide variety of themes and brands, there's a Posh Party for everyone!

FASHION & BEAUTY
Women’s Fashion: athleisure, swimwear, dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, sweaters, shoes, sandals, heels, plus size, maternity   
Men’s Fashion: jackets, sweaters, shirts, button-ups, workout wear, dri-fit, tech fleece, hoodies, joggers 
Kids’ Fashion: shirts, bottoms, shoes, socks, baby clothes, toddler and youth sizes
Accessories: purses, handbags, belts, jewelry, watches, travel bags, backpacks, hats, sunglasses, wallets 
Beauty: lipstick, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, concealer, blush, highlighter, eyeliner, bb cream, cc cream, powder 
Shoes: sandals, sneakers, heels, boots, mules, wedges, ankle boots, espadrilles, flats

Don’t waste another precious moment with other discount fashion retailers or consignment solutions. Poshmark will change the way you shop for clothing and fashion. Try us out today!

recentChanges:
What's New
- Bug fixes and other updates
comments: Great app, been using since 2012-ish, and they have made major & minor tweaks along the way, but most recently I've found it difficult to physically create new listings, even with the help of Posh tech support; they definitely raised shipping prices, you can't make an offer to likers without also choosing to pay 1 of 2 shipping costs, so you can't make offer on items +/=$6 or it results in negative payment; & lastly, charging buyers tax on items I'd already paid taxes on in the past. Double dip.

I love this app. Genius!!! Everyone on this site seem to be a higher caliber than other sites. My questions about items are always promptly answered, the items are in great shape. The coolest thing is being able to find things from your past (example: Vision streetwear clothing). or discontinued colors for fav make up items. Literally bought my wedding dress on poshmark. Awesome site. Great app!

I love this app. But unfortunately I messed up and I inadvertently deleted it by mistake when trying to delete an unused app. I realized what I did, and reloaded the app. Now I lost my likes in my profile area even though other things are kept and the teck is screwing with me. It won' let me do anything. I can't comment, ask questions or reach out to anyone. I have a credit with Posh, and everything. Help I'm having major problems, and I wanted to buy something too? Now what do I do?

Need better sales reports to include transfers. App has been sharing extremely slower than normal lately. For days, if not weeks now! Can you please add a sort feature for shared last and oldest listings? It would help when there are these issues with sharing. Would make sharing and updating older inventory a whole lot easier and less daunting for larger closets when you have to scroll all the way to bottom over and over. Also, adding photos all at once would be nice as in other apps. Thanks!

App works perfectly for buying and selling, no issues there. However, when asked to go through reported items & review them, after I make and select a decision, and it moves on to the next reported item, the app still shows the previous reported item and its info, but the bottom part changes. The only way to get to the next reported item is to back completely out back to notifications screen, otherwise it will continue to only show that first reported item.

title: eBay Online Shopping - Buy and sell on the go
description:
Buy and sell with the eBay app! Shop deals - or list items you want to sell - in just a few seconds, straight from your phone. From home and garden to tech, fashion, and more, get the best deals every time with eBay.

Don’t miss our incredible discounts! Browse huge savings and snap up amazing deals on tech, fashion, home and more!

Buy and sell securely with your favourite shopping app. Browse millions of listings and find clothes, trading cards, certified refurbished tech, cars, watches, on-trend sneakers or stylish furniture for your home. Come on in and take a look!

Buy and sell on the go - 5 reasons you’ll love the eBay app:
→ Save money with shopping deals at your fingertips
→ Clothes, sneakers, tech, and furniture: Do all your shopping online
→ Buy top brands in electronics, tech and phones
→ Sell items with ease: Simply scan the barcode & list
→ Used cars & parts: Buy and sell safely & securely

FASHION & ACCESSORIES
• Shop for the freshest trends in women’s, men’s and kid’s fashion
• Discover shopping savings on clothes, fitness wear, shoes, watches & accessories

SELL IN SECONDS - MAKE MONEY ON THE GO
• Clothes, sneakers, cars, watches, tech - you can sell almost anything with eBay
• Get your listing online in under a minute!

TECH and ELECTRONICS
• Save money on top brands like Sony or Samsung
• Buy your next TV, laptop or mobile phone in just a few steps

HOME & GARDEN
• Save money on garden furniture, home decor and kitchen appliances
• Shop for DIY tools & supplies for your garden

SPORTS & FITNESS
• Browse fitness equipment & tools for any sports type & any fitness level
• Buy the latest shoes, running gear & more from leading sports brands

USED CARS & AUTO PARTS
• Sell your used car or auto parts in just a few steps
• Shop for vehicles, car parts, accessories & more

Take the eBay marketplace with you wherever you are. Discover shopping deals and savings, shop the best brands at amazing prices or bid on an auction on the go - just download to your phone or mobile device now!

KEEP IN TOUCH
Your feedback & suggestions are really important to us. Get in touch on Twitter @askebay or
https://www.ebay.com/android
descriptionHTML:
Buy and sell with the eBay app! Shop deals - or list items you want to sell - in just a few seconds, straight from your phone. From home and garden to tech, fashion, and more, get the best deals every time with eBay.

Don’t miss our incredible discounts! Browse huge savings and snap up amazing deals on tech, fashion, home and more!

Buy and sell securely with your favourite shopping app. Browse millions of listings and find clothes, trading cards, certified refurbished tech, cars, watches, on-trend sneakers or stylish furniture for your home. Come on in and take a look!

Buy and sell on the go - 5 reasons you’ll love the eBay app:
→ Save money with shopping deals at your fingertips
→ Clothes, sneakers, tech, and furniture: Do all your shopping online
→ Buy top brands in electronics, tech and phones
→ Sell items with ease: Simply scan the barcode & list
→ Used cars & parts: Buy and sell safely & securely

FASHION & ACCESSORIES
• Shop for the freshest trends in women’s, men’s and kid’s fashion
• Discover shopping savings on clothes, fitness wear, shoes, watches & accessories

SELL IN SECONDS - MAKE MONEY ON THE GO
• Clothes, sneakers, cars, watches, tech - you can sell almost anything with eBay
• Get your listing online in under a minute!

TECH and ELECTRONICS
• Save money on top brands like Sony or Samsung
• Buy your next TV, laptop or mobile phone in just a few steps

HOME & GARDEN
• Save money on garden furniture, home decor and kitchen appliances
• Shop for DIY tools & supplies for your garden

SPORTS & FITNESS
• Browse fitness equipment & tools for any sports type & any fitness level
• Buy the latest shoes, running gear & more from leading sports brands

USED CARS & AUTO PARTS
• Sell your used car or auto parts in just a few steps
• Shop for vehicles, car parts, accessories & more

Take the eBay marketplace with you wherever you are. Discover shopping deals and savings, shop the best brands at amazing prices or bid on an auction on the go - just download to your phone or mobile device now!

KEEP IN TOUCH
Your feedback & suggestions are really important to us. Get in touch on Twitter @askebay or
https://www.ebay.com/android
summary: Buy and sell, wherever you are. Get shopping deals on home, fashion, tech & more
recentChanges:
• You can now save 200 searches and 200 sellers
• Automatic photo cleanup when listing
• Fixed an issue which could cause the app to not appear in the recent app list
• Fixed an issue which could cause a crash when uploading photos
• Other bug fixes and performance improvements

Please continue to report issues and leave feedback at www.ebay.com/android or @askebay on twitter.
comments: Needs work. I'm giving the eBay app three stars because basically it does what it should, although it does need quite a bit more tweaking to function better. Unfortunately the issues that I have experienced relate to the everyday functionality of it. It is very glitchy and does need seemingly constant babysitting to ensure that it is doing everything you want it to and that it is not just deciding to do certain things for you. Use with caution.

I downloaded to buy a few things that I saw. I am ultimately unimpressed. Whereas I was excited to buy things from people (who accept my card type) and such, but 90% checking out I would get an alert saying "could not process payment, change card or try pay pal". Sometimes it would process the payment, but only one or two items instead of all 10. I just don't understand, the buyers accept my card type, I have the money, I just don't have the patience for all of this. Please fix this

I just installed the last update and it did nothing to correct the small text! I can barely read my messages and the entire app text is very small!!! Still sucks!!! I also don't like the new tracking screen! I used to be able to click on the tracing number and it would take me to the carriers website and with a simple click I could receive shipping updates on my orders! You people screwed that up too! Please put that back the way it was! REMEMBER FOLKS: "IF IT ISN'T BROKE, DON'T FIX IT!!!"

The messaging system is glitchy! I can't communicate with sellers as the send arrow only appears about 1/4 the time. It also has trouble loading the messages received so I can read them. Sometimes I have to click back out of the message and then back into it a few times before it decides to load.

Not any better than the previous one, jumping all over the place when doing searches, you request to search by lowest price first and it still hides them between the higher priced items, so taking ages and time consuming to find things I want at affordable prices. I also hate the assumption in every search that there are things I do not want to see in each subject, I want to see all items available not have only the ones chosen by someone else who knows nothing about what I may be looking for?

title: Shop Disney
description:
The shopDisney app is the destination for the largest selection of authentic and exclusive Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars products. Discover, experience, and shop - whenever you want and wherever you are. 
 
- The most extensive assortment of exclusive Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars products available. Anywhere.
- Explore a curated selection of the best products from Disney store, licensing partners, global collections and collaborations, and Disney Parks and Resorts.
- Shop authentic Limited Editions.
- Easily locate your nearest Disney store.
- Use the in-app scanner to access additional product information while visiting a Disney store.

Note:  Some features in this app will require your full name, country, birthdate and email address, as well as access to your location data.  To facilitate the sign-in process, the app will also require access to your email address, stored within your Disney Account. 
  
This app includes the ability to make purchases and will require a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier data connection.  Guests must be 18 years or older to make purchases. 
  
This app provides you with the option to receive push notifications, which may include information about products and offers.  This app also provides you with the option to enable location services, which will enable certain features, provide you with information and offers, and improve guest experience.  This app will request access to your camera to scan product barcodes and credit cards for purchases.
  
This app is only available in the U.S. 
 
Terms of Use:  https://disneytermsofuse.com 
Privacy Policy:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/
Your California Privacy Rights: https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi/

recentChanges: With this release, we are introducing Save For Later functionality to help make shopping even easier. We are also updating our Guest Services capabilities and fixing bugs to optimize performance.
comments: Horrible app. It constantly shuts down or can't get an internet connection. You can't use any discount and the is nothing to buy anyway. Everything says "in store only". What's the point? If I were in Disney I wouldn't need the app to shop. If I could give less than one star I would.

Disappointed to say the least. Constantly freezes, crashes, wont log into my account, loads so slowly might as well be on dial up. I love all things Disney, however, this app is just plain aweful. It makes no sense that they cant have a functioning app? It's Disney!

I miss the Shop Parks app. It would tell me if an item was located at the park and where. It would also apply my discount upon login. This app barely works. It won't even let me log in. So many missed opportunities from frustration. Please go back to original app.

This app takes forever and a day to load if it ever does load. It constantly logs me out and again takes forever to load for me to log back in. It's not an enjoyable shopping experience at all through this app.

Pretty annoying that the app closes out of everything when you try to reset your password. Everytime I would check my email and go back into the Shop Disney app, it would make me start all over again. Very frustrating.

title: Nordstrom: Shopping, Clothing, Shoes & Handbags
description:
Nordstrom is a leading fashion specialty retailer, offering customers one of the most extensive selections of clothing, designer boutiques, shoes and accessories. Plus, get free shipping and free returns. All the time.

With the Nordstrom app, you get current trends, latest essentials and more. All from the comfort of wherever you and your phone might be!

•	See what's in stock at your favorite store right in the app.
•	Need it today? Just buy from the app and pick up your order in store.
•	Shop your personalized app homepage and see recommendations just for you.
•	Get notifications about our biggest promotions. Never miss out!
descriptionHTML:
Nordstrom is a leading fashion specialty retailer, offering customers one of the most extensive selections of clothing, designer boutiques, shoes and accessories. Plus, get free shipping and free returns. All the time.

With the Nordstrom app, you get current trends, latest essentials and more. All from the comfort of wherever you and your phone might be!

• See what's in stock at your favorite store right in the app.

summary: Shop Nordstrom on the go! Free shipping, free returns, all the time.
recentChanges:
• Various bug fixes and improvements, making the app even faster.

See something we missed? Let us know at android@nordstrom.com.
comments: When switching away from your app and returning to it, it reverts back to the main screen, which is incredibly frustrating. Also when sharing to other apps, like wishlist apps, it doesn't pass the name of the item or any images to it. Try having your app developers share an item to the Wish Explorer app and you'll see what I mean. Your app needs to "play nice" with other Android apps, like the Amazon app does, in order to impress me and earn a higher rating or better review.

Wonky! Won't add your Nordstrom Notes, or at least let you see/view them to add the information in. Does not have a stand-by online help operator to guide you through if you're having issues/questions with the website. Having to arrow back a million times to get to your shopping cart and wishlist - those should be visible on every page! Overlapping of products if you arrow back on some pages.

Just awful interface when you actially go to checkout. Items will disappear, samples will be in your cart one minute and then gone the next. Had to re-enter my shipping address even though it's already saved in my address book. Shipping option was stuck on express shipping and wouldn't let me click on free standard. Overall this was a horrible experience and it made me give up on making an order all together!

Difficult to send things to various addresses for gifts. You have to be certain to double and triple check that your item doesn't go to the last address used. I've had three items get sent to the wrong place. They try in customer service to correct it when you use the chat feature, but the ap launches the order directly to the vendor, and if you do not get the address correctly the first time, which is difficult to do, because there is no review toggle, you're doomed.

Easy to use and purchase from app. I wish it had a better filter and sort option like the website does. Also, viewing items ordered from your account inconvienently switches between app and web browser not a very seamless experience.

title: Hot Topic
description:
Can't get enough of Hot Topic? Bring Hot Topic around in your pocket with the new Hot Topic App! Hot Topic is your destination for music and pop culture-inspired clothes and accessories, plus fashion apparel for girls and guys. Looking for t-shirts and merch from the bands you love? We have 'em. Need a pair of jeans to go with that t-shirt? We got you covered. How about Funko figures from your favorite characters? We have those, too. Be inspired every day with the Hot Topic App.

Exclusive App Features Include:
o   Browse and shop on the go for accessories and clothes from Hot Topic
o   Check out our newest and hottest clothing in an instant
o   Show off your favorite TV, movie and band merch through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more
o   Find the closest Hot Topic store for the latest music-inspired clothing quickly
o   Take advantage of the latest promotions, deals and discounts
o   Follow your order status with just a few taps

We'd love to hear from you! Email your feedback about our app or any questions to appsupport@hottopic.com.

comments: Can't even create an account. When I tried to sign up, once I checked the signed up in store tab, the app continued to tell me "password is a required field". However there is only fields for your number, email, and zip code. I tried just signing up but because my email is already registered in the store itself it won't allow me to make an account.

I love this app!! My delivery to the Westminster mall was a little confusing but I got help from one of the workers and it was really easy. It only took 2 weeks to get my package. This app is so much easier than going into the store

I Downloaded the Hot Topic app and cannot login no matter what I do, or how many times I reinstall the App.....I'm only able to log on from my Computer....I called in and spoke to someone from Customer service and I was told they haven't had any problems logging in from the app on their phone. I told her that I have an Android phone, and she said maybe that's why since she uses an iPhone...So I'll just go online through my Computer instead.

The app is good overall but the Wishlist won't show anything I've added to it and when I try to add something to the list, and heart gets filled and then unfilled. It also shows items that cannot be placed in my cart.

I had it before and it worked really well. But now I'm trying to sign in and it keeps saying to "try again" IVE DONE IT 6 TIMES! resetting my password and my email. Even tried to make a new account dosn't work. So if you can PLEASE fix that it would be greatly appreciated.

title: Mercari: The Selling App
description:
NOT USING IT? SELL IT. SHIP IT. GET PAID.

This is Mercari. The fast and easy way to sell (or buy) almost anything. Fashion to toys. Sporting goods to electronics. All the brands you know and love. Got stuff you don’t use, never used or simply outgrew? Sell it.

SELLING IS FAST & EASY.
* List in minutes. Just take a few photos, add a description and set your price.
* Listings are free. Flat 10% selling fee only charged when your sale completes.

NO MEETUPS
* All items ship.
* Printable shipping label emailed to you when your item sells. Just print and ship.

UP TO 70% OFF. ALL THE BRANDS YOU LOVE.
* Great stuff. New and used.
* Over 150,000 items for women, men, kids and home added each day.
* Free shipping on millions of items.

WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK.
* Money Back Guarantee. Receive your item as described. Or your money back.
* 24 hour customer support.

recentChanges: Bugs were squashed and performance was improved. Keep the feedback coming—we're listening and working on your suggestions.
comments: Love this app. Shopping and selling items are easy. Only negative I've experienced is that They are overly aggressive on monitoring every aspect of communication between the seller and buyer, so just keep that in mind. Also when you first start off selling, be aware that you must figure out your exact shipping costs before you price an item. I offered to sell a baby doll bed for $10 and was told by USPS that it would cost $99 to ship to the other side of country due to the dimensions of the box.

I really like Mercari for selling stuff! It's easy to use. I've sold two things so far, but my issue is that my listings dont show up when I go to my profile and click the Selling tab on the app... It's annoying because I get the "Action Required" notification but it takes me to a page where it says I have no listing and no in-progress sales. I have to go on my computer to look at my listings. I really hope this gets fixed.

Love this app. I have a lot of makeup and clothes I'm not going to use so this app is awesome for selling those kind of things and everything really! I've sold all sorts of items. Never had an issue with receiving my funds. In my experience mercari has been great with handling any issues I've had as a buyer and seller. Love the changes they've made to the app but there still are some things that could improve.

3/21/20 Update: The app, on any device, will not load my messages and this has been going on for almost 2 months. I've been using the app for 3 years now, and it is kind of ridiculous that my messages won't load on any device. I am an IT specialist, and have gone through every known protocol. Have reinstalled numerous times, reset and tried diff connections (data/wifi/etc), and reset device settings. Seems as of you are intentionally disallowing my messages to be opened. Please resolve this.

Great as a buyer, ok as a seller. Mercari tries to get you to price things as low as possible. They also automatically have a feature turned on that lowers the price with views. So your item will Bottom out fast. So as a buyer you are getting awesome deals but it's not as great as a seller. Also the $2 fee to cash out is a bit ridiculous in this day and age. I already paid a fee on what I was paid for the item and now I have to pay again to have MY money.

title: Cute - Beauty Shopping
description: Get trending makeup and beauty products at 50-90% OFF retail. Cute is the number one app in Europe and North America to get the best deals on cosmetics, fragrances, skincare, haircare and other beauty accessories. We go directly to the manufacturers to get you the best deals on the most popular products.
descriptionHTML: Get trending makeup and beauty products at 50-90% OFF retail. Cute is the number one app in Europe and North America to get the best deals on cosmetics, fragrances, skincare, haircare and other beauty accessories. We go directly to the manufacturers to get you the best deals on the most popular products.
summary: Trending makeup and beauty products at 50-90% OFF retail.
recentChanges: New features and improvements.
comments: I am in the process of ordering a bunch of things...dresses, purses ... & etc.. So far everything is going great---except for 1 thing---I could spend hours upon hours on this app. spending tons of money. The prices are exceptional for the materials & such being of such high quality!!!

I love cute! I will shop here at this app alot- they have alot of GREAT products/ merchandise, to choose from and GREAT- GREAT Prices. Shipping could be a little better- but all-in-all averages out to most shipping chgs. Thanks for your store! Love it!!!! 😍

Seems like a good app. Amazingly cheap prices on makeup, good selection on products that are hard to find elsewhere. No glitches so far and also fast shipping option which is better than waiting 2 months for your stuff
When I wanted to look at shirts for women, it kept bringing up stuff to help you get muscles for guys or inappropriate clothing in my taste but everything else is good

So far, so good! The app runs fine on my S9. I had no difficulty in checking out. I didn't read instructions on choosing my gift. I tapped on the product picture (not the "claim" button, and it went to my cart. I was expecting details on a discreet little massager. I removed it from my cart and went looking, but didn't ever see the welcome gifts again. Otherwise, my first shopping experience with C👄ute, was splendid! I'll be back!

title: DHgate - online wholesale stores
description:
The DHgate shopping app allows free access to the DHgate wholesale marketplace on the go – connecting you directly to wholesale sellers and getting you cheap prices.

The DHgate app provides one-stop solution for your online purchasing, from international logistics and payment, to internet finance and customer services. DHgate app features over a million Chinese wholesalers, 40 million products for sale and has amassed 10 million buyers from 230 countries and regions.

We provide cost effective all-in-one solution for your business. We enable anyone to buy and sell products in wholesale price globally by providing secure payment services, logistics solutions, escrow protection services, and internet financing.

With a variety of over 20 million products in categories ranging from electronics to wedding dresses and from cosmetics to furniture – you’ll never miss what you’re looking for. Simply tell the app whether you’re buying for wholesale or personal use, choose your favorite categories and receive personalized discounts and recommendations.

DHgate Shopping APP Features:
• Secure, organized and reliable mobile platform.
• Shop directly from sellers and enjoy lower-than-retail prices.
• Check daily deals to find new discount products every day.
• Make purchases individually or in bulk (for additional discounts).
• Filter and customize to find the perfect product.
• Get smart product recommendations based on preferences and browsing history.
• Read customer reviews for insight on any product.
• Pay using innovative and easy payment options.
• Ship using worldwide delivery on most products.
• Scan QR codes to jump straight to a product’s page.
• Shop at the $1.99 store for the best discounts.
• Join the VIP club to receive exclusive benefits including 24/7 customer support and more.
• Redeem seasonal promotions for coupons on all your favorite seasonal items.

Whether you’re an entrepreneur making a bottom line or just a savvy consumer looking for the best deals, the DHgate app offers the value you need at the prices you want.

Quick Facts for DHgate Shopping APP
• Approximately 1.2 million sellers globally
• 10 million enterprise and individual buyers from over 230 countries and regions 
• 33 million wholesale and retail product listingsA transaction every 3 seconds
• Multilingual Sales: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish


Download DHgate app and discover the best prices on clothes, electronics, shoes and more!"

recentChanges: 1. Bug fixed.
comments: It's very hard to quickly find what you're looking for much of the time, sometime its very easy! Be careful how you write an items description, it can make all the difference. Dont have a problem with an item - THE HELP FROM DHGate IS TERRIBLE!! Never ordered an item that didn't turn up, so all good. The quality of garments that have arrived is brilliant

I'd give it 5 stars but the app is glitchy. Its frustrating when you find something interesting and then the screen goes blank and jumps back to the previous or home page. If that's the bug that was suppose to be fix, it's not fixed. Please fix this and earn 5 stars. Update 1/22/2020..app is worse. Dhgate is great but the app is frustrating. UPDATE 2/18/2020 App is fixed and running smooth. I'm a happy shopper!

Overall, this app is great. I really like the ability to search for "similar" items. Communication is excellent. I always know the status of my orders. There is one thing that drives me nuts. The app hoses-up on my android smart phone as I try to leave a review of any purchase. Not one review entry has been successful using my phone. This never happens when I use my desktop pc.

If the app did not crash every few minutes ot would great. And the search engine could be better. But other than that it is pretty good. It would also be nice if the mainpage would show in your default currency. Mine shows U.S. until I place it in my in basket. Okay resolved the currency issue but now it keeps giving me an error about a newer version 4.9.9. So where is this version? Please fix your software. Just updated to 5.0.2... things seem much better. The app has not crashed on me yet.

It's a decent app. It finally stopped crashing all the time, but it still has a couple issues. You really can't track your orders & when you try it's either in Chinese or it just says it's been processed and shipped, nothing further than that. I've tried using the tracking number they provide & have never been able to get them to work either. Also they keep sending me notifications and I click on them to try to answer the question they're asking and it doesn't give you an option. Aggravating😡!!

title: Best Buy
description:
Everything Best Buy, on the go. Find stores, deals, reviews and the lowest prices on the hottest tech.

See all the hottest deals.
Check out the Deal of the Day, our current Top Deals, special sale events and Best Buy Outlet finds, all in the app.  

Easy access to your My Best Buy® account.
Make updates to your account, check your rewards status, pay your credit card bill and more.

Ratings and 5-star reviews.
Find out what people are saying about a product before you buy. 

Identify the perfect TV for your space.
Use the app to test out which TV size fits your space with our new augmented reality (AR) feature. 

Keep us in the loop.
Use the app to let our Blue Shirts know when you’re on your way to pick up your order. And we’ll have it ready when you arrive. 

Account Services
Take advantage of up-to-the minute Geek Squad coverage information, repair order statuses and upcoming appointment reminders.

Scan while you shop.
Scan QR or bar codes to get product details and compare features while you shop.

Find your store.
Get store hours, locations and services. Or, browse products available near you.

Check out with Best Buy Pay.
Enjoy the easiest, most rewarding way to pay at Best Buy, exclusively for My Best Buy® Cardmembers.

Take advantage of up-to-the minute Geek Squad coverage information, repair order statuses and upcoming appointment reminders.

Scan while you shop.
Scan QR or bar codes to get product details and compare features while you shop.

Find your store.
Get store hours, locations and services. Or, browse products available near you.

Check out with Best Buy Pay.
Enjoy the easiest, most rewarding way to pay at Best Buy, exclusively for My Best Buy® Cardmembers.
summary: Learn, shop and save, all in one place.
recentChanges: This release includes bug fixes and other enhancements that improve app performance and experience. Thank you for choosing Best Buy!
comments: Pretty much unusable for me due to very frequent crashing. Installed on Samsung Note 5 running Android 7, with every other app and system component updated within last 2 days. Very few of the apps I've ever installed, including ones no longer on my phone, have crashed this much. Back to using when site.

Thank you so much for the update. That seems to fix my check out issue. However, customer service over the phone was a whole different ball game. They gave me the unlimited run around, transferring me to all different "department". I was extremely disappointed in best buy customer service. I didnt expect that. That was my last time i will ever call period.

It crashes in the background! Sometimes it crashes even when it's not even launched. I know some apps work in the background and this does too, but it crashes? Then Android says send feedback, that I've done several times to no avail. Fix the crashing in background.

Why in the WORLD do I have to enter my card number, account info, security questions, and then change my password EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. I try to log in to pay my credit card. Its absolutely ridiculous. I can see others are having this issue and nothing is being done. Frustrating.
Kept on having issues staying on the app, kept on sending me to the sign in page. Had to log in so many times it locked my account. Ended up using Google app to make my purchase.

title: Family Dollar
description:
Our App makes it even easier to save at Family Dollar, with quick access to deals and Smart Coupons, sneak peeks at new offers, and our new SmartSpins game. 

Download the Family Dollar App for the easiest way to save:
 
• Enjoy instant access to Smart Coupons
• Play SmartSpins, our new game, to win Smart Coupons. Every spin wins!
• Browse the weekly ad anytime, anywhere
• Scan products to find offers
• Easily find the nearest Family Dollar
 
Best of all, you’ll earn a spin to play SmartSpins every time you shop when you scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Every spin wins a Smart Coupon! To redeem Smart Coupons, simply scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Easy to use, easy to save, easy to win!

For feedback or technical issues please visit: 
https://www.familydollar.com/corporate/our-company/contactus

The Family Dollar app is the easiest way to get great savings and coupons for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. Get sneak peeks at our circular to find our best sales, bargains, and deals on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts and toys when you’re planning a shopping trip to your neighborhood Family Dollar store. With our digital coupon app, you have instant access to savings, and no need to go online to look for offers. Plus, you can play our app game, SmartSpins, to win Smart Coupons. Clip Smart Coupons right in the app for the greatest deals. You can also scan products to check for Smart Coupons discounts, then clip the coupons to save, and redeem at checkout next time you go shopping. That way, you won’t miss any of our great offers on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. We know that our shoppers need good deals and easy ways to find bargains that stretch every dollar. With the Family Dollar digital coupon app, we offer convenient access to easy-to-use Smart Coupons, with savings that fit your budget. You can find and clip Smart Coupons for all your favorite brands. And you’ll win savings with SmartSpins, our app game. Whether you’re shopping for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts or toys, Family Dollar is your store for great sales, bargains and savings on everything you need, with low prices that fit in your budget. Smart shoppers know they can find great bargains, savings and sales at Family Dollar. We understand that you have a tight budget, that you are shopping for deals and bargains, so we offer the savings and discounts you appreciate. Now, with our digital coupon app, it’s even easier for you to save, with instant access to coupons and discounts, plus our new app game where you can win savings every time you play. No need for paper coupons anymore: with the app, you clip digital Smart Coupons and redeem right at the register using just your app barcode or phone number. You’ll get deals and coupons tailored the way you shop. And we make it easy to clip, easy to use, easy to save on your favorite top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, and toys.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: You know what would be great? If the app stopped logging me out every 3 days. You know what else would be fantastic? If I could get rid of coupons that I KNOW FOR A FACT that I don't need. You make it easy to clip stuff that I don't even want. Now make it easy to delete it. And why does this app even NEED a password??? Because someone may steal my coupons??? Oh nooooo. Now you're just acting like over glorified CVS or Rite Aid or somewhere that actually has full shelves.

App worked great until my phone broke.. I had to reinstall on another phone.. Don't EVER forget your password. It's impossible to do a password reset I have a bunch of saved coupons and spins.. Family Dollar won't let me reset my password. The link in the password reset email just goes to the main page. The "contact us" link on the password reset email is a broken link as well. I tried calling the 800 number but apparently the line is only open "bankers hours". Closed before I leave for work . Already closed when I come home from work. Not open on weekends either. When I do take time off to call, I can't get a hold of a real person.. Just a voicemail system with a mountain of options, but no option of "app help". I left messages but no response. I spend a lot of money at Family Dollar since they are the only store within 15 miles from me. If I can't get coupons, I'll just buy my stuff from Amazon..

What a POS. I just tried to sign up and it has so many bugs just trying to key in a password that I'm am deleting it already. No sooner did I try to log in, it told me to change my password. When I sent for the code, it auto filled the code then sent me to the page to key in the new password....only there was no space to create one. I tried 3 times and it just sits there waiting for me to key something in with no space to do so. I'm beyond frustrated.

The app is horrible and almost as crappy as the products they carry. Don't bother downloading this app. Nobody at the stores know anything about it or why it doesn't work. You will spend your time clipping coupons only to find out at the cash register that you didn't fulfill the requirements that were buried 3 screens deep when you clipped it. A HUGE WASTE OF TIME.
Its ok, but only if ur looking for specific items. Wouldnt let me use the 'list' function on the app, the scanner wasnt that great either!

title: JCPenney
description:
Find the best online shopping deals, rewards and coupons on your phone - it’s easy! Find exclusive discounts and shop women's clothes, shoes, home and much more with JCPenney.

So whether you’re searching for discounts on women's clothes, housewares or even a gift card for someone special, at JCPenney you’re guaranteed to find offers you want, at prices you love. This is online shopping made easy!

Deals on clothes, fun rewards and more! 
5 ways JCPenney will help you find the products you love for less!

1. Online shopping deals - browse discounts on women's clothes, shoes, bedding & more.
2. Rewards & offers - You can use our FREE rewards program via the app.
3. Coupons - Save coupons to your wallet and use in-app or in-store.
4. Gift card - Got a JCPenney gift card? Apply it to your purchase in just a few steps.
5. Shop & Collect - Buy items in the app and pick them up the same day from a nearby store.

SHOP & SAVE
Don’t miss out on our amazing shopping deals! Save coupons to your wallet and use the coupons when shopping in-app or show the barcodes to any JCPenney associate to apply them to your order. Easy!

ONLINE SHOPPING
Our Price Check feature lets you scan barcodes in store to learn more. You can also use our Snap to Shop feature to take a picture of your favorite items and we’ll find similar products that you can shop instantly via the app.

GIFT CARD, REWARDS & OFFERS
Not only are your coupons and offers just a swipe or tap away but now you can also save them to your wallet! Manage your gift card or access offers straight from your phone.

CLOTHES, SHOES & MORE
Find all the women's clothes, shoes, makeup, and housewares you want easily with our modern design. You can even buy products directly in the app and then pick them up in store.

HOME, FURNITURE & BEDDING
Shop home decór, beautiful bedding and stunning furniture right here, at JCPenney. Whether you’re looking for new statement furniture or want to redecorate your home, you can find the perfect accessories in home, furniture and bedding. 

Want to stay up to date with the hottest deals? Don’t worry, we’ve got you! Opt-in to be one of the first customers to get notified via push notifications or the in-app inbox of the latest promotions, discounts, offers, and shopping events going on at JCPenney. From clothes to jewelry to home goods we’ll make sure you don’t miss discounts and deals!

JCPenney Credit Card
Managing your JCPenney credit card is now easier than ever with our app! Now you can easily view your balance, pay your bill, and see offers just for JCPenney credit cardholders.

We love feedback! Love the JCPenney App? Please consider leaving us a 5-star rating! Questions or comments? Please use the App Feedback section in the app. We’d love to hear about your experience.

Download the JCPenney app today to get the latest offers on clothes, makeup, home goods, and more!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

recentChanges:
We are testing changes to our app navigation. See if you are lucky one to experience the new layout.

Changed your mind? Want to cancel an order? Now you can do so (time bound) from the order details page.

Now displaying final price with coupon on bundled goods on product details page to give more clarity on what entire bundle may cost compared to individual items.

Can’t find the product in the gallery? See if the product recommendations in the end gets you excited?
comments: App is next to useless! Can't bring up an item I clicked on in an add, just takes me to where I would open the app, but doesn't bring up the item I clicked on. No wonder Penney's going broke. Can't stay up with amazon if you don't hire programmers who know what to do and how to structure links that take you to the item that drew your interest. Dumb, de dumb dumb.

I just downloaded the app. a little while ago. So far this is 1 of the best app's that I have ever seen. It is so easy to use and that is exactly what I need. I love being able to see what you have in the store before coming because I can't walk in stores but for a short time. I believe that I have a new bestfriend. Thanks JCPENNEY. 🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂

JCPenney was okay till u get ur billed in the mailbox . It was okay for a while now it harder to pay it through cause u see things you wanna get and have to pay on it again and again till the payment is throught. I be almost done for paying off my card gor for good for a while i get another JCPenney card again. Its okay to have it 😊 just be careful how much you spend some time it's harder to pay it off . I had it for one year now I know I will have good credit 😊 now I did enjoy my card Jcp
Worthless app!! Doesnt show the sale price on items, when you scan the ticket,just the ticket price. I do know how to read, I don't need an app that just shows the same thing as the ticket.
WORST mobile app PERIOD. Laptop/desktop app is okay. It WORKS at least. I've reported ALL tech issues MULTIPLE times over 3 yrs. NO changes or fixes. Just got an update & installed. Hope it helps.

BUYING:
• Millions of items nearby. Cars, electronics, household items and much more.

• Garage sales.

SELLING:

FREE STUFF:

comments: I've got the pro free version you stuff. I know Craigslist pro. Dating app and neither one of them will display my messages. But I keep getting notifications that I'm getting messages from other daters. It won't display my likes. Only displays notifications He won't even display the messages I've sent. There's obviously some bugs in this apps.

I can't figure out how to narrow my search to the city that I have selected. The app keeps showing me items from everywhere. Can't figure out how to do a 10 mile radius. I'm thinking this app may be junk.

everything on this site is soooooo overly priced that it will literally make you bust out laughing. yes, some of the items are very nice and there are A LOT of nice antiques and vintage items BUT THE PRICES ARE DOWNRIGHT UNREASONABLE AND IT'S WHAT I CALL ROBBERY. IT'S INSANE. YOU WILL BE ALLOWING SOMEONE TO RIP YOU OFF IF YOU BUY SOMETHING FROM SOMEONE SELLING THEIR STUFF ON THIS SITE. I'M NOT KIDDING. ROBBERY. IF YOU WANT TO THROW YOUR MONEY AWAY I'M SURE THERE ARE BETTER WAYS TO DO SO...
Easy to use! Great app. Really good stuff to find on this website.
useful alternative to finding local ads. App isn't as current as the website though. Usually a few days behind.

title: Adore Me – Designer Lingerie
description:
Oh, hey there! Looking for the latest lingerie or just reeeally want that new comfy pair
of PJs? You’ve come to the right place.

No matter what mood you’re in, we’ve got you covered all year long in matching bra & panty sets, lingerie, sleepwear, swimwear, activewear, maternity & nursing essentials, mastectomy bras & SO much more…

More importantly, we’re proud to support women of all body types through carefully
crafted, high-quality designs that everyone can fit in—and at prices everyone can afford.
With styles made to fit women of all shapes and sizes, we’re here to celebrate every
body’s natural beauty and inner confidence. No matter who you are, who you dream of
being, or what you’re doing in our clothes, you can trust us to be right by your side.

Take a look at what’s inside…

BROWSE SEAMLESSLY
With hundreds of styles to choose from, you’ll probably want one of everything!
Discover bras in sizes 30A–46G, intimates in XS–4X, and more, right at your fingertips.
Plus, add your faves to your wishlist.

SHOP ‘TIL YOU DROP
We drop brand-new collections every month (!), and as a VIP member, you can score
your faves for even less.

EXCLUSIVE ACCESS
Get sneak peeks at new collections on the go + shop app-only sales!

FREE SHIPPING
Always! No matter what and when you order, we’re committed to making
shopping—and shipping—easier for you.

GET NOTIFIED
We’ll send you push notifications about fresh arrivals, more sales & more.

CHAT WITH US!
Need help? We’re here for you. Give us a call or email us through the app!

LET’S GET SOCIAL!

http://facebook.com/adoremeofficial
http://instagram.com/adoreme
http://twitter.com/adoreme
http://pinterest.com/adoremeofficial
http://youtube.com/user/AdoreMeTV

recentChanges:
What’s New

Psst: Our app just got a brand-new look! Check it out: new logo, new app experience & fresh updates for easier shopping. Enjoy!
comments: Push notifications won't stop. I have changed the settings on the app, but they still keep coming. I had to contact there customer service 2 times to get the emails to stop coming. Do not use the app or give them your email. They will constantly bother you push notifications an emails.

I was thinking about canceling this subscription. The first time I ordered a simple robe, it's nice. The second time, ordered lingerie and a bra pack. I am amazed at the quality. Some of the best I now have. The app has made shopping extremely easy, almost too easy, lol.

I was a skeptic until I recieved my first order, the comfort, the reactions well worth every bit! The app is super easy to use and gives you access to more for you than any other place I have seen! I'm currently awaiting my first for my fiance and very excited!

The only thing that I don't like is even if I start shopping right away on the say the new months styles are dropped.....more often them not you're she doesn't have a full selection of my sizes in bras or in matching panty.
I opted out of all notifications but yet I still receive occasional notifications and several emails (daily). Please fix this.

title: Chewy - Where Pet Lovers Shop
description:
Chewy just made shopping for your pet easier. Swipe, slide and tap your way through 1000+ brands of your favorite pet food and supplies. Shop your favorites, manage your Autoship, track your order status, easily get access to our 24/7 pet experts, plus so much more. It’s everything you love about Chewy.com, now in a convenient app.

CHEWY.COM
• An easier, more convenient way to shop for your pet, online and on your smartphone
• More than 1000 top brands of pet food and supplies
• FREE 1–2 day shipping on orders over $49
• Prices you’ll love on your favorite pet food and supplies
• Friendly, knowledgeable customer service team available 24/7

AUTOSHIP
• Get pet food and supplies automatically shipped to your door
• Change or update your order anytime
• Easily change how often orders ship and cancel anytime
• Save an extra 5% on every shipment of select brands
• Sign up today and get additional savings off your first Autoship order
