summary: Chewy - Where Pet Lovers Shop
recentChanges:
- Fleas, ticks, bugs -- no thanks. We comb through the app on the regular to check for snags in performance and keep things running smoothly!
- Got feedback? Give us a bark, meow or chirp! We'd love to hear it at app-feedback@chewy.com.
comments: I've used Chewy for years now and I've never had a bad experience. I use Chewy for food, prescriptions, toys, treats, literally everything for my cats and dogs. I've had to call or email a few times with questions and they were always helpful and nice. Every year they send birthday and holiday cards. They even mailed me a portrait of my dog! I love them so much.

I love how easy this is to use. Also the amount you have to spend to get free shipping is very easy to hit. The auto ship is another great feature and the fact that you can postpone a shipment or request it sooner makes it very easy to use and adjust to your and your pets schedule.

The app is just as good as the company absolutely amazing, the app is very easy to use and navigate me and my dad never had any issues aside from one time two damaged products came in and the issue was resolved as fast as reported and we were given free replacements I highly suggest this app to any pet owner as it's faster, cheaper and easier then driving out to the stores to search for one specific product along with discovering new ones all in all 10/10 do recommend <3

I love this app so much! It's so easy for me to order things for my fubabies especially since I'm always at work. Not only do they offer 2 day shipping they have great customers service! They wrote to my dog daisy a handwritten letter before her passing. Amazing app, and amazing customer care! 10/10 would recommend!

I have always loved the convenience of Chewy, now more than ever. I got all my shopping done, and didn't have to endure the corona-craziness. I would like to see more coupons in general from the site, you get lured in with the 30% off and then you're lucky if you get 10% off after. I dont want to spend $50 to get free shipping every time so a better percentage off would absolutely encourage me to shop with Chewy more than three times a year (my average # of orders right now).

title: QVC Mobile Shopping (US)
description:
* The minimum version supported by QVC is v5.x and above for optimal usage.

MORE NEW FEATURES
• PayPal and PayPal Express payment methods.
• Predictive Search recognizes popular brands and keywords to help you get to your favorites faster. 
• Template-Driven Pages offer a sort and refine feature so users can filter results.
• Pinch & zoom on the product detail page to get a closer look at details.
• Voice Search—just tap on the microphone in the search bar and say the keyword or item number you’re looking for. You can even speak to launch Live TV, Program Guide, Item On Air, Items Recently On Air, and My Account.
• Persistent Login—added based on customer feedback! If you are signed in once, your sign-in credentials will be carried over to other screens within the app.
• Items in your cart are now accessible across all QVC platforms (iOS, Android, and QVC.com).
• For “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” rights under California law please refer to the Right to Opt-Out of Sales section of the QVC Privacy Policy.

EXISTING FEATURES
• Watch our full 16:9 HD live stream and purchase the current Item On Air.
• See customer ratings & reviews on our product detail pages and product listings. Plus on our enhanced product detail pages, view product images, information, sizing, color swatches, availability, and delivery date estimates.
• Find exactly what you're looking for with our full-search capability—search over 50,000 items by category, item number, product description, brand, phrase, or word. From there, you have the ability to narrow those search results.
• Easily navigate our enhanced homepage. Find our Today's Special Value® offer, One Day Only Price™ offers, and current Item On Air, plus Items Recently On Air and featured promotions.
• Narrow Items Recently On Air by show.
• Share items via Facebook or Twitter. Email an item to your friend or to yourself as a reminder to view later.
• Speed Buy® to purchase items quickly and confidently! New customers can easily create an account—anytime, anywhere. Our app can save your email address for faster future purchases.
• Get unlimited access to over 500 recipes from David Venable, host of QVC’s most-popular show, In the Kitchen with David®. Plus, watch recipe how-to videos; view backstage photos; and shop kitchen & food innovations.
QVC wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows you to send back the merchandise within 30 days of the date you received the package for an exchange or a refund of the purchase price, minus the full shipping & handling and Q Return Label fees. QVC will refund any paid S&H fees and Q Return Label fees if an item is defective or we were in error. Purchases from QVC and the use of QVC services are subject to our General Terms and Conditions of Use and our Privacy Policy, which can be found at the bottom of the QVC.com homepage.
Award-winning Service: We've been honored multiple times with BizRate's "Circle of Excellence" distinction. We've also received Shopping.com's "Trusted Store" Seal, a prestigious vote of customer confidence awarded to online merchants.
QVC is committed to giving you quality service and treating your information responsibly. For details, please see our Privacy Statement.
QVC is VeriSign Secured, so you can feel confident while shopping with us. We participate in the VeriSign Secured Seal Program. All of your personal information is encrypted by Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) software when it's transmitted to us during the checkout process, just as it is on QVC.com. Also, your QVC PIN is never stored on your device.
Watching QVC's video stream may significantly increase the data usage amount of your mobile device and may incur additional fees. Contact your carrier for more information.
Android is a trademark of Google, Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

summary: QVC for Android™
recentChanges:
We’ve been hard at work on some enhancements to bring you the best mobile shopping experience possible.
In addition to some bug fixes, we’ve integrated the design across our website and apps for a more consistent experience across all our online platforms.
Loving what you find? Or have some improvements to suggest?. Please share your thoughts so we can continue to improve your performance.
comments: I have had nothing but problems with this app. I used to be so fast and easy, but now it won't even accept my long time password. I have missed out on ordering items, because it doesn't recognize it's me. I have shopped here for 30+ years. Come on already!. Don't you know how frustrating this is!!?? I have uninstalled app, changed password and still have problems with this app. It is now Feb 29, 2020 and NOTHING IS FIXED. IT STILL HAS GLITCHES OF NOT BEING ABLE TO SIGN IN
App is terrible. Grinds and grinds w no results. I can log on my computer and complete actions and the app will still be spinning. Horrible.

Hate that use arrow back button to return. That is right at speed order button! Have accidently had things ordered because of this. Also why do i need to keep signing in when still on the app. frustrating! When use go back to shopping from cart it doesnt go back to where u were goes to main page. So if looking at something from "as is" that i looked up & going thru those items. And add something to cart it goes back to main page instead of where i was in list. What a pain! I quite looking!

I have shopped QVC thru ebates. Rakuten for years!! Was the easiest thing ever. Now I can't get it to work. Hubby is a Computer Engineer and has tried everything. Nothing works. I mean come on Rakuten get rid of this update and make it useable again!!! Geez they only do 1%. Disgusting.
The app won't let me log in. I changed the password and tried uninstalling and reinstalling and nothing! This is not the first time it happens to me. The Hsn app is better than this app.

title: Tophatter: Fun Deals, Shopping Offers & Savings
description:
Searching for auctions on fashion items, gadgets, or even a camera, or shopping for hourly deals? Searching for auctions or shopping for hourly deals on fashion items, gadgets or even a camera? With Tophatter, finding savings and gifts couldn’t be easier! Auctions and fixed deals on Tophatter are the best way to find fun offers, discover savings, or buy items at a fixed price. It’s bargain hunting made easy. 

Shopping for discounts, finding deals and fixed price offers, or bidding on online auctions is fast and exciting with Tophatter. Looking for fun shopping discounts or an auction? Or do you love bargain hunting for the latest fashion or fun gadgets? There are thousands of fun offers and savings waiting for you! 

Find savings & shopping discounts on fixed deals - it’s never been so easy! Win big on a camera offer or save on electronic gadgets! Or, scroll through an array of shopping deals and fixed priced offers. Plus, if you’re looking for fun offers on gifts for a loved one or simply gifts for yourself, shop fun fixed price offers in an instant! 

Discover savings on gadgets for yourself or a camera for a loved one. When it comes to fixed priced offers and shopping deals - the sky’s the limit! Check hourly deals and daily exciting auctions for chances to win big on one of a kind gifts. 

5 Ways to Win Big Shopping Discounts with Tophatter

1. Bargain hunting is fast and fun! Hourly deals start at $1, bids are free - you only pay when you win an auction.

Find an auction for everything - from gadgets to accessories like rings and necklaces! Plus, Tophatter has fixed price offers, hourly deals, and other discounts on products to suit any budget. 

Tophatter puts the fun and excitement back into online shopping and finding fixed priced offers. Win big with the latest hourly offers, discounts, and fixed deals at your fingertips! It only takes one click to discover fixed priced offers and exclusive auctions. Explore fun shopping deals that are guaranteed to add a spark of joy to your day. comments: Great app. Great concept. Just wish there was a search option without having to buy something first so I don't have to wade through things I have no interest in.

I love this app, and I understand the point is to outbid people, but I find it hard to take items from other's. I have found that if you set reminders the app will let you know when you can bid again. If you miss the bidding opportunity, they usually offer you the item at a base amount. That amount is usually less than what you would have bid, so for that reason if something is going twice I try not to take items from other's. My time always comes around. Common courtesy goes a long way. JS

Fun and exciting app, unfortunately most everything (ALL) comes from CHINA. I found even if it says USA it ships from overseas 😥. I also found the app locks till you pay for item won so you can't bid on anything else. App is slow to show details of item, also what you see in the picture is not always what you get so read the details first. Clothes are Chinese sizes so if your a size 16 /18 Us that's a 5x large or xxxxxL becareful on this site.

Fun (free to bid) Pay if you win Auction Site. New stuff daily. Auctions start every 90 seconds. all kinds of items from electronics, jewelry, home and hobby, premium, fashion and beauty. Lots of surprise items. You won't be sorry you checked it out. UPDATE 2/26/20 it's a 50/50 chance of getting exactly what was pictured, described, and expected. Most items are on eBay. All items have multiples. While fun, 90 sec is not enough time to read full desc & bid. Buy it now $ are 2 High. C eBay

I am so, so, waaaaaay to app!!!!! Sometimes you have to wait a bit for the shipping time cuz a lot of stuff comes from. I have bought about 12 rings or so and a tennis bracelet as well and they are all so gorgeous!! I have told my family and all my friends about this app and to use it because you really can get great deals from here. They are easy to refund your money if you are not satisfied or change your mind. so be careful when you download and start bidding cuz you will get addicted quick

title: TILLYS
description:
Need some new threads, but can’t make your way to your computer? The new Tillys app puts Tillys.com right in your back pocket. You’ll be able to shop the great selection of clothes, backpacks, shoes, and accessories just about anywhere. The best part about it… no lines!

Creating an account and logging in is super easy. Once you log in, you’ll be able to store your info, payment methods, and gift cards for super quick one-page checkouts. You’ll not only be plugged into a great shopping experience, but will also be able to stack up those Rewards points, check out our running contests, and check out any events that are happening around you.

Features:
•	Discover trending fashions, new products and featured categories on one page.
•	Find everything you need with enhanced search and simple navigation.
•	Easy one-page checkouts (No one likes putting in those credit card numbers every single time).
•	Access all your account information (cart, payment options, wish list, gift cards) all in one place.
•	Check if we carry what you want in a store near you.

recentChanges: We've updated the Tilly's App to include a link to the Tilly's Rewards Account section.
comments: No coupons? If no coupons this app is as useless as the website. I guess I'll have to buy my $150.00 item elsewhere. Can't checkout online bc the site won't let me. I scroll to the bottom of the checkout page, the minute I stop it takes me right back to the top. So stupid. Whatever I'll find a different better site, the item is the same price no matter where I get it. Was trying to give a smaller store my money, guess not.

I love shopping at tillys, it has great clothes and great offers and of course you will want to shop online at some point instead of driving over there, you can use this app but my only complaint is that the app is pretty slow.
The app makes you log in everytime you go on. And the interface is basically no different than the website. No sale notifcations. Its not any more convenient than the Tillys website. Pointless app.

I dunno, man. You would think they would spend the money to have a more seamless app. Why do I have to sign back in *every* time I open it? The menus are super clunky and almost all of the pictures of items don't let you zoom in to see a design up close. Tilly's... hire some better designers.

glitchy. never put the items in the cart that I picked out the first time. and when I finally had the right items I wanted in the cart and proceeded to checkout, it didnt accept my purchase and continued to malfunction. I've been trying to order these 5 things for a whole week with no progress. please, fix this app.

comments: Wow, at first I was sceptical of purchasing from this app but I can atest it's the best online app I've used soo far, very very pocket friendly, very and I mean very fast shipping, and the products are just classy, I couldn't believe it and I still don't believe I got such wonderful items at an affordable price. Thankyou very much

Makes shopping on ur phone a lot easier and faster. Also you can get points which = $$$ by checking in on app. Reviews of products are helpful. Mostly shein brand that I've noticed but also cheaper than what's on the shein app. Can't get much cheaper than this. They ship straight from China and usually really fast.

Just wish they had new choices it seems like i see the same thing every time i go on the app. The clothes are starting to look more old lady like. Wish they had more of a younger feel not all people like the 80's and 90's look.

I love the clothes, lots of options and styles. Although last week I ordered clothing and it has said processing ever since. My worry starting growing bigger, but im still having hope that it will come soon because my friends had recommended me this app. Additional, they took off two of the clothing that I had ordered because they don't have them in stockwhen they said they did and they said that they refunded but I didn't see it on my card. I hope this app doesn't disappoint me.

I love how many varieties of items that are in stock; it really feels like a vortex of great things. When putting in account the prices of stores now a days, this app has great clothes ,and they're super affordable

title: Jet - Shopping Made Easier
description:
Jet makes shopping for home, fashion, beauty and more easier than ever with 2-day delivery on thousands of items and no membership fee. In the NYC area? Enjoy groceries delivered same or next day to select zip codes.

SHOPPING LIST
From vitamins to sneakers, our Shopping List feature lets you create a list of what you need and shop it all in a single tap.

EASY REORDER
Restocking your favorites from your previous orders is as easy as a few taps.

ORDER TRACKING
We’ll keep you updated on your order’s whereabouts, so you’ll know when it ships and when it’s been delivered.

FREE RETURNS
We keep it easy — if you’re not happy with an item, just send it back within 30 days.

1.HOME DECOR
From furniture and glassware to bedding and rugs, you’ll find the things you need to turn your house into a home, no matter your style. Deck out your kitchen with top-of-the-line tools and equipment from brands like KitchenAid, Nespresso, Staub, and J.A. Henckels.

2.TOP FASHION BRANDS
Get the latest styles in kids’, women’s, and men’s fashion, and enjoy the ease of trying on your favorite clothes and shoes from adidas, Puma, Bonobos, Modcloth, Birkenstock, Doc Martens, and more, in the comfort of your own home.

3.BEAUTY ESSENTIALS
We’ve got the names that help you look your best, including Clarisonic, BeautyBlender, NYX, essie, Rituals, Art of Shaving, Foreo, and Baxter of California, all in one place.

4.THE LATEST TECH
Stay up to date and shop the latest names in electronics from Beats by Dr. Dre, Samsung, Bose, Nintendo, and more.

5.PANTRY
Make sure your pantry stays stocked with your favorite ingredients, snacks, and beverages. Jet makes it easy to find the right food — and see the nutritional facts and ingredients — for your specific diet, from organic energy bars to vegan snacks and gluten-free pasta.

6.HOUSEHOLD SUPPLIES
Make sure you never run out of your household staples. Whether you need pet supplies, baby essentials, laundry and cleaning products, or other must-haves for your home, we’ve got you covered with the brands you love.

7.NYC GROCERY DELIVERY
If you live in New York City, you know the struggle of lugging your heavy groceries home. Skip that hassle and get them delivered with your new favorite shopping app! With Jet, your groceries are hand-picked and hand-delivered to your door, so your fresh produce stays fresh and your frozen foods stay frozen, guaranteed. Our delivery zone covers many NYC zip codes.

8.DEALS
With Jet, you can save money with great prices and deals across everything from fashion and electronics to home, toys, and beauty.

FAST CHECKOUT WITH GOOGLE PAY
We’re big fans of keeping things as simple and fast as possible, and Google Pay is about as simple and fast as it gets.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Through phone, email, or in-app chat, our US-based customer support team is ready to help.


LEGAL
Same/next day delivery is subject to availability and zip code restrictions. Fresh and frozen groceries only available in select zips in and around NYC. Cutoff times and other restrictions apply. Delivery fees may apply. If any fresh or frozen items in your order don’t meet your expectations, please contact us within 30 days for a refund.

2-day shipping available on eligible items only. Orders must be placed by 2 pm in the time zone to which your order is being shipped.

Returns must be initiated within 30 days of receiving items.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information
Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.
https://jet.com/privacy-policy

With Jet, your groceries are hand-picked and hand-delivered to your door, so your fresh produce stays fresh and your frozen foods stay frozen, guaranteed. Our delivery zone covers many NYC zip codes.

8.DEALS
With Jet, you can save money with great prices and deals across everything from fashion and electronics to home, toys, and beauty.

FAST CHECKOUT WITH GOOGLE PAY
We’re big fans of keeping things as simple and fast as possible, and Google Pay is about as simple and fast as it gets.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Through phone, email, or in-app chat, our US-based customer support team is ready to help.


LEGAL
Same/next day delivery is subject to availability and zip code restrictions. Fresh and frozen groceries only available in select zips in and around NYC. Cutoff times and other restrictions apply. Delivery fees may apply. If any fresh or frozen items in your order don’t meet your expectations, please contact us within 30 days for a refund.

2-day shipping available on eligible items only. Orders must be placed by 2 pm in the time zone to which your order is being shipped.

Returns must be initiated within 30 days of receiving items.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information
Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.
https://jet.com/privacy-policy
summary: Get your favorites delivered
recentChanges:
In this update, we made some improvements and bug fixes to give you an even smoother shopping experience. Got any feedback or cool ideas you'd like to share? Our ears are open — drop us a note at feedback@jet.com!

This version contains new features to allow customers to exercise their rights under the CCPA starting 1/1/2020.
comments: I love it! Update....shopped @ several stores today, and online for toilet paper in the midst of the C-Virus scare, and Jet was the only one to have it in stock and ready to ship. Thank you Jet!

Was a great place to find good priced products and even gave you money off for buying more of the same item, but guess what, Walmart went and bought Jet and just like their stores, everything is getting more and more expensive. At least you can actually find stuff here unlike my store in Derry, N.H.,the shelves are always empty. Go to Amazon to find better prices. Sam Walton must be rolling in his grave after what his greedy offspring have done to his company.

What happened to the prices on this app? This is significantly more expensive than just buying from a brick & mortar store. The prices were never as good as, say Boxed, but they weren't stupid high before.
Excellent customer service and love every purchased made on the App.. customer since 2017.
Easy to use. Great selection and wonderful staff.

title: Tiny Shop: Idle Fantasy Shop Simulator
description:
YOU are a brand new member of the trading guild just stepping into this fantasy world. Personalize and design your own store, attract customers and sell magical and epic goods!

Trade, negotiate, buy and sell fantasy items and products from all over the world in this RPG simulation game and learn to manage your store to become the city’s best tycoon!

Build, design and personalize your very own fantasy shop with dozen of options! Making your store as outstanding as it can be will increase customers satisfaction and profit! Fortune await! 

With the help of your cute little assistant, discover a RPG world crafted with love. Meet mages and knights and send your hero on epic adventure! Earn money without doing anything as your assistant will sell your items for you while you are idle! Just fill your warehouse to the brim with goods and items and let the cash flow!

Complete quests and missions for the trading guild and your customers and become the most beloved and reliable shopkeeper in town!

In this fantasy shop adventure you will:

👑 TRADE and DISCOVER dozens of different item and products to sell
🖌 CREATE and CUSTOMIZE your tiny shop to improve your sales!
📜 COMPLETE MISSIONS and QUESTS to help your city become prosperous
💰 EARN MONEY being IDLE!
🎀 ENJOY CUTE and CHARMING hand painted visuals
🏖 HAVE A GOOD and RELAXING time

Tiny Shop is a RPG store simulation game that will let you customize your own shop within a fantasy world. You can trade and sell, armor, potions, magic books, all kind of gear and equipment as well as crafting materials such as plants and gems. With your hard earned money you can expand and personalize your shop to become the most prosperous shopkeeper in town!

Install Tiny Shop for free NOW! Trade, buy, sell, quest and customize in this fantasy RPG game!

title: Zappos: Shoes, clothes, boots, coats, & more!
description:
Zappos makes shopping easier! Shop all the top brands and latest trends of shoes, clothing, accessories & more!

Zappos.com offers an unrivaled selection of shoes, clothing, bags, accessories & more, along with FREE next-day delivery* and FREE returns, making shopping from your computer or smart device that much easier!

Looking for some sweet-new kicks? Zappos has you(r feet) covered!
Boots & flats from Birkenstock, Clarks, Sorel & more.
Sneakers from Nike, Brooks, Vans & many more.
Heels & pumps from Sam Edelman, UGG, Steve Madden & yup! Much, much more.

Seasons change, along with the trends. Stay ahead of the fashion game with exclusive brands, available at your fingertips!

Find the perfect fit! On-trend women's, men's, and kid's styles from the latest & best, clothing & footwear brands.

Fashion-forward clothing, high-performance apparel, outerwear, bags, accessories & more, all on the Zappos app!

Bad at or skeptical about making decisions online? Don't stress!

Shop with confidence on the Zappos app!
High-resolution images and videos.
Save your searches so you can mull it over and quickly pick-up where you left off!
Share your favorite styles and trends on social media
And as always, FREE & easy returns.
World-class customer service, from the Zappos Customer Loyalty Team, available by phone call (24 hours a day / 365 days a year), text, live chat, and e-mail.

*Free Next Business Day shipping when and where possible

comments: App was laggy. It forced me to close out and restart multiple times in order to simply empty my car, then again multiple times to pay for my item. Fop wouldn't store until the 4th time, signing in with Amazon as an option was problematic. I did eventually get things done but it was frustrating to say the least.

I bought me a couple pair pants on this app. I thought this app is easy to use, but I wish they had more clothing brand name. Such as Echo, Polo, and etc. When I was creating/signing up for an account, it will give you an option to ether use your Amazon account. As your login for your Zappos account little FYI. I didn't go that route, I usually like to keep all my accounts separate. Even though it would have been faster

I have not had an easy time with this app. Maybe it's an age thing (this geezer has a struggle with some tech stuff), but it just seems hard to control. Things happen and I don't understand why, and I end up at the beginning screen and have to start over again. Sigh. I think I'll go back to using the website.

I think the app is very excellent but could be amazing if the brand name alphabetical list was on here like it is on the desktop version. I do like to check out other brands I'm unfamiliar with especially those that cater to men clothing.

Can't check out cause it won't let me put in my shipping address. Also can't print return label because it downloads on my phone as a .gif. Why? There's just too many steps to take to make this app or a return to work. No thanks

title: Etsy: Handmade & Vintage Goods
description:
Shop millions of one-of-a-kind items and find the perfect thing for you. With the Etsy app, you can easily explore our global marketplace of handmade, vintage, and creative goods. It features curated collections of inspiring gifts for him or her, unique wedding ideas, and handmade jewelry. And personalized recommendations for stylish jewelry, art, clothing, and furniture will also help you find exactly what you need (or really, really want). Join our 29+ million members around the world and get something that’s truly special. 
 
The whole world of Etsy is in the app:
- Save items and shops as favorites to revisit them later
- Get notified the minute an order ships
- Talk directly to shop owners to get all of your questions answered
- Explore curated recommendations tailored to your taste
- Check out swiftly and securely using our full suite of payment options, including Android Pay
- Discover upcoming events and nearby stores featuring Etsy sellers
- Now available in English, German, French, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, and Japanese

If you have an Etsy shop, our free Sell on Etsy app has all of the tools you need to manage your shop: process orders, add listings, view your shop stats and more.

Visit our support page: http://www.etsy.com/help/ 
Report problems with the app: https://www.etsy.com/teams/7720/bugs/discuss/ 
Get site status updates: http://etsystatus.com/ 

About Etsy
Etsy is a marketplace where people around the world connect to make, sell and buy unique goods. Our mission is to reimagine commerce in ways that build a more fulfilling and lasting world.

comments: Possibly add an advanced search that assists when not knowing an exact title. IE: "dish to place jewelry in". If I can't think of the word trinket dish (or if I have a word finding neuro deficit - "What's that thing called again") it populates irrelevant>relevant results if it is not specific. Potentially also provide an option to search either all of etsy, OR just my saved favorites. Better searches=better sales. Truly help us find our thing.

You can 'favorite' stuff and 'add to cart', however when I try to pull up my recent purchases for reviews, or just to see, i keep getting the "uh oh girl" ("something must have gone wrong, try again")... yeah...Nooo...removing this app from my phone will be a great thing. BTW, this happens during both data AND wifi usage, and I've checked my phone. Since etsy maskes it so freaking difficult to contact them, and I already have a REAL life, removing this app from my phone will be a good thing!

About to delete this app. All of a sudden there are inappropriate items popping up and I can not find any where to mark I dont want to see, nor any settings to block such content. The help center is no help, and I sent a message to support and I was referred back to the no help center. Ridiculous!

After updating my Android version and the Etsy app, I can no longer just copy links from the Etsy app. I can share to other apps, but I cannot copy to clipboard. The Sell on Etsy app has the same problem. Several other people are also having this issue. I can copy links from other apps without problems. Please fix!

Don't get me wrong, the esty website is great, but this app is awful. It keeps crashing after 5 minutes of being open, and has been this way for months. None of these updates have corrected that issue, either.

title: Sales & Deals - Target, CVS, Costco, Kroger
description:
Browse thousands of discount coupons, weekly grocery ads and store flyers from retailers big and small for major savings from your favorite stores and supermarkets with Sales & Deals. 💰

Save time, a whole lot of paper and up to 50% on your weekly shopping trips with this easy-to-use app. Take advantage of all the savings with every single weekly ads and store flyer found on Sales & Deals (discount stores, supermarkets and every major chain store).

Sales & Deals features deals and discounts from hundreds of stores including your local supermarkets without the need to cut down a single tree. All mobile coupons and ads are updated daily, so you only view valid offers and never miss any savings coming your way. 🛍️  

Save your favorite stores to receive instant notifications of special deals, sales and discounts near you and easily sort offers to smoothly navigate all weekly ads and flyers. Sales & Deals is quick and intuitive and features simple, clean looks to be as practical as possible.

Whether you shop at discount stores, supermarkets or department stores, Sales & Deals offers some of the largest collections of circulars and weekly ads to make sure you’re always up-to-date with all the latest deals at your favorites stores.

Saving money on shopping has never been simpler and smarter.

Why should you choose Sales & Deals?

✔️1000’s of weekly ads and flyers right on your phone  
✔️Save paper, time and up to 50% on your shopping 
✔️Circulars with deals from all types of stores: grocery stores, department stores, pharmacies, hardware stores, clothing stores and many more
✔️Get reminders about new offers from your favorite retailers
✔️Easy navigation with quick sorting to browse all the deals
✔️No registration or personal data needed - all features are free

Check thousands of offers from local stores including grocery markets, to save on everyday products from shops like CVS Pharmacy, ShopRite, Sam's Club, Rite Aid, Hmart, IGA, Petco, Save a Lot, Stop&Shop, Bravo Supermarkets, Western Beef, Price Rite, Food Bazaar, Pioneer Supermarkets, Pet Smart, Commissary, Key Food, ACME, Associated, Ctown, Walgreens, Food city, 99 ranch.

Buy everything you need in Dept. Stores like Target, Kohl's, Sears, Macy's.

Save even more in Discount Stores like Aldi, Dollar General, Dollar Tree, Costco, Kmart, Family Dollar and Big Lots.

Make savings on home decorations in stores like Ikea, Bed Bath & Beyond, Pottery Barn, Williams Sonoma.

Buy new tools and home equipment from stores like Home Depot, Ace Hardware, Harbor Freight Tools, Lowe's.

Find the best deals on electronics in Best Buy, Game Stop, Boost Mobile, Sprint.

Check the offers from your favorite fashion stores incl. Old Navy, Forever 21, H&M, Urban Outfitters, ZARA, Gap, and in many other clothing stores.

Buy the sports clothing and equipment in Adidas, Nike, Foot Locker, Dick's Sporting Goods, and other stores.

title: Groupon - Shop Deals, Discounts & Coupons
description:
Download Groupon and save up to 70% on the things you need every day. Find great deals on all the best stuff to eat, see, and do near you and around the world.

Save on everything you’re looking for. Whether you’re craving a new restaurant in town, or daydreaming about tropical travel, a daily replenishment of deals delivers all the discounts you like.

Every deal is available to use immediately, so you’re never more than a few taps away from a relaxing massage, tickets to the night’s hottest event, or a great pizza joint.

With the Groupon app you can:
•  Get promo codes and special savings alerts for deals near you, instantly on your mobile device
•  Buy and redeem Groupon deals directly from your mobile device, no need to print vouchers or clip coupons
•  Read customer reviews and write your own
•  Share deals with friends and family

And there’s more:
•  Instantly redeem on-demand deals on food, fun, fashion, and wellness, without having to print a voucher
•  Get up to 30% cash back at participating Groupon+ restaurants
•  Travel to exotic destinations and stay at the fanciest hotels with Groupon Getaways
•  Shop for fun themed collections for holidays and events

Put down the coupon book and pick up the Groupon Android app—your ticket to explore the best your city has to offer at savings of up to 70% off.

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support
summary: Save up to 70% on the things you need every day
recentChanges: Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Local Deals- Pros: 1. Makes enjoying life a lot easier & cheaper. 2. Can rebuy, extend, or exchange. Cons: 1. Very specific rules. 2. Not always available per deal. Product Deals- Pros: 1. Much cheaper than regular prices on most items. 2. Current on fads/trends. 3. Can keep items in cart for desired time frame. Cons: 1. Some require many extra steps being time consuming & confusing. 2. Shipping takes FOREVER! 3. Stock usually low or sold out. SITE- HORRIBLE Customer service

Definitely worth to save money on things you'd like to do. Especially sales for going out to eat or entertainment. Also, some sales are insanely good. A local MMA gym had a month's worth of class for $13... Most gyms cost $300. This app is also good if you want to try new things, but are reluctant to spend a huge amount on something you may not like.

I really enjoy using groupon but trying to talk to someone about an issue is nearly impossible, to chat with a person is very disappointing, I feel as I am being rushed and nothing get accomplished, this is very frustrating. I accidentally purchased 2 of the same deal and was trying to let someone know about the issue and was told it was refunded but I do not see where it has been and now trying to find out more info on the situation has become very stressful

Been using for years with mostly good experiences. Bought a few deals before coronavirus and customer service helped me to get groupon bucks so the deals wouldnt go to waste during the outbreak. Customer service very accommodating. I only wish more places would offer a groupon, seems to be the same few local places for months and months.

Its a good app, has some bargains but could do with combining some postage charges. Have had to return a couple of clothes items but groupon sort problems out almost on the spot and i've bought lots of goods with no problems at all. All in all, great!

title: Meijer
description:
Save even more at Meijer with the Meijer Mobile App. Earn rewards, find exclusive digital coupons, track savings and much more…

REWARDS WITHOUT THE WORK
Rewards now start themselves
•	There's no more manual picking and choosing to start your rewards. You'll start earning available rewards as soon as you buy a qualifying item and enter your mPerks ID at checkout.
Get alerts and track your progress
•	You'll always be able to see how close you are to earning your next reward. And, when you enable notifications in the app, you'll be alerted whenever you start and earn rewards.
Earned rewards are immediately ready for use
•	Continue to enter your mPerks ID each time you check out and you'll automatically be notified at the register when rewards are ready to redeem. Just claim them right there - no manual clipping.

DIGITAL COUPONS 
Easily find and redeem coupons.

WEEKLY AD & SHOPPING LIST
Add Weekly Ad items to your Shopping List.
Items easily viewable on Shopping List to make your trips go faster in store. 
View this week’s sales on your phone + find a Meijer closest to you.

FINGERPRINT
A fast and easy way to log-in.
The Meijer Mobile App is everything you need for your shopping trip at your fingertips.

PHOTO PRINTING
Easily order photo prints from your phone and pick them up in store.

summary: The Meijer app has everything you need for your shopping trip.
recentChanges: * We're working on addressing issues with starting your trip in our Shop & Scan feature. This release has the latest and greatest.
comments: Very confusing to navigate. Kept bringing up Easter dinner items. In the beginning the only choice was to add to list but when I was finished there was no list and nothing in my cart so I had to keep looking around until I was finally in the section to add to my cart then had to redo all my items. Very confusing app. I wouldn't be using if we weren't staying in since we are older and told to stay home.

3/20/20 Unable to start shop and scan. Last update was 3/18/20. How long does it take to fix the issue? If you can't fix it, why not go to the previous version that was working? Why not at least place a pop-up message in the shop and scan screen that the issue is known and is being taken care of. Would save a lot of time and frustration to your customers.

I have loved this app in the past, it had made shopping so easy. Unfortunately, I and many others have complained that the shop and scan feature isn't working. I don't see any helpful responses from the app builders on how to fix the issues, just more people, like myself, posting our frustration and asking for the app to be fixed. PLEASE, fix the issues as soon as possible.

App not working properly. I tried signing in and out several times, turning my phone off and back on but neither worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app but haven't had the opportunity to try using it again. Now for some reason I'm unable to move the app icon to my phone's home screen. Frustrating.

Love this app. Allows me to see all the ads. Keeps track of the favorite items I purchase regularly. Also keeps track of what I spend. Best of all allows me to clip coupons from a big selection. Saves me lots of money plus gives me rewards for purchasing a certain amount . If you shop meijers, this app is a must have.

title: thredUP | Shop & Sell Women’s & Kids’ Clothing
description:
thredUP isn't your typical thrift store, they're the best shopping app for buying & selling women's and kids' clothes! Get up to 50% off your first thredUP order today and enjoy:
🛍️Over 35,000 brands, from Gap to Gucci. 
💸Up to 90% off est. retail.
😱1,000+ arrivals EVERY DAY. 
🌎Guilt-free sustainable shopping.
👌Easy returns & free shipping with orders over $79.
💳Payment via Paypal, Google Pay, Affirm, and credit card.

🛒SHOP UP TO 90% OFF
You'll never buy retail again. Score womenswear, accessories, maternity, and kids' clothing from your fave brands for way, way less. thredUP offers high-quality secondhand clothes from Free People, Madewell, Anthropologie, Coach, Nike, Lululemon, Zara, Nordstrom Rack, Louis Vuitton, and MORE! 

✨SELL YOUR CLOTHES
thredUP's Clean Out service is hands down the EASIEST way to sell or donate your clothes. thredUP does ALL the work, YOU get cash or credit. Here's how it works:
1. Order a Clean Out Kit or FREE shipping label on thredUP's selling app 
2. Fill a bag with pre-loved clothes and send it back. 
3. Relax! We inspect, photograph, list, and ship items for you.

🌎CHOOSE USED FOR THE PLANET
There's enough amazing clothes on the planet, let's wear them. To date, thredUP has upcycled over 100M items so far and they're just getting started. Join thredUP's community of fashion lovers who are committed to a more sustainable future by giving clothes a second life! 

💬THE BUZZ ABOUT US
"The App for the Responsible Shopper" - Elle
"The Easiest Way To Practice Sustainable Fashion" - Forbes
"Your favorite brands at a crazy reduced price." - Seventeen

FROM SHOPPERS LIKE YOU
★★★★ "I just started using thredUP, and I'm absolutely addicted. The selection is HUUUGE, the prices are SUPER reasonable, as are the shipping rates (I'm looking at you, Poshmark)." - Jenna G. 
★★★★ "This is where I get 95% of my clothes from. Not Your Daughter Jean's, Splendid, Lululemon Athletica, they have a great selection of high end brands for such a great deal." - Alexandra S. 
★★★★ "I’ve been buying and selling with thredUP for over two years. As an eco-conscious, budget-friendly, fashion enthusiast this is the best digital option for buying ‘used’ clothes from a company. Compared to PoshMark or eBay, I have much more confidence in the quality of clothes I buy with thredUp since they go through inspections AND they have a great return policy! Win-win." - K.M.A
★★★★ "The ease of using this app was mindblowing! I set the filters to the category, sizes, styles, and even sale percentages! And up pops whatever matches what I chose!" - Adell H. 
★★★★ "love love love this app. it always works and I love sending my clothes here to sell. it's such an easy process. and you can use your credit to buy more clothes. perfect!" - Melissa Z. 
★★★★ “I refuse to spend full price on name brand clothes for my kids. With jeans costing 50-80$ a pair there’s just no way I’d spend that on a pair of pants they’ll probably grow out of in a few months. The clothes I find on thredUP are such great quality and great prices. Love the variety.” -  jen-loves-brad

recentChanges: Nothing big to report, just routine updates. Happy shopping!
comments: This app is wonderful! The only thing that would make it better (why I gave only 4 stars) is they only show the front and back pictures of wallets. I want to see that, as well as the inside! I like a certain type but never know what the inside looks like. Other than that its amazing. Everything is priced reasonably and comes pretty fast! Thank you!

It was a bit difficult getting around the site. A lot of the clothes are similar. It can be a bit difficult to see the details of the clothing despite the ability to zoom in. I think it is because the clothes just hang there. Not having models saves money I guess. I still need to search other categories. I intend to donate some clothes. But I prefer to donate closer to home usually. I really like the premise of this site though.

Love this app! It's essential a designer Goodwill that I can browse on my phone. I give it a 4 because the filtering abilities are wanting. If you put multiple search criteria, for example color "gray" and size "10," it will bring up all items tagged with either of those, not items tagged with both of those. Beyond that relatively small inconvenience it is a great app that aids in reducing textile waste. Would recommend.

Almost a perfect thrift store app. I have made many purchases and unfortunately not all my purchases have been what the photo described. I believe this can easily be fixed if the company took more than two photos of each item at different angles. Photos never capture the inside of items (bags, purses, or wallets) or to the side (leggings or dresses will have a side design, however it's never visible). Other than that I absolutely love this app!

I love this app for buying clothes - thrifting is the only way I buy now. There are tons of high quality items and it's easy to find exactly what I'm looking for every time. It's not great for selling, however, as I received only 33¢ for selling about 3 tops. I know, it's more than I would get for donating, but still, 33¢! While they are transparent about payout prices, the fact that the payout amounts are miniscule and de-incentivise selling through this app remains.

title: GOAT - Sneakers & Designer Fashion
description:
GOAT is the global platform for style. 

Discover the largest selection of sneakers as well as luxury and streetwear designer fashion, including just dropped, sold out and future releases–all in one place. Now shipping to over 164 countries. 

Shop Designer Brands
Shop over a million listings of sneakers, apparel and accessories from the world’s emerging, contemporary, and designer fashion brands, including Nike, Air Jordan, adidas, Yeezy, Off-White, Comme des Garcons, Acne Studios, Gucci and more.

Select Wants and Place Offers
Find the right sneakers at the right price. Set alerts and place offers. 

Get Inspired
Read Greatest, our magazine featuring stories of emerging artists as well as industry veterans who continuously pave the way in streetwear, fashion, art, music, design, entrepreneurship and beyond.

Rest Assured
All sneaker sellers, fashion retailers and boutiques are vetted. And all sneaker orders are verified by hand to ensure they are authentic and as described. 

For more information, visit our FAQ: https://www.goat.com/faq

summary: Shop our platform for authentic sneakers and designer fashion.
recentChanges:
We’re now offering apparel and accessories from the world’s emerging, contemporary and luxury brands.

For a limited time, enjoy free shipping on all apparel and accessory domestic orders over $100 or $10 off international shipping.
comments: Garbage app. Ordered shoes no problem but cannot login now to check status. Keep getting error message. Not impressed. Tried customer service but they didn't help. Told me to reinstall. Did and same thing. Please fix the app. Edit. The app now is working for me. I was very frustrated but after many uninstalls things are better now. I'll still use GOAT.

They need to fix this new app, uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't fix the problems. I have reached out to someone at the Goat team and received an email asking me to screenshot the purchase problem, did so and received nothing as to actually working to FIX the problem. Was just told, they knew of this problem and are working to fix it. If I can't purchase an item how am I to receive it, when your app isn't fixing the "purchasing" problem??? PLEASE ACTUALLY FIX THIS, PLEASE AND THANK YOU!!! 😤

There's something wrong with the site/app. The app doesn't allow you to log in, the website doesn't allow you to view your account. There is no option to look at your purchases, etc. I ordered some kicks not knowing this and after I emailed them, they responded telling me to uninstall/reinstall....of course I did that before emailing you guys! Come on...

My 1st time using Goat. Didn't know that, when you made offers on merch, you aren't notified to continue or confirm that you are willing to go through with the purchase after the seller accepts. THAT IS NEEDED IN THIS APP! You just get your bank account hit without confirmation and could be out of 100s or 1000s of dollars. Cool app nonetheless

If everyone dont see what is going on is insane. They used to be a good company and the last few months has been flooded with negative reviews and the app update not working was intentional. You cant track orders or use your online credit. Ive seen this before and I hate to say it but your money and or shoes are gone. Keep an eye out, they will be filing bankruptcy soon. NEW COMERS, STAY CLEAR OF THIS APP AND SITE, IT HAS BECOME A SCAM.

title: Eastbay: Sports Gear, Shoes & Apparel
description:
Calling all sneakerheads! The Eastbay App is your link to FLX rewards, classic kicks, hot launches and more.

NEW! Join FLX and get rewarded
• Earn points across all of our brands
• Free standard shipping with no minimum
• Redeem XPoints in the rewards center for exclusive products, experiences and even gift cards
• Receive a special birthday gift
• Take advantage of member-only sales and events
• Access to special gift with purchase promotions
• Plus, as you move up in status' you will receive even more rewards

Get Dibs on new releases
• Know what's next with the Release Calendar
• Get notifications on hot new releases before others by opting in to push notifications

Shop
• For the latest heat in footwear and clothing
• Browse your brand: Jordan, Nike, adidas, Reebok, and more
• Scan your credit card right in the app to streamline the checkout process
• Access My Account to save your payment and shipping info for faster checkout.
• Learn all about the latest in sneaker culture and sneaker news

Shop Eastbay anytime, anywhere!

recentChanges: We've made some style improvements to the app and and squashed some bugs but Eastbay still has the latest, greatest sneakers, apparel and accessories. Respect the drip!
comments: Love the app for what it is. But I'm so tired of certain items up but always out of stock. Literally scrolling and everything is out of stock that is good but is always there to click on and waste your time.
App isn't working. I even uninstalled it, re-installed it and nothing. Please fix, and I'll rate-up.
Can't get past the "complete account" screen.

Unfortunately i have to give this app 3 stars jus for 1 thing thats not working, u cant save items to ur fav or wish list, the heart dosnt appear on the item etc, so if i use this app and i like somethin to buy later id hav to find it again, every app has add to favs, maybe its not working or no one has noticed 🤷‍♂️ but the one issue knocks 2 stars off, other than that the app works great, details of every item easy purchase and checkouts
Every time I try to add something to the cart an "error has occured" and won't let me. It's in stock but I can't but it. Useless.

title: VarageSale: Sell simply, buy safely.
description:
VarageSale is your virtual garage sale buy and sell app. We are the only app based on 100% real identity--everyone goes through a manual review process before they’re allowed to buy or sell. See member ratings and average response times to get to know people before a sale. Messaging members and scheduling meetups are a breeze through our app.

Browse local classifieds listings on the feed or filter out categories you aren’t interested in for a personalized shopping experience. Easily search for stuff like baby gear, furniture, household items, electronics, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more! 
 
Got stuff to sell? Take a photo and list it in seconds. Earn extra cash. Let go of items you no longer want or need. 
 
Completely free to buy, sell, browse and bump your stuff to the top of the listings feed. 
 
Skip yard sales. VarageSale instead! Sell simply, buy safely.

summary: Safely buy and sell secondhand stuff locally with trusted and verified members.
developerAddress:
111 Peter Street
Suite 901
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
M5V 2H1
recentChanges:
* You can now clear all your watched items
* Performance improvements and various fixes

Send your suggestions, comments or questions to the team at help@varagesale.com.
comments: Edit: 2.24.20- The app has SO many issues lately! Nothing will load multiple times a day, I'm not receiving notifications half the time for messages or Interests in my items. Absolutely causing issues for sales and buys. I was obsessed and impressed with the app for a very long while. I'm almost over it now with all the issues!

I love this app for many reasons! 1) I can sell my unwanted items without leaving the house. 2) I can buy an item without having to wait in line at a store; too many times it took so long that I just put the item back and left. 3) Porch pick up (PPU) is great, especially if you have kids! 4) Last but not least, you get to meet great people and be part of a good community!

I love this app, find it useful for finding great local deals! It would be better if the messages showed up right away instead of only when the page is physically refreshed or restarted, and if the search engine would have filters, search within price range etc. Still would reccomend to friends though.

Nice to have a place to buy good used items. But it's very frustrating if you forget your password login. I did and clicked to send email to reset several times and didn't get email to reset. I finally figured out my password on my own. Now I have no notifications updating on the app. Nothing new showing in the last 24 hours?!

I absolutely love love love this App. It's the best way to get rid of your unwanted clutter. It's all local and would recommend this app to everyone. Also if you are looking to purchase things, they have just about anything you can think of. And the people are very friendly.

title: Forever 21 - The Latest Fashion & Clothing
description:
Welcome to the incredible world of Forever 21 – in your pocket and at your fingertips.

Features:

- APP EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS - Get exclusive access to sales and discounts first!

- FIT RATING - Runs small? Runs large? Runs true to size? Now you can read and leave sizing feedback on all clothing items. 

- SHOP: Explore, browse, swipe to view more images and buy on the go!

- FIND & SAVE: Search by category, size, color, price, or browse our trend edits. Save your faves to wishlist with just a click.

- BARCODE SCAN: Need another size? Looking for more info? Just scan an item’s barcode to get details, read reviews, and share your finds with your bestie.

- EASY CHECKOUT: Feeling lazy? Try using our new camera card scanner to add a new credit card in just a few seconds!

- SOCIAL: Connect with the Forever 21 community through Facebook and Instagram, and use #F21xME to find and share style inspirations.

- FIND A STORE: Lost without Forever 21? Use the store locator to find nearby stores, get directions, and find out which brands are available at each store.

Oh, and we genuinely love hearing your feedback. We’re always improving and constantly updating our app to make shopping easier for you! Shoot us an email at mobileapp@forever21.com to leave a comment, report an issue, or make a suggestion.

recentChanges:

comments: It's good functions well. It's never glitched while I've used it. I have made purchases through the app and my order came right, I had it sent to my local mall instead of to my house just incase I wouldnt be home when the packaged arrived. The only suggestion I have is that when you favorite something and it's not available anymore for it NOT to be taken off your Favorites List so that way you can at least find something that looks similar to it.
I love the app because it lets you see sooo many styles, colors, and sizes!!!❤❤❤❤

App is nice but I can't leave reviews on items I've bought. I value reviews and they sometimes help me make decisions on products I'm considering buying. It seems strange that I can't leave feedback, the submit button never responds and I can't leave valuable insights, good and bad and everything in between.
The clothes here are so amazing. The cheapest clothes ever! I got amazing leggings for only $3! And some nice jumpsuits for like $15! Great place!
The search function doesn't really work. If I search for something, it just pops up blank.

title: Kmart – Shop & save with awesome deals
description:
With millions of products at your fingertips, the Kmart app is a must-have for any savvy shopper looking for ridiculously awesome savings, coupons and special offers while on the go. 

COOL FEATURES	
•	Get $5 off any $35 purchase when you download the app 
•	Enjoy free shipping when you place an order on the app while in store
•	Stay in the know with notifications about order updates, tracking info and more

comments: I used to like it a lot they need to update it or remove merchandise that is no longer available after a few days...otherwise clicking on items not available when the add shows that they are is annoying and a waste of time!
App is slow. It's just slightly faster than using the actual website. This will be my 2ND time uninstalling and installing to see if it works better
It's very slow,outdated,it doesn't give u the ability to add items or view similar when"you are told out of stock '! Needs to be redesigned!

Well since Kmart thinks it's a great idea to keep closing stores and continues to make it harder and harder to shop with them (including online being made more and more difficult) this app has been very helpful
This was a fantastic app....but lately it has so many issues....miss my favorite Kmart store....have lost my Sears too.😣

title: Flipp - Weekly Shopping
description:
Flipp helps you save up to 50% on your weekly shopping. Simple! This essential app brings you the latest weekly ads, deals, and coupons from more than 2000 of your favorite retailers including Walmart, Aldi, and CVS to help you save money. You’ll also find a variety of online offers to stay on budget. Best of all, it’s completely FREE!

This all-in-one app helps you along every step of your shopping journey, from planning to checkout, and everything in between. Find your ads, saved offers, shopping list, and loyalty cards in one place, so you don’t have to scramble at the checkout. 

Wave goodbye to inconvenient paper circulars and junk mail, and take your deal hunting on-the-go with Flipp!

Here’s why Flipp is more than just a weekly ads app:

 - Find relevant deals and circulars from stores near you.

 - Explore up-to-date circulars and offers from over 2000 of your favorite retailers.

 - Instantly search and find sales for items you want with our powerful search feature.

 - “Clip” or save deals to your shopping list, so you can have them on hand at all times.

 - Find value at a large variety of retailers including grocery, pharmacy, electronics, general merchandise, fashion, and pets.
 
 - Discover in-ad and online deals by categories like electronics, home & garden, apparel and more.

 - Add your store loyalty or rewards cards so you don’t forget to use them at checkout, and take advantage of all your rewards points.

 - Save with digital coupons that you can load to your loyalty card, or save with printable coupons.

 - Create your shopping list right on Flipp. Have your list, deals, and saved offers all in one place.

We’re always adding new stores! Discover value and savings at popular stores including:

 - ALDI
 - Walmart
 - CVS
 - Walgreens
 - Target
 - Family Dollar
 - Dollar General
 - Meijer
 - Big Lots
 - Rite Aid

Once you try Flipp, you’ll never want to shop without it. But don’t take it from us! 

Here’s what the experts are saying about Flipp:

The app provides savings of up to 50 percent off your weekly essentials. On top of that, it’s easy to use...discover deals for each item on your shopping list and receive reminders about expiring deals, new offers, and updates from local stores. –  Jenny McCoy, CookingLight

If you don't want to store stacks of retail ads, utilize Flipp to eliminate clutter...maximizing savings in a few taps on your phone – Andrea Woroch, U.S. News & World Report

Love Flipp too? Leave us a review!

Have any questions or suggestions? Contact us at flipp.force.com

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Useful and fairly intuitive. Would be nice if it auto-deleted Expired clipped items (you can delete it manually) or gave you the option to configure it to do so. Some flyers are more well-suited than others -- from the big chains, generally relatively easy to clip and see. For some places though where the flyers are broad-sheet sized, products shown are miniscule -- so it's hard to see a product, let alone clip it. Not sure if there's anything Flipp can do about that. Zooming in is really painful and not really worth the time.

This app is exceptional!!! I love love love this app you can't go wrong by downloading this app you'll have the sales ads at the tip of your fingers on your phone all day every day! I'm in love with the 'LIST' section you add what you need to buy and the app will pull up all the sales at all the nearby stores in your area! DON'T DELAY DOWNLOAD TODAY!!!

This is a really great app. Super convenient. I love being able to put my loyalty cards in it too, but am holding back one star because there isn't a way to add a card unless the store is already in their loyalty list. So I have cards from smaller retailers that I have to still carry.

While scrolling through the flyers, tapping on certain items, the page would not display clearly. A different display of another item would appear. When I try to correct the problem, the entire page would be unclear. Basically it would show a collage of ads. I prefer looking through the (old fashioned) paper flyer.

Aside from the convenience of every flyer at your fingertips, I absolutely love the search feature. If I have to buy an item on a tight budget any given week, it's great knowing that I can compare all the local ads for it and buy where its the best price!

title: Dollar General - Digital Coupons, Ads And More
description:
YOU’RE GETTING AN UPGRADE.
 
Your favorite ways to save. Now in one place.

summary: Shop and save with our smart, easy-to-use DG app.
developerAddress:
100 Mission Ridge
Goodlettsville, TN 37072
recentChanges: At DG, we are always working to help you save more and are excited to launch Switch to Save as part of your Shopping List in the DG App. This new feature will let you know if there is a lower-priced DG product available as you’re adding items to your Shopping List. We’ve also made some other improvements and fixed a few bugs.
comments: I have used this app in the past, and I had no problem, but now when I need to log in again, it will not let me log in. After I re-installed it, I was able to get through that. Then it needed to send me a code to verify my device, and it keeps saying that the code has expired! I put it in immediately. How long is it valid for? 2 seconds? Very frustrating!

This app has been awful won't let me create an account and then when tried it won't let me finish it. Then when I try to use this app as a guest, and I try to take the scanner and price check it never works and I've been dealing with this for 2 weeks now this app is so frustrating.

Can't scan products. I have downloaded the app three times on two different phones and still the scan function for barcodes will not work. The purpose of me having the app is to check the prices on sale and clearance items before I purchase them, but I can't get it to work. In my opinion, the app has been horrible and a waste of time.

3/10/20. Well i didn't have to add a card to use. But i think it need to speed up as when after a scan it takes to long to load a price especially since you are forcing customers to use instore wifi, by blocking cell signal inside your stores. Auto location for the store you are in would make it better. Still has room for improvement.

The scan an item option is frustrating. It needs to be separated from the search window. It would be helpful to be able to save several stores to toggle between on the 'my store.' Many DG shoppers frequent multiple stores.

title: Hollister So Cal Style
description:
Hollister believes in liberating the spirit of an endless Summer inside everyone. To us, Summer isn’t just a season… it’s a state of mind. Get the Hollister app and you'll get:

My Account: Sign up, log in & get notified about the latest products & promotions.
Barcode Scanner: Scan barcodes in stores to shop more sizes and see ratings & reviews.
My Saves: Tap the heart on the products you love and we’ll save them for you.
Playlist: Listen to the freshest tunes on our Hollister playlist.
Store Locator: Find the closest Hollister store near you.
Click & Collect: Shop within the app, then pick up your order in-store

[+] Easy access to your Favorites, Playlist and Account options.

comments: its very easy to use. the only problem is everything i clock the app to reply a msg, then come back to the app, i have to search the clothes again,other than this, its a very good shopping app.
I have had a Great experience with this App and I would Highly recomend it!!! Thank You Hollister, for not only making my shopping experience enjoyable but affordable as well.

I love the clothing but more than that the sales they have are great, cause they have so many of them close together. The only thing i can say bad about the rewards program is the reward they give for so many points is $5 dollars when i feel they should give $10. Or do something like kohls every $50 you spend you get $10. And so on. But other than that its great!
Great user interface and great comfortable clothes at a reasonable price.
Works well, smooth and easy to use and navigate but the sort function doesn't work unfortunately otherwise it would of been 5 stars. Update. The sort function works now so 5 stars.

title: Jane - Daily Boutique Shopping
description:
Jane is a beautiful boutique marketplace featuring the latest in women's fashion, home decor, beauty & wellness, pets, and children's clothing. We curate hundreds of new deals every day. So shop fast. These don’t last. 

Shopping on Jane:
 • Shop by category: Like window-shopping, but less walking.
 • Filters: New, most popular, ending soon… you get the idea.
 • Search: Find what you need, when you need it.
 • Know before you buy: fit/sizing details & customer reviews.
 • Alerts: Find out before your favorites are gone.
 • Simple Checkout: Simply swipe to check out fast. 
 • Sneak peeks: Get early access to tomorrow’s deals today.

Jane’s Promise: If you’re not absolutely satisfied with your order, we’ll make it right or refund your purchase.

Shop on Jane for: Clothing and apparel, shoes, jewelry and accessories, beauty and wellness, maternity, baby, kids, home, pets, and more. 

We Love Your Feedback: Tell us what you think at feedback@jane.com

recentChanges: Various fixes and adjustments
comments: I LOVE this app! The only thing I wish was done differently is that tax was included in the price shown for the item.. (Not really a complaint.) I can honestly find some great deals! I've ordered about 5 or 6 times so far and everything has been correct and as expected.
the clothes are so cute! jane's policy is that clothes expire after a certain amount of days, so you have to impulse buy. 😁 i spend a lot of time on this app.

The Jane app has revolutionized my online shopping addiction! From items for my family to items for friends (even a couple items here and there for myself), Jane is an online treasure chest of goodies just waiting to be browsed (and bought). So glad they caught my eyes when scrolling IG! 😉
I love the Jane app. I find so many different things on here! They have stuff for you, your friends, family, kids, pets, your house, all kinds of wonderful things.
Best shopping experience for online boutiques! All of the best deals from all the different boutiques all in one place. You seriously cannot beat it. Love shopping with Jane!!

title: GeekBuying - Gadget shopping made easy
description:
Online shopping with GeekBuying is very easy as you get to shop from the comfort of your home and get products delivered at your doorstep. By downloading the GeekBuying free online shopping app on your Android phone or tablet, you can effortlessly browse our massive collection of more than 20,000 products from multiple categories including mobile phones, fashion wear, electronic devices, accessories and consumer durables.

The products you can find on GeekBuying shopping app are: 
•Mobile Phones
•Laptops, Computer Accessories & Tablets
•Smart Watches & Bracelets
•Smart Home & Home Appliances
•Electronic Gadgets
•RC Toys & Gaming Console
•Sports, Gym & Fitness Products
•Women's Clothing
•Men's Clothing
•Women's & Men's Footwear
•Travel, Luggage & Handbags
•Personal Care Appliances

Install GeekBuying app for unique benefits 
Simply download the Android shopping app on your device (phone or tablet) and create an account for yourself. Now, you will be taken to the Home screen where you will find links to all the category products, along with amazing offers, deals and discounts. 

1. Easily type in the product you are looking for in the ‘Search’ tab and find it instantly.
2. Narrow down your search using filters like price, color, style, pattern, brand to find your desired product.
3. Check ratings and reviews given by other customers along with seller ratings, price and description of the product while buying the product.
4. You can also add products to your wishlist with a single tap.
5. To place the order, choose among easy payment options using your credit card, debit card or PayPal.
6. Track your orders inside the app, get notifications on personalized offers, price drops, order status, exclusive launches and upcoming sale events.

Permissions:
In addition to basic permissions, the GeekBuying shopping app needs access to other functions on your device for it to support the above features -
• Device and App History: To detect critical crashes and recover the app state
• Identity: For native login functionality with your Google account

You can contact our customer support for any product or delivery related issues. 
For any app related issues, kindly send us your feedback on app_feedback@geekbuying.com

comments: Since day 1 I have change my password in order to make payment, very frustrating to say the least. Then it locks me out for 30 min because of too many attempts. After the first and only attempt, again, very frustrating. I am to the point of cutting all ties with it all. POS

I havent used the app for a few weeks or so, and ive really liked the app even tho getting rid of my favs was kinda stupid. Theres been an update or two since aaaand the shop doesnt work now. Like its blank. No options to reload page or whatever. Idk if its a singular issue or if others are having this sort of problem.

I love the apps just don't understand why they would take away the Love List! Now if I find something I love but don't want to purchase with my current transaction I have to completely take it out of my cart and try to relocate the item again after I have made my purchase so that I don't lose track of it. How on Earth are you supposed to keep track of the items thought you loved if there is no place to store your favorites? I can deal with every glitch or app issue but that one so that would be my highest recommended problem to address with this app. With this being a billion dollar clothing\lingerie industry with both of their apps being out for years now I don't understand why they haven't been updated with a list for you to store your favorite items just like the website. I'm kinda shocked at that issue.. 🤔

Terrible experience! There always seems to be an issue. I contact customer service online and over the phone and they dont know how to solve the issue. Very inconvenient. I have the Angel credit card, which I make sure to pay on time every month. But, if I cannot use it then it's not worth having it.
It took forever to sign me in using finger print. And never did actually load. Yes mine app is up to date.

title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon - Tiny Shop Game
description:
Ready to be rich?

Become the richest supermarket entrepreneur!

Build your own business, earn money, and become the best supermarket tycoon in the world!

Start with a mini-mart and turn it into a major supermarket business. Build a bakery, sell fruit and vegetables, offer high-quality fish and meat. Run your own perfume and electronics departments. Let the customers fill their shopping carts!

Research new features to improve the quality of your products, offers, and departments. Make your business grow!

Become the best supermarket manager. Hire sellers and make them increase your sales and profits. Set the salary of the employees from different departments. Take care of your customers too, offering them a wider range of options and healthy products. Build a huge parking lot where they can safely leave their vehicles while they shop.

Develop different marketing strategies to attract potential and existing customers. Choose the best products and improve your research to offer the best deals to your customers. Their opinion and feedback is critical to run a profitable business. Happy customers are returning customers!

If you like idle and tapping games, you will enjoy this casual supermarket management game. Idle Supermarket Tycoon is an easy-to-play game where you run your own business with different product departments. Make important management decisions to build your empire and transform your small supermarket into one of the greatest in the world!

Features:
- Casual and easy gameplay
- Different challenges to complete
- Amazing animations and 3D graphics
- Unique products to sell!
- Make important managing decisions to expand your business
- Save your progress in the cloud and recover it if you change your device

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes, and performance improvements
comments: The past few days since last update the ads crash or jus dont respond when you click watch ad for extras on the game so its hard to get any further than where i am unless i wait for long periods of time & the loading screen freezes for a bit causing it to take longer than it usually would take to load. Love this game & play it daily especially with the franchise piece i do be hooked, would love if it was a permenant part of the game at times but it keeps the game a little more exciting.

It offers you to watch an ad for more customers or faster Cashiers but everytime I click on it... It does not play it it only let's you watch like 3 ads a day but yet it keeps giving you the option to watch them but than says no ads or they just don't play and it goes back to the game. Can't get very far in the game without the ads to help.

Going to change the city and I just thought that it would change the background but it actually restarted my whole entire thing and I hated that ,you guys should really update that make it just have a different background and more money with the truck or something like that. And I was trying to go back to the one that already on but it looks like it got sold for some unknown reason you guys should let people go back to their first town

I absolutely loved this game for a while, but then when I bought a new franchise, I lost EVERYTHING that I had earned at my first one. If you play this game, don't expand to the small city... its dumb and will make you start over

This game is great wish there was a remove adds option to progress a little bit faster and to reduce the number of modifiers that pop up for add if it implemented this goes for all your games. Def should look into it.

title: Shipt Shopper: Shop for Pay
description:
GET PAID TO SHOP AND DELIVER GROCERIES

Shipt is on the lookout for friendly, reliable shoppers to earn money helping Shipt members get the things they need from stores they trust. Apply at shipt.com/shopper to become a shopper and earn up to $22/hour (or more!), set your own schedule, shop and deliver from local stores, and join a thriving community of Shipt Shoppers. If you’re looking for a flexible gig job and want to earn on your own schedule, then apply today.

EARN UP TO $22 PER HOUR AND GET PAID FAST

Apply to be a Shipt Shopper to start earning on your own schedule. Each delivery takes about an hour and can pay as much as $22 or more including tips. You’ll receive a direct deposit every Friday for the deliveries you completed and any in-app tips you’ve earned that week – we make sure you always receive 100% of your tips!

CREATE A SCHEDULE THAT WORKS FOR YOU

Your schedule is based on when you want to shop and deliver, so you can choose to work and earn as little – or as much – as you like. So whether you’re looking to shop part time or shop full time, you can set your perfect schedule. 

APPLY, SHOP, AND EARN MORE MONEY

With no cap on how many orders you can shop, earn what’s right for you! You can even increase the number of orders you’re offered – simply shop and deliver during your preferred times, and strive to deliver 5 star service!

JOIN A COMMUNITY OF SHOPPERS AND CUSTOMERS

More than just a gig economy job, you’ll join a community of shoppers. Share inside tips and stories with other shoppers, and take pride in providing a valuable service to the people in your community that need it most.

JOIN THE TEAM

We’re always on the lookout for hiring shoppers that can help us deliver happiness.
Visit shipt.com/shopper/ to learn more and apply!
