recentChanges:
Now THIS is an app update...
- App rebuilt on a new foundation to be faster and more seamless
- More consistent look and feel across the app
- New scanner
- Interactive map
comments: Update has been a mixed bag. Though the scanner is noticeably faster with the update, the scanner placement has to be just right the first time or else I have to re-scan. Also, the "almost done" text notification pops up but does not connect to my messaging app. I have also experienced app freezing, particularly during order processing. In fact, overall order processing time in the app could be improved. On a positive note, I am no longer having to re-take receipt pictures with the update.

Since the most recent update, I cannot even open the app. I've uninstalled and reinstalled several times to no avail. I continue to get prompts for promo orders though. However, as the pay rate has continued to diminish, it may just be time for me and Shipt to part ways. Not worth the two hours of driving, shopping, and delivering for $11.

Needs improvement. Needs to be easier to substitute items or force add something when the barcode wont scan. Needs to show the price for items as this can help you find the right thing. Needs isle numbers for some stores as the categories system can out two things in the same categories even if they are on different sides of the store. No pay for mileage so you can only accept the limited number of orders nearby. The worst part is support takes 15-30min to get and help. Even on an active order.

They just launched a new version of the application, and with everything digital you have to wonder what they were thinking? Who did they ask for information? Big change, let's give it more color and make it harder on humans eyes. I can't wait to lose more of my eyesight! Why do I have to see my profile picture? The font is smaller! When you created this did you use it as a practical application, or did you think , we want it to look cool! Getting an alert at 50 mph with 60 seconds to claim!

So far the new app updates are working great for me. EXCEPT the issue that I cannot access my delivery history prior to December 2019. Hoping my communications with HQ will get this resolved quickly as it is a necessary tool I use to reconcile for tax prep. I am not the only Shopper with this issue.

title: 5miles: Buy and Sell Used Stuff Locally
description:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.
- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $5 in credits towards your first purchase.

5miles is the top-rated buy and sell app: local shopping made easy, safe, and fun. Discover great classifieds in your area or far away. Buy & sell your stuff, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job all from the comfort of your smartphone. FREE to list. FREE to discover. Buy and sell within 5 miles.

FREE to list. FREE to discover. FREE to boost. All within 5 miles.

Easy
• Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
• Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
• Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
• Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
• Easy registration via Facebook or email
• Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
• Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
• Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
• Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot 
• 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
• 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
• Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
• Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
• Search and filter to find relevant listing
• Like items and follow sellers
• Make offers and get the best deals
• Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
• Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

What makes 5miles different from other buy and sell apps?
1. Phone number verification to reduce spam and fraud
2. Access to SEAL (Safe Exchange Area Locators)
3. Boost, a feature to move your listings to the top of the feed, free of charge
4. User reviews
6. Includes Services, Jobs, and Housing categories
6. Tools to help sellers sell faster
7. Shipping and online payment features
8. Find or post Deals & Events in your area. Everything from restaurant deals to estate sales.

5miles is like having your own online garage sale without the hassle. You can search for products like furniture, household goods, electronics, cell phones, cars, auto parts, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more....

Find a cleaning service, handyman, plumber, babysitter, mover, creative professionals and more. Make sure to check their reviews first to find one you can trust.

Looking for housing? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs. 

Looking for your next happy hour, hair cut, massage, car repair deal, and more? Check out our Deals & Events. Find or post everything from garage sales to service deals to automotive deals and many more.

How to use 5miles:

Buying

1) Browse listings
2) Make an offer or chat with the seller
3) Have the item shipped or meet up with the seller

Selling

1) Snap a photo, set the price and add a description
2) Communicate with buyers through the in app chat feature
3) Ship or meet up with a buyer

FREE for everyone. No service or transaction fees to buy or sell.

Download now and discover great things from the 5miles community. Enjoy the experience of selling and buying locally. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us? 
https://www.5miles.com/

More ways to connect with 5miles:
http://facebook.com/5milesapp
http://twitter.com/5milesapp
http://instagram.com/5milesapp
Email: hello@5milesapp.com

recentChanges:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.

comments: Taking advantage of Coronavirus to make money by featuring upcharged health products. The virus toll counter is also updated slowly, as there have been way more confirmed cases than it says. I used to like this app, but I never thought it would get this scummy.

Ive always enjoyed this app but i dont think they push the sale of local items that much i think they are more concered with the auctions and the Dash section. Ive bought 2 items with both arriving broken and yes they refunded my money but wouldnt send another one to replace it nor any compensation for the trouble it caused me both times. It makes me think i shouldnt buy from dash anymore you cant contact the seller individually. I do like the point system though so 5 stars it is for now

App has changed so much, it's just not the same. Pitiful views, no boost option except with coin rewards which are just a waste of time to complete, and why is this app using over 1G of my storage space? That's un heard of. The Dash feature needs to be monitored unless this is no longer a family friendly app, I mean items range from crotchless lingerie to bondage looking items and barely nude models showcasing these? Seriously guys, not family friendly at all

find anything you need on this app at awesome prices!!! EDITED: I live in the United States but for some reason when I try to share the link to friends or share the app for them to download, it says "sorry this is not available in your country" ??? So exactly what countries actually get the rewards for sharing the app with their friends? I will change my review back to 5 stars when I get a good reason for this. Other than is issue, I have loved the app so please let me know why.

Better than other apps, but still needs work. I miss the shipping feature since it helped me get some cool stuff not usually found local. That should still be up to the seller though. The coins feel gimmicky, and kinda more annoying than fun. Still need to not be able to rate literally anyone you have a conversation with ( black mirror anyone?) And as for "removing inappropriate ratings", still have it on there after 4 yrs, but removed their's.

title: Menards®
description:
Download the Menards® Mobile App today to shop, access your account and take advantage of helpful and convenient tools!

Save BIG Money ® anywhere you go!

•	Apply for, view or make payments on your Menards® Big Card account in the Credit Center
•	Quickly check your Menards® gift card balances
•	Find all the information you need and shop smart with Buying Guides
•	Scan barcodes to see product details fast
AUGMENTED REALITY
Augmented Reality is an innovative feature allowing you to visualize a wide variety of Menards® products in your home before you buy. You can save and compare your options until you find the perfect product to complement your home’s existing decor.

WEEKLY ADS
View Menards® flyers full-screen and shop our deals with ease. It's as easy as browsing the weekly specials in your local newspaper.

GIFT REGISTRY
Take advantage of the Gift Registry Center to easily find or manage registries.

MY LISTS
Keep all your project, wish and shopping lists organized. Create and edit lists to help make your projects and shopping experience faster, easier and more convenient.

ORDER TRACKER
Keep an eye on the shipping progress of your store and online orders.

STORE DETAILS
Find all of the store information you need to plan your trip to any Menards® store location.

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay in the know with notifications pushed directly to your device. You can receive notifications on order statuses, new weekly flyers and flash sales, and events happening online and in-store.

PRODUCT CALCULATORS
Estimate the amount of a variety of products you will need for your project with handy product calculators.

RAY’S LIST
Browse Ray’s List to score the best bargain deals for unclaimed special orders, store display models, slightly dinged and dented products, and clearance merchandise.

HOW-TO VIDEOS
Learn how to complete a variety of projects with our large archive of How-To Videos.

recentChanges: This update was specifically crafted to help you MARCH your way to spring savings
comments: I used to love this app but, for the past couple months it hasn't been great at all. It crashes, it updates the quanity of items in the cart by itself and thats if the items actually make it to the cart. Almost everytime I try to add an item it says it was added I go to the cart and its empty. We just bought a new house and have spent thousands here but, I'm seriously thinking we may start shopping Home Depot for the rest of what we are going to need. Total inconvience to spend money.

I also have been experiencing the quantity of items in my cart impractical numbers. I wad reading of several other people having the same issue. Mine has been doing that for as very long time and I've just gotten used to it but it's not right. Call me crazy, but I swear at one we could scan store receipts into the app to keep record of what we purchased. I cannot find a way to do that anymore unfortunately... I'd love to see that feature.

It's nice to have when you need it, but I really hate this app. It will show me items that are discontinued. It will also make you add an item to your cart just to see the price. I would rather spend my money at other box stores for the simple fact that they don't make me jump through hoops just a figure out the price of a tub faucet I'm interested in.
Gotten better, but still some of the searches go into left field.

App works well to search for items, but when I place something in my cart for a future purchase, the quantity changes periodically when I go back in. For example, I had put TWO wifi wall plates in the cart. Later, the quantity had changes to 2,999. Same thing with the wifi sockets - 4 changed into 49. I've had it change quantities on nearly everything input in the cart Fix it and I'll update my review!

title: Macy's
description:
he latest version of the Macy’s Android app is better than ever! Whether you’re shopping styles for him, her, kids or your home, use the Macy’s app to shop our entire site—anytime, anywhere. Don’t forget to manage your Star Rewards account on the go so you can take advantage of special offers, in-store savings and more! Plus, check prices, stay organized with Lists & use our photo-based Snap & Shop feature to find what you’re looking for instantly. 

 

SHOP LIKE AN ALL-STAR: 

- Enable notifications for order updates, early access to new collections & exclusive deals. 

- See furniture in your space virtually before you buy. 

- Snap a pic of something you’d like to shop & find it or something similar.  

-New! Take our Style Inspo quiz to get daily fashion recs in your Style Feed.  

USE STORE MODE:
- Check out faster with Scan & Pay—just scan items in store, pay on the spot & go!
- Scan bar codes to check prices, read reviews and see more colors & sizes—even order online!
- Get easy access to weekly catalogs, your store’s directory & more! 

MANAGE YOUR STAR REWARDS: 
- Check your available Star Money and see how close you are to your next reward! 
- Track your Star Rewards spend and loyalty status anytime, anywhere.

MANAGE YOUR MACY’S CREDIT CARD: 
- Easily check your account balance.
- Schedule & make payments right from the app! 

CHECK OUT FASTER WITH WALLET: 
- Find all your Macy’s offers, all in one place. Use them online & in-store.
- Check out faster with the best offer, every time.
- Manage your payment info in a secure spot. 

CREATE LISTS & GET FASHION ADVICE: 
- Collect your faves in one place! Just tap “Add to List.” You can create a list for every occasion!
-Now you can create style boards & share them with friends—only on the app!
- Get alerts whenever the price drops on one of your items!  
- Make a style board for any occasion, share it with friends & get their feedback!

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: So the app is great except for one thing. When you want to remove items from your list you should do it one by one, and if it's no longer available it will go to the end of list. When removed it shows the list from top. An update for removing multiple items at once would be great. will give 5 stars if its fixed.👌🏻

Meh. Not much to this app. Searching is clunky, navigation isn't really very efficient. The worst part of the app is the search function, if you look up the "web ID" from the catalogs they send through the mail, you get no results most of the time. For example, a catalog "The Edit Spring 2020", had many items couldn't be found by web ID. One page, showing a man in a blazer and pants, had instructions to snap a photo of the page for more info and a junior's skirt came up as the search result.

This is the best app ever! So convenient! Your card is saved to your app. You can pay from your app or set up auto pay. You can keep track of your star rewards. You have a list with pictures of your last 6 months of orders with pictures and breakdown of prices with tax. You can keep a list of items ypu want later and you can shop from your app. Your bag is on the app too!

I've had to force close when I'm in the middle of something. When I first installed it had alot of problems with verifying until one day decided to visit the website which allowed me to go ahead with verification. It is very convenient when your shopping in store and some items don't have prices on them or they've been reduced further. You can order online to get shipped to ur house or department store. You can even purchase item while in-store using app and you can use their coupons.
Always easy to use and available anytime. It's too easy, I'm always checking in!!! I have one arm and hand that don't work completely and it's easy to ship to home for easier for trying on !!!

title: Shopee 4.4 #ShopFromHome
description:

Only at Shopee, can you enjoy an affordable shopping spree from the comfort of your own home! comments: I tend to take a long time when searching items i want to buy, but this app is too slow and too heavy. Not even 5 minute browsing then the app start to not respond anymore so i have to repeatedly close the app for it to be normal again. I miss the old app, it's much lighter than the newer one. Maybe because you guys put so much display on the front page and making it like a more of social media than it is an online marketplace.

Nice application, one of the best shopping app I have ever downloaded. They have almost everything you can think of. I can get stuff with cheaper price without even going to the mall. They also have a lot of promotions such as cashback and free delivery. It is very easy to use, secured and the sellers are very kind. Always satisfied with this app.

Just updated my device to android 10, and the apps lagging everywhere, flash sale, search for product especially, quite annoying when searching a product see the description page then go back, i think already pressed the back button but the page still, press back button again voila, i'm at home page, so i've to start all over again the searching. Now i've faced different problem, when opening store page click categories, page is blank, not showing any product. Please fix it, thank u.

It is very convenient to shop online on shopee but please develop the app and fix the crash or lag when tapping the back button while seeing the products, it is very slow and doesn't respons really well. the app program sometimes doesn't run smoothly, got freeze and suddenly got back to the home screen. This problem happened quite often. Please add option to edit the shopper username. Thank You.

seriously shopee? lagging everywhere when I open the app even I already installed the new version and my connection is good. I think it because too much banner on the app, don't put everything on the app, please fix that thing asap... ps. don't make me to install a new version cause the problem isn't that thing, the problem is because you put everything on it.

title: PrettyLittleThing
description:
Need your fashion fix on the move? We got you girl. Shop using the PrettyLittleThing app for fierce trend-lead, affordable fashion at your fingertips. The ultimate in fast fashion, with the freshest looks in the latest on-trend styles hitting the site daily, there's no excuse not to keep your #OOTD on-point. With our app in your pocket, we make browsing hundreds of wardrobe must-haves easy as clicking "download".  
•	Buy straight from our app to get essential new season garms delivered straight to your door. 
•	Don't have time right now? No worries, add those garms you're going heart eyed over to your wishlist to add to bag later. 
•	Just in need some inspo for the weekend? Browse our new in collections.
•	While you're on your phone - join our squad and share your selfie with the hashtag #PLTSTYLE.

Whatever your shopping needs, get in the know with 24/7 fast fashion on the go.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes & Improvements
comments: Can't log in to your account on the app so any favorites or items in the cart aren't there if you look on another device. You cant look at order history either. Other than that the app runs well.

Nice app. I havent ran into technical problems. Ran pretty smoothly. Although, I had to uninstall because I noticed that the app is not really linked with my account on the webpage. Yes it does have a link where you can go and log in, but whenever I see something I like the app makes it look like it's a whole different account. And when I go to the webpage the things I liked in the app are not on the webpage wishlist. In other words, would like the app to be intertwined with my webpage account.
Okay app. Keep having to log in to pay which is annoying. Not sure why the web account can't be linked inside the app to be more seamless.

I don't understand why their website online lets me convert the currency to Canadian but the app doesn't....? Bought a couple things off of their app, thinking it was the actual price it said it was, and got screwed when i got charged and extra $20 because I can't convert the currency to Canadian on the app, only converts to USA, UK or Ireland. If i knew that before i purchased anything from your website/app i would have done it online so it shows the real price. Why is not an option?Never know
Please update your app. Everytime I try to checkout it takes me to the log in page but when I put in my login info it says something's wrong and sends me to a complete white screen.

title: Klarna - Shop now. Pay later.
description:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
In the Klarna app, you can choose to Pay Later in 4 installments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

SHOP MORE GET MORE.
The more you use pay later in 4 installments with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock, as well as exclusive deals and offers, of course!

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Never pay too much for the stuff you love again. In the Klarna app you can find weekly deals and discounts for thousands of different products. The deals tab will always be updated as soon as another deal from our retailer network goes live.

SHOP EVERYWHERE IN ONE APP.
The Klarna app gives you a better way to discover, browse, and shop the stuff you love. Whether you’re looking for fashion, furniture or home electronics, you can check out any online store in our one-stop shopping portal and choose to pay later in 4 interest-free installments.

CREATE WISH LISTS.
Keep track of what you love. Browse online stores, pin your favorites, and share your saved items with friends. All in one app.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorited products go on sale.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through our app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after your order has been placed.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our log in is just as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN. And if you need help, our chat is open 24/7.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

recentChanges:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems.
Our in-app chat is always open. We solve your problems 24/7.
comments: I signed up for a Klarna account to spread the cost of an in-store purchase. All very convenient and easy to do. So far so good... Then downloaded the app... Oh Dear! Hopelessly clunky. Impossible to see a list of stores you can shop in without endless scrolling down. The search function is useless. Everything I tried was 'not found'. In summary; a great innovation let down by poor implementation in the app. Please, PLEASE provide an alphabetical list of stores and a summary of what they sell.

I wish I could leave an accurate review of this app as a whole but it won't even let me create an account! No errors, no connection issues. The email come through, I click the link, it "logs me in" and... I'm back at the create an account/log in screen. I've tried this more than once with the same results. Edit: I've always gotten the emails just fine it won't let me log in after. It just keeps taking me back to the log in screen after I click the link, which I stated before....

I have no problem when it comes to 50 buck purchases, however, I made my first purchase of 80 Thursday evening and it creates three different ghost cards without my knowledge. Of course it taking out 20 still, but it's so sporadic and unorganized, so when I see the notification 'you made a 39.07 payment to Klarna!' I freak out and think I gave you guys access to my bank account. I think after I finish paying off my purchases, I'm going to uninstall as I'm uncomfortable with what's going on.

RANDOM HARD CREDIT CHECKS. Will only tell you after it's happened. Requested to delete account still without response. It's a great business concept, but let people know before they try to purchase a ghost card that a hard credit check will happen before proceeding. Show people their spending limits. This app is not great in comparison to other BNPL apps. - Reply to Klarna - I didn't want to risk lowering my credit rating like others, so I didn't use your app. I want my personal info removed

Worked for two purchases and then it just stopped working, mind you I payed off both purchases early, customer service is a joke, can never solve my issue. I literally just tried using the app again today after at least 4 months, I was told that it just be for the holidays but it's not. It just does not work anymore. Love the concept but I don't like how the company works it. If I could give a zero I would.

title: Newchic - Fashion Online Shopping
description:
Welcome to NewChic where the latest fashion meets the best price! As a one-stop fashion store online, Newchic is your right fashion destination with millions of high-quality items ranging from clothing, shoes, bags to accessories, beauty and home decor at affordable prices. Newchic always endeavors to inspire you in the pursuit of fashion while offering you an easy and fun shopping experience. Download the Newchic app now to to start a beautiful fashion journey.

Newchic APP Features: 
Shop What You Want
• Over 300+ daily new items added daily
• Over 140,000+ fashion products for women, men and children
• Best collection of trending items of this season
• Pick your favors and add it to the wishlist

Save You The Most
• $0.01 snatch in the NC app only
• $20% Off Coupons for every new friend
• A free gift for you when Invite a new friend
• Up to 75% OFF App exclusive deals for selected items
• Constant coupon giveaways, discounts, flash deals and weekend sales

Secure Buying and Payment
• 7/24 customer service and Live chat service for guaranteed purchasing 
• Buyer Protection on all your purchases with 14-day return or refund guarantee.
• 100% secure online payments includes Paypal, credit card, COD and more
• Convenient order management with shipment notifications and order tracking

Newchic APP sells:
Newchics offers a variety of fashion items include women’s & men’s clothing, plus sizes, maternity & kids clothing, shoes, bags, beauty, accessories, watch, jewelry, home decor and more. We also have some popular brands like Socofy, O-NEWE, Gracila, Ekphero and Brenice. Whatever the styles you prefer, Newchic will help you get the perfect look. 

Language Support
NewChic App is available for English, Arabic, Hindi, Spanish, French, Russian, German, Portuguese and Italian.

Get In Touch With Us
Newchic always tries to make progress with our customers on the fashion road. We'd love to hear from you! If you have any questions or suggestions about our APP, please email to service@newchic.com. 

Follow Newchic on: 
https://www.instagram.com/newchic_official/
https://www.facebook.com/LoveNewChic/

comments: So easy to use. And you can track your order so easily with This app. Best app.

A lot of bugs but have great products with great discounts. Edit: Sent 6 mails and no answer and no solution. Time to downgrade my rate to 1* Edit2: any emails answered. All my reported bugs still on app. Then still 1* because don't have 0*

This app is literally like wish , aliexpress etc. . Except everything on here is overly priced . There's limited options .I've found better quality and good looking items on wish and such apps that cost sometimes less then half of the prices on here. NOT WORTH IT .
Had a problem getting an order update at first, but they seem to be more responsive through live chat
The interface and ease of navigation is so addictive, you can't stop buying stuff! Off course if you're a fan of their products. which I am.

title: DealDash: Bid, Save, Win & Shop Deals and Auctions
description:
Top 5 reasons to download the app & save money with Deal Dash

1) Save up to 99% on your favorite brands & products
2) Win Electronics, Gift Cards, Home Items, Jewelry, Beauty, Apparel, Holiday Vacation Stays, Tools and more
3) Always free shipping, no reserve prices
4) Only brand new items with original manufacturer’s warranty
5) Everything sells from DealDash or trusted partner stock - untrusted third party sellers are NOT allowed to sell on DealDash

Bid & save on online auctions for warehouse deals, closeout auctions, manufacturer stock, overstock surplus, wholesale offers and more.

Upcoming featured Auctions:

Apple iPhone X 256 GB Model
KitchenAid Mixers
Apple Macbooks
PlayStation 4 (PS4) Bundles
Gift Cards to Walmart, Target and more
… plus tens of thousands of other auctions every month!

DealDash has been in business for soon 10 years, selling top name brands at deeply discounted prices.

We serve more than 15,000,000 registered shoppers and hold an A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

How Does DealDash Work?

1. Browse Auctions - All items sold on DealDash are brand new and come with manufacturer warranties. DealDash works directly with leading retailers and brands and sells items from their own or their trusted partners' warehouse stock.

2. Buy Bids - Bids allow you to participate in the auctions that enable you to save money on best-selling brand name items. You’re can purchase bids in a variety of different pack sizes. Bids can be usually purchased for less than $0.20 each.

3. Start Bidding - All auctions start at $0.00. Each bid placed adds one penny to the final price of the item. Each bid restarts the timer to 10 seconds to allow a chance for someone else to place a bid. All items are guaranteed to sell! There are never reserve prices and the items can go for as low as 99% off.

4. Win & Save Up to 99% - When no more bids are placed, the last bidder wins the auction. The winner gets the item for the discounted price and shipping is always FREE. Just like in a regular auction with no reserves, the excitement comes from the fact that any bid can be the last one!

5. What Happens If You Don’t Win? - Don’t worry! When you don’t win you can get all your bids back if you buy the item at its ‘Buy It Now & Get Your Bids Back’ price listed in the auction.

DealDash has been featured in the Financial Times, CNBC, Huffington Post and holds the highest A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

Need any help with our Auctions? We’re happy to help 7 days a week! 

Get in touch with our customer service team by writing to community@dealdash.com.

comments: This site is a complete waste of time and money. Designed to profit off all your bids you pay for. Don't download you'll regret it. I've never felt so robbed before by an app like dealdash every auction I played in i watched new ppl jump in after the 5 dollar cut off was in effect. This is done to run up your bids and waste your money.
I would not use. You need to pay for bids. The cheapest bundle is almost $70

I've spent hundreds on this app, I've won a few good items but mostly I trade them in for more bids to bid on a better item which ends up being a waste cause it's to hard to compete with the ones that's been on this site for 10 years and have fifty thousand bids built up and always bid on the good items...

Horrible and fake app uses bots to outbid you everytime and as soon as you stop bidding the bots do too and items say they get sold it's all fake wasted over $200 and didnt win anything good ever only the same bots keep winning
You all can cheated me out of the bid deal to hing four times i never got to bid one time has screwed me out of almost 400$ it needs to be getting fixed now....

title: Fashion 15
description:
At Fashion 15 Below, we feature over 10,000 fashion-forward, trendy choices of clothing, jewelry, and fashion accessories for $15 and below.

Features:
- Browse all of our most recent arrivals and promotions
- Easy ordering and checkout with credit or debit card
- Waitlist items and purchase them when they are back in stock

- Choose between local pickup or direct shipping
descriptionHTML:
At Fashion 15 Below, we feature over 10,000 fashion-forward, trendy choices of clothing, jewelry, and fashion accessories for $15 and below.

Features:
- Browse all of our most recent arrivals and promotions
- Easy ordering and checkout with credit or debit card
- Waitlist items and purchase them when they are back in stock
- Email notification for order fulfillment and shipping
- Choose between local pickup or direct shipping
summary: The best way to shop with Fashion 15 on Android!
developerAddress: 3001 9th Avenue SW, Huntsville, AL 35805
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Great App and shopping experience. Excellent quality of clothes and fast shipping.
Great! Organized wonderfully and user friendly! It makes me want to spend too much money on amazing clothing 🤣
I love the selections and the easy use of this app!
Easy to use, makes shopping a breeze!
If something is sold out, it should be removed. I'm constantly wanting to order stuff that is sold out.

title: ALDI USA
description:
ALDI is your home for incredibly low prices on all your grocery needs. Now, you can stay up-to-date on our latest offers with the ALDI app.

Features:

* Weekly ALDI Finds Updates: With just one click you can get each week's ALDI Finds right at your fingertips.

* Create a Shopping List: Easily use our shopping list tool to create your list of must-have items.

* Store Locator: Find nearby ALDI stores from your current location – all with their address, directions, map and store hours.

* QR Code Reader: Use our QR Code Reader to view special content on some of your favorite items.


----


Permissions

* Network communication: This permission is used for the retrieval of the current Special Buys and the most recent store data. Information on the user is not transmitted, except for when using the e-mail reminder service. Please refer to our data protection policy for further information.

* Network communication: Before the most recent information is retrieved, a check will be carried out to determine whether a data connection is actually available. If this is not the case, a corresponding notification message will be displayed.

* System boot: Up until now, any reminders set via this app were deleted when rebooting the smartphone. This error did not affect e-mail reminders. With this new permission, the reminders will be reregistered in the system upon each reboot.

* Access to protected storage: This will enable the ALDI USA app to allow Google Maps to cache the map. The ALDI USA app will not directly access your external storage media.

* Approximate location: Using GPS requires a comparably high level of performance. Therefore, the ALDI USA app will initially try to determine your location for the Store Locator functionality by other means.

* Your location: The GPS location is required for the Store Locator functionality.

* Hardware controls (pictures/videos, vibration alarm, flash/light): The nearest stores can be displayed by means of augmented reality functionality. In addition, many of the QR codes printed on our product packages can be scanned via the “QR Code Reader.”

comments: This app is pretty good for making a list of the special finds you want to purchase. Previously, you could see the finds sorted in your list by which date they were released. Then you could see them sorted by release, though there was no date attached. Now it seems they are all piling together in one mixed up list, which is not useful. You can't delete items based on how old they are.

Not very helpful. I use this app to see what the special buys will be every week, but it no longer separates the list of saved items by date. It's a pain to try to remember which week everything I'm interested in is on sale. The grocery list feature is not user friendly. It would be nice to see what's available or not at my local Aldi. I love shopping at Aldi, but I wish their app was more than just a weekly ad.

I liked this app until the past 2-3 weeks. Or seems to have some glitches going on. 1. The zoom in messes up or won't work at all when trying to get a better look at something. (It's not my phone) 2. When looking at each category the list doesn't go to the top right away, but goes very slow and jerky to the top. It will not let you scroll up. It will pop back down and do it's slow jerky scrolling itself. It's very frustrating. Will give 5☆'s when fixed.

Useless. You can't search by product (ie - mayonnaise), when you do find an item, majority are listed without price but rather "see price in store." I want to be able to search all items on my list and have a good idea how much the total is before I go. Check out the Ralph's app for how it should be done. I love Aldi and am so disappointed with this "app" About the only functionality was to be able to look at the weekly ad.

Maybe I am not using it properly, but I would like to be able to click and choose from a product catalog to make my shopping list rather than just typing in what I want to add. I probably won't use the price option because I don't know the prices. Am I expecting something the list option isn't meant to do?

title: Walmart
description:
Online shopping with the app! Find. Shop. Save. Easy! 

The best way to shop online for millions of products 

• Order, transfer, and track Rx prescriptions and refills with Walmart Pharmacy. 

• Order wall art, blankets, posters, general photo prints and cards with Walmart Photo Print. 

• See and then shop available items. With Store Maps/Item Finder, we’ll show you exactly where to find the best location to buy your items at the store. 

• Even create and share your Baby Registry with friends and family with the Walmart Registry feature. 

 

Shop online hassle-free 

• Free shipping with no membership fee! Look no further for other shopping stores, get millions of items delivered in as little as two days. Details below*. 

• Online shopping at your convenience. Faster pickup at the store! Check in from your phone. 

• Easily reorder the essential items you’ve purchased at the store and online. 

 

Big dollar savings just a few taps away 

• Use the Walmart shopping app to save more dollars by finding general sales, the best deals, weekly ads, and store specials. 

• Pay in store safe, secure, and fast with Walmart Pay. Plus, save a tree with receipts! 

•Transfer money without the long wait or the paperwork! Instead, use the app’s Express Money Services. 

Save money. Live better. Download the Walmart shopping app today.  

*Free shipping info: Orders placed before 2 PM get free shipping within two business days, not including weekends and holidays. Eligible items only. Min. order $35.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information.
Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link

recentChanges: Our engineers work diligently behind the scenes, providing Walmart customers with the best app experience. This version contains updated styling components across the app.
comments: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!!! EVERY TIME I go to Wal-mart now it's simple, quick & easy to price check items using the in app scanner & paying with Walmart pay is easier, faster, more secure & instead of keeping up with paper receipts an easy to find digital receipt is stored in the app making the return process easier, faster & more secure too... In my opinion everyone in the world that even walks in a Walmart store should download this app if they can! I love it that much!!!

The app is a bit buggy. The grocery app is way worse with bugs. But I want to be able to add things in my cart that are in the store only, not just things that are online. I say this BECAUSE the grocery app is buggy. Also, I'll click on something that says out of stock, and it's not, or something that isn't out of stock, but it is. This really needs to be fixed.

Hands down the best all around Consumer Store/Shopping App. From being able to save receipts, start a return, or lookup items and their inventories at multiple locations (which is pretty accurate), to accessing services such as sending/ receiving money or just plain shopping without leaving the comfort of your own home Walmart has set the new standard for other department stores, and so far I haven't come across one that is anywhere near as beneficial in numerous areas as them!!

I go to check out, see that an item isn't available for pickup today, go to edit my cart, and the last half hour of my time (which I could be using to unpack my apartment! ) was apparently wasted. The cart reset when I went to edit it, and now I have to go back and find all the items again. Thanks. Maybe look into this.

Stock information isn't accurate. The search says item is available, but when you select it, it's out of stock. Named In-store aisles don't exist, then the item is out of stock. You can make lists, but can't set alerts for availability. You can't select delivery or pickup before you get into the shopping cart. It's confusing to see pricing you can't fix until you pay. And you should be able to scan your pickup barcode to check in. Not retype order numbers. App needs refinement.

title: Ulta Beauty: Shop Makeup, Skin, Hair & Perfume
description:
Download the mobile app & discover how the possibilities are even more beautiful. Find your favorite makeup, skincare & haircare products—plus play with new looks in the GLAMlab, our virtual beauty try-on experience. Then check your Ultamate Rewards account & redeem points anytime, anywhere. 

- Book an appointment at your nearest Ulta Beauty Salon in a snap! Treat yourself to beauty services for hair, skin & more. 
- Shop by category & filter by brand, price, best sellers & new arrivals.
- Easily find a product using our barcode scanner to view product info, ratings, reviews & save your favorites; QR codes supported.
- Use voice search to search for a brand or product, simply by speaking its name.
- View weekly ads, gifts with purchase & special offers.
- Check out the new & improved GLAMlab! Virtually try on your favorites for eyes, lips & cheeks from top brands including Urban Decay, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Too Faced, NYX, MAC & more. 
- Send eGift Cards or Gift Cards by mail from your mobile device.
- Feel the love! Sign up for Ulta Beauty’s free Ultamate Rewards Program. 
- Access your existing Ultamate Rewards account to view bonus offers, current status & points balance. 
- Learn more & apply for the Ultamate Rewards Credit Card—another exciting way that beauty loves you back! 
- Get the latest skincare tips & trends with our monthly Skin-fatuation feature & haircare tips from our monthly style roundup, Hair Heroes.
- Opt-in for push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers on your favorite products & brands, as well as upcoming events at your nearest Ulta Beauty store. 
- Review your Ulta.com account order history and order tracking.
- Use the store locator to get directions to your nearest Ulta Beauty store, view hours & even book a Salon appointment!
- Share your favorite products & looks on your favorite social networks.
- Search for and quickly find recently viewed products using Spotlight Search.

recentChanges: Fixes to some production bugs for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!
comments: So much fun (and so easy!) to find the correct shade of foundation from right here at home! For me, getting the makeup color to match my skin color is a chore! It's always difficult, and that's a shame. Choosing makeup should be fun and indulgent, not a JOB! Ulta has now SOLVED this problem! This app will look at your skin color through your camera, and in a couple of minutes, VOILA! It shows you EXACTLY which shade and undertone you need, in all brands as far as I could tell. SOOOOO useful!

I have ordered several different times with the Ulta app. I absolutely love it. It is easy to use,let's you see how makeup will look on tou,before tou buy it,has quizzes you can take,to figure out what products are best suited for your needs, and you receive points for things that you buy. They also ship quickly.

Works great! Love that I can track my points and see how much I can redeem them for. Only thing is that I wish there was an easier way to add the $3.50 off / 20% off coupons to the check out easier. Something like "activate code" option would be nice, I know they already do this for some other special offers.

Edited 3/21/2020.. Still HORRIBLE and FRUSTRATING!!! I STILL have to create a new password EVERY time I use this App! Every time. Then the App works fine, until I try to sign in again. Edited... Installed the new version of App. I still have to create a new password every time I try to login! Every. Time.

Every time the app is updated I start getting error messages until I install it. Fine, it's still really useful for shopping. But the most recent update is buggy as all get out. It's not rendering a majority of product pages, which is extra frustrating since 21 days is a big buy month for me.

title: Kohl's - Online Shopping Deals, Coupons & Rewards
description:
Get online shopping deals, discounts and rewards with the Kohl’s app! From fashion to beauty, home furniture, clothing, shoes, electronics and more, you can access amazing shopping deals and manage your Kohl’s account on the go.
 
Discounts, coupons and rewards make the Kohl’s app your go-to online shopping tool. It’s packed with features to help you find the best deals, manage payments easily, and browse online and in store. 
 
Here are 5 reasons users love our online shopping app: 
 
1. Kohl’s Wallet – all offers, rewards and coupons in one place!
2. Shop online or in store – use the app as a price scanner, or browse deals on the go.
3.Kohl's Pay - We're giving you a simpler checkout with all your offers & Kohl's Cash loaded into one QR code.
4. Shopping deals on everything - Beauty, home, clothing, shoes, furniture, electronics & more!
5. Kohl’s Cash reminders- We’ll remind you when your rewards are about to expire, so you never miss a deal again.
 
And there’s more! With FREE SHIPPING, amazing shopping deals and FREE STORE PICKUP, the Kohl’s app helps you shop with ease – and save money!
 
Our features include:
 
KOHL’S WALLET 
 
Save some serious money with Kohl’s Wallet. It keeps all your rewards, coupons, discounts, and offers in one place – no more paper and no more forgetting! Plus, we’ll remind you to use them before they expire, so you don’t miss out!
 
SHOP ONLINE OR IN STORE
 
 
Shop your local store’s inventory, or use the app in store as a price scanner. Can’t find what you’re looking for in store? Buy it on the app while you’re in store and get FREE shipping.
 
KOHL'S PAY
 
Kohl's Pay is now quicker and easier. Quickly select all your coupons, discounts, savings offers, rewards and Kohl's Cash to load into a single scan QR code and breeze through checkout.
 
MY KOHL'S CHARGE
 
Payments just got a lot easier. The app keeps you signed in so you can quickly and easily check your Kohl's Charge balance and make payments.
 
SHOP KOHL’S AMAZING RANGE
 
From furniture to beauty, clothing, shoes, home and electronics, you can shop everything and more on the Kohl’s app! 
 
YES2YOU REWARDS
 
Track your points and progress toward your next $5 reward.
 
Download the Kohl’s app today and discover our huge range of fantastic products and amazing deals. From beauty to furniture, fashion and toys, you’ll be sure to find something you love at an awesome price!

comments: Lately thus app has been horrible!!!! I have uninstalled reinstalled shut off and restarted my phone numores of times and the app just hasn't worked. I'd be in it trying to search for items and the search takes forever but while in the middle of all this it just freezes and closes me out of the app. IT IS SO FREAKING IRRITATING AND FRUSTRATING!! nothing I do seems to help the app work...

I am so upset with this app. For 3 or more months I have not been able to log in and access my Kohl's account or wallet !! I would love for you to update the app so I can use it again !! I used to live the app and wallet features of the app. I have such a hard time shopping online at Kohl's without my app working properly. Very very upsetting

I don't have a problem signing in but I haven't been able to access my cart for a week now. It's just a blank screen and I've reinstalled the app twice. It would help if Kohl's actually gave us an easy option to contact them to provide feedback about their app, website, etc. so that they can be aware of/review/improve/fix issues. This app needs several other improvements, as well, it is outdated.

Kohls NEED to fix this app ASAP! For the last few months I have trouble seeing the items in my cart! Just recently I cant see any pictures of the items! It just keeps saying "images coming soon!" I uninstall and reinstall but it's still not working! I love shopping at Kohls but this app sucks! It's getting annoying too!

Seriously the most frustrating app on my phone. In have a kohls account, and know how to use shopping apps. Issues with this one: searching with the filter for availability to pickup at my store generates results that are not at all available, sometimes not even to ship; Kohls suggested items based on my recent views are often completely out of stock(!!!); app is slow to load each page

comments: Love the app! Great way to get the best offers and always keep me updated on specials going on in the store as well as online! Love that it's also interactive with its customers and has a live chat inside the app for any questions I might have
Constant errors. Used to work fine, then all of a sudden it's always crashing. Can't login to pay my credit card.
I love how you can order your clothing online and have them ship it to a store near you. I love how you don't interfere with any ads. I've had a couple of times where it would freeze.
Can't click anywhere without the app deciding to click somewhere else on the screen instead
I love it all i need at my fingertips Easy to manuevar. Love this app.

title: Dresslily——Fashion Shopping Trend
description:
Dresslily is an app that can be used to explore new fashion trends anytime, anywhere. Our app has already been downloaded over 100,000 . We offer high quality products at an affordable price, including: male/female clothes, dresses, coats, bags, shoes, accessories, furniture, and pet items, etc. We not only offer the latest outfit recommendations, but also have special weekend offers, exclusive app prices, and other discounts. Download the Dresslily app to see what’s on offer!
 *More great items and high-value discounts:
 1. Every new customer can receive a $59 cash coupon and 15% discount coupon.
 2. Receive free items on your first order.
 3. Non-stop discounts, flash sales, and special weekend prices.
 4. Exclusive discounts on some items that are only available from us. Up to 80% off certain items.
 5. 200+ new items every day.
 6. 100% secure online payment. Supports PayPal, credit cards, and other payment methods.
 7. Quick order management, and instantaneous order tracking and customer service.
 8. Direct customer feedback that allows you to quickly solve any issues you have.
 
 *We want to hear your voice：
 Official website: www.dresslily.com
 Join our Facebook page:www.facebook.com/groups/DressLily/group

comments: I have really enjoyed this app and everything I have received has been exactly like what the picture showed (or the reviews). I do think that reading the reviews is a MUST in order to find out the quality of your item because the photos don’t show it very well and because you can find out how the sizing is. Overall I think that with fun daily incentives, quick shipping that is traceable, cute clothes, and insightful reviews, this app really is one of the best.

At first I was skeptical thinking it would be just like the wish app, but really it’s sooo much better! The deals are great and there are soo many things to choose from for only 4.99 shipping! There are so many discounted items you can get at the store for a MUCH higher price! They have all sizes for clothes and shoes! And you can look at what other people rated on the item to see if it’s the one for you! Overall, this app is amazing!

I use this when I need something new and it comes within a week which is good for online shopping sites. I love to shop on here, I always find tons of new stuff, and I can get lost shopping on here for hours. If you’re looking for any new clothes, accessories, or anything else this a great site!!

I'll be honest,this is just the PERFECT app to buy clothes, decorarions, makeup, and really anything you'd like! The prices are sooo low and the quality is sooooo great! I hope they keep up with that, especially the variety of things on there. Love this app.

I overall love this app I can shop for things that I wouldn’t see in regular stores and in the section where I saw others peoples outfits and you could click on the picture and it would show you the clothes that were from the app. this app is really helpful and there are loads of amazing things on here. This app is the best for online clothes shopping I hope one day everyone is using it.

title: ZAFUL - My Fashion Story
description:
ZAFUL, not only a clothing app,but also your fashion story, gives you unlimited access to inspiration anytime, anywhere. It has become one of the most popular fashion brands in the world, with more and more young customers choosing ZAFUL as their go-to choice for sharing their thoughts on fashion.

What you can find on the ZAFUL App:

1. BIG BONUSES and EPIC DEALS:

a. Extra 15% off for new members.
b. Flash sales with prices as low as $0.99 every Thursday.
c. Big chances to win in our $1000 giveaways in 'Community'.
d. Special offers for students.
e.A great of selection of new arrivals for you every Monday.
f.Vip day on 18th-20th per month.
g. 30-day complete satisfaction guarantee with full refunds*.

2. Adorable high-quality swimwear, sweaters, sweatshirts, bikinis, one-pieces, tees, blouses, hoodies, jackets, two-piece outfits, rompers, jumpsuits, bodysuits, casual dresses, print dresses, skirts, jeans, men’s hoodies, sports attire, plus size clothing, beautiful accessories, sexy lingerie and more.

3. BE INSPIRED by our practical fashion methodology:

a. Direct the current trends with street snap and try-on hauls from our fashion icons. 
b. Personalize and create your outfit under guidance.
c. Search for a personal stylist from 'Recommendations'.
d. Add your favorite items to "My Favorites" or "Wishlist". 
e. More than 1000+ products updated daily. There must be at least one style that suits you.
We wish that you have a perfect fashion shopping experience.

comments: I suggest you show what size the model in the picture is wearing. And have more organized categories. When i use the filter to have a more specific search, alot of things disappear. I always feel like the website has more items than the search is showing me. Aside from those technical website/app issues, the actual products are good quality and very unique. I also love the packaging.

The app is so frustrating when making a purchase as it kept going in a loop about the address while in the mean time the purchase has gone through so now I am not even sure if everything is correct. Also it has doesn't accept my password created.

Your FB ads link to the app rather than the website. This means having to download the app, which then prompts to you make an account before showing you the store. When I finally got to the page of the item I wanted, it wasn't in my size. A lot of effort for absolute nothing. Make your ads link to the website and it'd be a far easier and more pro-costumer move. As is, I am left associating your brand with "frustration"

The main problem i personally have with this app is that it does not have a good "refine".I mean, it does not have a good amount of options,the only tree it has are "size" "color" and "price range".It's not enough,i prefer to have a lot of choose between the filter i want to add at a certain category(like what kind of jeans do you want,the skinny one,the culotte one,the wide leg one...)like in other app like this one.BUT except for this the app is good,the choise is very varied and i like it.

It was great and all but suddenly one day it signed OUT of my email, and I didn't do that! So every time I want to sign in it says the account is already in use!! I can't go back into my old account!!!! Everything was on it the stuff I wanted to buy!! Zaful please fix this as fast as you can😡

title: Foot Locker: Sneakers, clothes & culture
description:
Calling all sneakerheads! The Foot Locker App is your link to FLX rewards, classic kicks, hot launches and more.

NEW! Join FLX and get rewarded
• Earn points across all of our brands
• Free standard shipping with no minimum
• Redeem XPoints in the rewards center for exclusive products, experiences and even gift cards
• Receive a special birthday gift
• Take advantage of member-only sales and events
• Access to special gift with purchase promotions
• Receive Head Starts on many of the latest releases just by being an FLX member!
• Plus, as you move up in status you will receive even more rewards

Get Dibs on new releases
• NEW! Keep track of all your reservations with the new My Releases feature
• NEW! Receive Head Starts just for being an FLX member, join today to improve your odds at scoring a reservation
• Know what's next with the Release Calendar
• Get notifications on hot new releases before others by opting in to push notifications

Shop
• For the latest heat in footwear and clothing
• Browse your brand: Jordan, Nike, adidas, Reebok, and more
• Find your nearest shop with the Store Locator
• Scan your credit card right in the app to streamline the checkout process
• Access My Account to save your payment and shipping info for faster checkout.
• Learn all about the latest in sneaker culture and sneaker news

Shop Foot Locker anytime, anywhere!

comments: Updated to flx points now i have points for things i would never want. On top of that, i can log into the app, keep getting an invalid refresh error message. Just like your footaction app, expect with different issues. Also, it won't show where upcoming launches are dropping. Nice update 👍

Only allows you to purchase. Can't see your orders, can't view/edit account, can't track packages, and the new points system is trash. Not to mention your points don't convert over and customer service is absolutely NO help! Good thing there are SOOO many other options for me to spend my money. Nice in theory, complete failure in action

This new update is horrible at best, nothing I've done prior has converted over, there's always an error message when I try to see my account information and customer service is of no help at all. I've spent over $2,000 in less than 9 months and this is how you treat paying customers???

This app has been wack for the past few months couldn't log in. Once updated on android I get an error message, mind you it's not just Foot Locker it's also Foot Action & Champs. Definitely deleting all affiliated apps. Sucks especially because the customer service is non existent!!!

New app sucks, they erased all rewards points and have to call and be placed on hold for 30 minutes just to get reward codes. They are trying to wipe away all rewards that ppl have accumulated. They ought to be ashamed of themselves.

title: Ibotta: Cash Back Savings, Rewards & Coupons App
description:
Ibotta is a free app that gives you real cash back on every purchase. Earn real cash back every time you shop online or in store, from picnic supplies to summer wardrobe essentials.

Save money with Ibotta: simply check the app before you shop, travel, dine out, or go to the grocery store to seamlessly earn cash back on thousands of leading brands and retailers, including Walmart, Target, and many more. No coupon, rebate, or promo code necessary — just shop and earn cash back on groceries, apparel, home improvement, travel, home decor, and more.

Earn cash back instantly with our newest feature: Pay with Ibotta! Shop and use Pay with Ibotta to pay for your purchases right from the app, then earn cash back on your entire purchase, instantly.

Ibotta isn’t your average coupon app. You can earn real cash just for shopping for the things you buy every day! Unlike most coupon apps, Ibotta lets you grow your savings — just shop, redeem offers, and you'll see cash back in your account!

Money-saving is easy when you get rewarded with cash back every time you shop. Download the free app now for your chance to earn a $20 welcome bonus.

HOW IBOTTA WORKS:
1. Find money-saving offers – Before you go shopping, find and add offers in the app for things you want to buy.
2. Go shopping – Shop at your favorite stores, retailers, restaurants, bars, and apps
3. Redeem offers – Upload your receipt or link your loyalty card for instant cash back.
4. Get cash back – Watch your savings grow! When you’re ready, withdraw your cash earnings via PayPal or your choice of a variety of gift cards.

Ibotta is the easiest way to save money every time you shop.

WHY IBOTTA?
- Our money-saving app is free and easy to use
- No coupons, mail-in rebates, or promo codes
- Save money and earn real cash back
- Earn cash rewards at over 500,000 brands and retailers

SAVE MONEY WITH IBOTTA
- Our average user earns $150+ a year by using Ibotta
- Earn cash back on every shopping trip
- Without cutting coupons, you can find grocery deals to earn cash back at your favorite supermarkets, and grocery stores.
- Save money when you book travel for a getaway or vacation. From flights to hotels to rental cars, you can earn cash back on your whole trip!
- Ibotta helps you save money for all the things that matter, from family expenses to party essentials.

MONEY SAVING OFFERS AT ALL YOUR FAVORITE STORES:
- Walmart
- Uber
- Safeway
- Drizly
- Hotels.com
- CVS
- Target
- Kroger
- DoorDash
- Groupon
- Minibar
- AMC Tickets
- eBay
- HotelTonight
- Thrive Market
- The Home Depot
- HotelStorm
- Jet.com
- eBags
- Olive Garden
- Kohl’s
- Lowe’s
- Boxed
- Best Buy
- Bed Bath & Beyond
- JOANN Fabrics

recentChanges:
Stay safe out there, friends. We’re doing everything we can to keep Ibotta running smoothly, so you can shop the things you need to keep yourself and your family healthy.

comments: I have had the ibotta app for awhile. It was exciting at first due to I was shopping and using my ibotta app to earn money. Then I couldn't reset my password to cash out. I sent at least 5-6 emails to the ibotta team and its not working. Everytime i tred to reset it, it said someone else is using the email. So now i can't use my cash back and store reciepts. Its not worth the time. All this work I've done I am through.

This app is a SCAM! Horrible customer service! Once I almost reached the $20 threshold required in order to cash out, suddenly I'm locked out of my account. Constant errors when trying to login, I've been getting a "Please try again" error message for 2 weeks. Unable to reset password, absolutely no help from their lack of customer service. I've filed complaints with the app store, and with the BBB. And the dev response below is Garbage. I did what they said and still nothing. SCAM! Try Rakuten

I initially gave 5 stars, but then I had to change it to 3 solely because it seems like the offered items are items I don't use. There used to be the "For You" selection that recommended items based on what you regularly buy or save, but lately my "For You" selection has been extremely off and the overall selection seems to have diminished. If I do redeem anything, it's for non-brand specific items. Then, when I do not redeem for a certain time, an amount is deducted from my overall savings.

I like the savings with this app and learning about new products. I do geel it could be more user friendly and that at least you should always have credit for wntering a receipt. Also even if you can connect your card you should also be able to submit a receipt. I missed out on 3 deals from a new store because I did not know I needed to connect the card before I went. I spent all that time looking up deals and then did not get them.

The recent update removed the QR code option, and the barcode scanner almost NEVER WORKS. Entering the 20 digit code manually is an unfriendly hassle of a user experience. I'm just about DONE with Ibotta now. It's used to be a good working, friendly, pleasant app. Now it's a hassle, and worst of all, it only finds me a mere FRACTION of the money it used to. Almost worthless now.

title: AliExpress - Smarter Shopping, Better Living
description:
Ever wanted to shop everything in one place, at one time? We’ve created just the app for you! With thousands of brands and millions of items at an incredible value, AliExpress is the go-to app for those in the know. 

Shop what’s new and now from home to health, tech to toys and sports to shoes (plus the hottest fashion around) every day. And, let’s not forget all our deals! From flash and super deals to coupons and more, you can get the best items at the best prices in a swipe.

There are countless reasons to love shopping on the AliExpress app but here are some of our favorites:

• Millions of trendy and unique items
• Easy search, so you can find what you want quickly
• Image search, so you can find unique items easily and quickly 
• Coupons, discounts, flash and super deals, so you’ll always get the best price
• Free shipping on over 75% of our items
• Order management and automatic shipping notifications
• Buyer Protection on all your purchases
• Secure online payment
• Personalized feeds, with items picked especially for you

Language Support
We’re global, so our app is too! We support English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Bahasa Indonesian, Thai, Italian, German, French, Hebrew, Korean, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Vietnamese, Japanese and Ukrainian.

Currency Support
Our app currently supports 8 different currencies for payment (Euros, US Dollars, Canadian Dollars, Australian Dollars, Japanese Yen, British Sterling, Russian Rubles and Swedish Krona), plus another 6 currencies for browsing (Brazilian Real, Indian Rupee, Ukrainian Hryvnia, Indonesia Rupiah, Mexican Peso and Turkish Lira).

Tell Us What You Think
Like us? Love us? Can't get enough of the AliExpress app? Let us know! We'd love to hear your thoughts. Plus, if you see any areas for improvement while using our app, tell us that, too! We take all feedback seriously and use it for constant improvement. Drop us a line in the app by tapping "More" then "App Suggestion".

comments: Worst app ever you will be lucky to receive anything you purchase. When installed it permits itself to control and make changes to every single function on your device it can even control your wifi, scary eh! It gets worse, when you figure it out and disable all these self appointed permissions the device requires a security update a day or so later and everything goes back to the way it was. You are given the option to disable cookies but you can't actually do it .DO NOT INSTALL

I really enjoyed use this app, I being used for almost 4 yrs now, and I really like the price the items and the enormously variation of items. Most everything arrives between 1to 3 months ( 3months was the maximum that I have to wait for a T-shirt one time), and I never get any troubles using my debit card, and they customer service is amazing, never fall me when I need a refund or exchange ect.

I love this app! I think it is wonderful and so much better than wish! This app is fantastic and I shop on it almost constantly! I do wish that they would watch their products a little bit more, just to make sure that no one's ripping people off. I have seen one or two products that were not as the description!! but they are getting really good aboit catching thay stuff!!

Not intuitive and nor easy to use. Need to go hunt around as some function/features not in obvious location. Re-evaluate: Still not intuitive to navigate. Had to sign in whenever I need to confirm delivery. Then had to look high and low for the pages. There are other online site that is very easy to use which I patronise more than this site.

You site is cool but don't like it when you keep suggesting that you know what I am looking for. If I search for an item but the App keeps suggesting that I like other kind of products and every time I open the App the same previous items appear as if I were to keep loving them. I hate that and sometimes feel angry and uninstall the App and will Install it again the next time I wanna shop. I know that's what you think is that people love the same kind of things they search for in the engine

title: Rue La La - Shop Top Fashion
description:
OVERVIEW
Shopping your faves just got faster and easier. Not a Rue La La Member? No problem. It’s free and you can join quickly right from our award-winning app. With exclusive sales, delivery alerts, order tracking, and Boutique reminders, you’ll never miss a stylish beat. 

TOP FEATURES
+ Exclusive sales: Get special access to app-only sales. (Make sure you have push notifications enabled to stay up to date.)
+ Shipping perks: Get 30 days of unlimited shipping after you make your first purchase.
+ Delivery alerts: Track all of your orders and get real-time notifications when they arrive. 
+ Easy checkout: Check out in just one tap. Also, add new credit cards with our easy-to-use credit card scanning functionality.
+ Shop by category: Filter sales to shop by brand, color, and size. Sort them to shop by best sellers or price.
+ Syncing across devices: Add a product to your bag on one device and your cart stays with you on all of your other devices. 
+ Social sharing: Show your friends those sought-after heels you just bought via Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, email, or SMS. They’ll thank you for it.

BEST-SELLING BRANDS
PANDORA Jewelry
Louis Vuitton
Burberry
Tory Burch
Brooks Brothers
Ray-Ban
Cole Haan
Stuart Weitzman
Valentino

CATEGORIES
+ Women: Trending shoes, boots, dresses, skirts, swimwear, maternity, and more for your closet. Score beautiful colors and shop trending luxe marketplace brands like Louis Vuitton, Burberry, Tory Burch, and Valentino.
+ Men: Trending shoes, dress shirts, dress pants, sport coats, colorful swimwear, and more for your closet. Trending luxe marketplace brands include Brooks Brothers, Cole Haan, and many more. 
+ Kids: Shoes, shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, swimwear, and more for their closet. 
+ Accessories: Trending jewelry, watches, luggage, socks, gadgets, and more must-haves. Trending luxe marketplace brands include PANDORA Jewelry, Ray-Ban, and many more.
+ Home: Furniture, luxe bedding, bath musts, sheets and towels, kitchenware, cooking essentials, and more trending décor.
+ Travel: Trending, super luxe vacation destinations and packages for a steal.

HAVE QUESTIONS? 
Email mobilehelp@ruelala.com or contact a Rue La La Concierge at ruelala.com/help and we’ll be happy to help make your experience better.

comments: I have been using this app for almost 3 years now. I open it and browse products mainly for fun. Improvements have been made with navigating brands and using the back arrow keys. I highly reccomend looking over the boutique. Their concierge of service makes me feel like royalty. It is interesting to run searches like towels, lighting, art, etc...
Good quality items, easy to return items that dont work. I would never buy "final sale" items because you are truly stuck with them if they dont work.
Love this app!!! Buy a lot from it🤑 The only improvement I'd say, would be great if It had a "save for later" button. Because, you know...we girls are indecisive sometimes 😁😁 With respect, Yelena
Easy to shop anytime. No issues navigating the site. Great to have access to the boutiques no matter where I am.

Rue La La makes it too easy and affordable to wear fabulous clothes. All the scrolling has clearly defined what I know won't work, so I can quickly get to those shapes and styles that I know do. Way to go Rue La La!

title: ASOS
description:
Here’s the situation: fresh pieces dropping daily, exclusive ranges you can't get anywhere else and new brands being added all the time – plus free delivery and returns. Wherever and whoever you are, exploring your style never felt so good.

With the ASOS app for Android, you can: 

- FIND & SAVE WHAT YOU WANT 
You can still shop every piece you'll find on ASOS. Search by type, size, brand, price and color, or browse and buy our trend and occasion edits. Plus, your Saved Items and Shopping Bag sync between your devices, too – genius.

- ENJOY SUPER-EASY CHECKOUT 
Add a new credit card with our camera card scanner (#techy) for our quickest checkout ever. 

- GET HANDY SALE ALERTS 
Our push notifications can alert you as soon as sales start and remind you when they're ending, so you’ll never miss a bargain. Sweet!

- SHARE YOUR PICKS 
In two minds? Seen something your bestie would like? Involve your friends via WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, Google+ and email.

- SEE THE CLOTHES ON THE CATWALK
Check out the fit and cut – our signature catwalk videos for clothes, shoes and accessories are also in the app. 
Order on the app for deliveries to 242 countries worldwide including Denmark, Netherlands, Singapore and Sweden. We’re always improving and genuinely love hearing your feedback, so email us at androiddev@asos.com or follow us on Twitter @ASOS_Heretohelp

Beta it! Want to help us test out our newest, coolest app features? Become a beta tester: https://goo.gl/aHs7zy

comments: The app is just so easy to use that I rarely go on the website anymore! Super user friendly browsing, saving, & shopping. Does exactly what it says on the lid. Can't praise it enough, really, or ASOS, for that matter.

Easy to navigate. Very user friendly in terms of saving items, being able to create boards and how they show you similar options should what you like be sold out. I also like how they show you how they clothed the model and give you the option to buy the outfit.

Love ASOS! One of the few shops that do decent plus size clothing. I love that they cater for both men and women and also several categories. This is the first place I look for clothing and check the 'New In' clothing every day. Xxx

Very pleasantly surprised by the app. Long-time user of the website & am delighted with the features that you can be notified when an item comes back into stock, and suggestions of similar items if a saved item is out of stock. Very helpful.
Took me long enough to try the app, glad I did. It's fast, easy to maneuver and keeps track of your searches. Your account info is easy to find and the pic galleries and videos are better than ever.

title: Depop - Streetwear & Vintage Fashion Marketplace
description:
Buy and sell your clothes, sneakers, streetwear and more on the fashion community’s ultimate streetwear & vintage fashion marketplace, Depop. Shop streetwear brands, rare vintage pieces and discover the latest trends, all from your phone.

Mobile fashion marketplace ⎼ How does it work?
• Buying and selling ⎼ Browse listing from +18M users or create your own in just a few steps
• Streetwear brands ⎼ Yeezy, adidas, Supreme, Champion, Off-White... find all your favorites
• Vintage fashion ⎼ Buy and sell rare and one-off vintage pieces
• Sneakers galore ⎼ Nike Air Jordans, adidas Ultraboosts, Vans and more; buy and sell your kicks here
• Fashion community ⎼ Connect with people who are buying and selling from across the globe

Find fashion inspiration, follow friends and connect with people who inspire you. From vintage pieces or the hottest streetwear brands, Depop has them all. Whether you’re buying the latest Yeezy trainers or selling accessories from Urban Outfitters, our fashion marketplace makes everything easy for you.

CLOTHES SHOPPING
Use in-depth filters to find the clothes you’re looking for; search by item, brand, size, price range, and more. You can also view the clothes or accessories we’ve chosen for you based on your interests. So if you’re a lover of brands like Urban Outfitters or you prefer Yeezy or Supreme, we’ll find pieces you love.

STREETWEAR BRANDS
From Nike and adidas to Supreme, Off-White, Champion and more ⎼ buying or selling your streetwear couldn’t be easier. Get creative with your look or let others inspire you. Before the trends hit the streets, they land on Depop.

SNEAKERS
Find an amazing collection of new and vintage sneakers. Sneakerheads will love our vast collection of kicks and sellers. With everything from Off-White, Yeezy to Nike, come on in and take a look ⎼ your grail sneakers might be closer than you think.

BRANDS & LABELS
Our fashion marketplace, lets you find the brands you love ⎼ at the best prices. Whether you’re casually clothes shopping for pieces from Urban Outfitters or looking for your sneaker grail, we’ve got you covered. Buy and sell popular brands like:

Champion
Adidas
Nike
Champion
Off-White
Supreme
Vans
Urban Outfitters
Yeezy
...and many more

DEPOP COMMUNITY
Depop also hosts a range of events like local meetups, Lunch & Lists, and Depop parties across the globe, so you can meet and chat with sellers, artists, and influencers.

Join the Depop community and connect with +18M stylists, designers, artists, collectors, vintage sellers, sneakerheads and more. Follow up-and-coming fashion influencers and be the first to discover the latest trends.

Download Depop now! See you on the Explore page.
