comments: This app is very good bc instead of just small or medium or large sizes it actually has actually measurements so then you definitely know if the outfit is going to fit you! You can sell things on it too, some outfits or clothing-wise are somewhat expensive but you just have to find the right seller! And if you want to make sure the outfit actually fits you, you can message the seller!! I definitely recommend this app!!

Love the app, everyone on here is lovely and it's pretty easy to find stuff I dig. Hoping to sell some of my own stuff too soon, so can only speak as a buyer for now. One issue, sometimes I get this bug where I like an item and the images are replaced with the next item in the explore page... Not sure what would cause this, hope it's patched out soon but not a world ender <3

Some sellers just spam tag on popular keywords/brands making it hard to find what you really want making newer users feel discouraged (search vintage Nike t-shirt and all you get is random tshirts). Listings probably have to be made into sections (or just be able to mute a seller from search) where the title of the listing is only used in search, so sellers don't take advantage of keywords and chuck a heap of brands on the bottom of their description making it easier to find what you want.

It seems like a nice app, but I can't really use it because I can't use PayPal, if they had the Email Transfer option I could use it, but I guess I'll just have to delet this app. People post things for very cheap and good prices, but I can't buy or sell anything because I can't use PayPal.

Overall the app is great! From my experience it is the perfect platform for younger people to start learning about resell and being involved in the fashion community. The app itself could sometimes be bugging with unresponsive buttons. I understand during high traffic hours, is can take multiple attempts to post a listing. On some occasions messages or notifications wont send. I am hopeful that these issues will be fix and the UI will be improved as the app continues to go through updates!

title: Lulus
description:
Whether you’re looking for the latest trends or shopping for classic pieces to add to your closet, you can find it all on the Lulus app! Shop for every occasion with our selection of cute casual dresses, bridal gowns and bridesmaid dresses, formal, lounge, and activewear, rompers and jumpsuits, trendy separates, denim, shoes, accessories and more, all from your phone in this easy-to-use app.

Get free shipping on all orders over $50 and free returns on our entire collection of curated styles.  Never miss a sale again with notifications for app-only and promotions and deals, including exclusive app-only coupons and early access to major sales.

Hundreds of new arrivals are added each week and styles sell out fast, making the Lulus app the place to be to find exactly what you want and need. Search for the perfect item and save your favorites to curate your dream wardrobe from our consistently updated collection. See new styles before anyone else with app-exclusive product launches and instant access to the latest arrivals. 

Discover the latest trends and get style advice, see product reviews and photos from real Lulus customers to know which products will work for you, and get inspired with photos from our #lovelulus ambassadors to help you put together the perfect outfit for wherever your life takes you.

Get a personalized shopping experience with our product recommendations and stylist chat, manage your Lulus account, track your orders, write reviews, and check your status on Love Rewards, the Lulus customer loyalty program.  Access our student discount and refer-a-friend program to unlock additional offers.

Be sure to sign up for our emails (new customers get 15% off!) and don’t forget to tag #lovelulus on Instagram for a chance to win $250 every week!

comments: App is well done. Could use more filters to narrow down for an easier shopping experience (ie length of dress) but it was well designed and easy to use!
2 stars for the app. Can't login to my account. I have no problems using the website.
I love every item I order from Lulu's! The app makes it just that much easier to shop!
Love it ! Easy to shop dresses are true to size.
Love the clothes, the shoes, the bag.... Love it all!!!😊😊😊

title: GUESS 81
description:
Enjoy 15% Off and Free Shipping on your first in-app purchase. 

Discover New Features:

SHOPPING IS REWARDING
Pair the app with our GUESS List loyalty program to get the VIP treatment and earn bonus points. GUESS List members can redeem points for cash rewards, and access their digital card through the app.

ALL THE PERKS
Be the first to shop special collections, collaborations, and new arrivals. GUESS List members will have access to exclusive in-app offers and be notified about nearby events.

title: HSN Phone Shop App
description:
The award winning HSN Shop App for Android is everything you know and love about HSN, right on your mobile phone or tablet! Check out the most popular brands that will keep you fabulous from head to toe and everywhere in between.
 
** HSN Shop App is available on Google Play (US only) Supporting Android OS 5.0 and above

Key Features:
 
Watch HSN Live: Never miss a show, while you’re on the go!  Watch the live show and shop the items on air. Use the Program Guide to check out upcoming shows featuring your fave brands.
 
Shop The Show- Ever looked at an HSN show and said “I want everything that I see?”-well now you can Shop The Show! Like what a host is wearing? Put the item in your cart and now you’re the star.
 
Direct Call to Customer Service- Call our Customer Service line and speak to a representative
 
FlexPay Manager- Ever wanted to keep track of your ongoing FlexPays all at once? Our FlexPay Manager allows you to see all payments at the same time right from the palm of your hand.
 
Do you have any comments or an idea to make our app sexy?
 
Send feedback to:HSNShopApp_Feedback@hsn.net- We want to hear from you!

comments: I HATE having to sign in every single time I want to view my orders. And they dont do fingerprint or other sign in either, so it's especially frustrating. The app is generally clunky and not very user-friendly. All the same goes for the desktop website too, but that's not the focus of this post. Apps should be simpler to use, this one is not.
I Love this app some times I just log on to window shop, great deals and great host, in every department the host is so great.I haven't had any problems with this app.
It takes way too long to find important things such as LOG OUT.. it should be a simple drop down from either my acct or the drop down on far right.. I don't like this app.
Love it!!! I can view live broadcast from the t.v. right on my app. I'm able to create a wish list, place my order, manage my pay plans
This app is nothing more than a marketing engine. Daily product promotions are very annoying. My best option was to uninstall this App.

title: Hobby Lobby Stores
description:
Download the new Hobby Lobby app to get the latest coupon, browse the weekly ad, locate stores near you, check your gift card balance and much more.  Hobby Lobby is now at your fingertips!  

Hobby Lobby offers over 75,000 products from crafts, wearable art, home accents, frames, jewelry, hobbies, papercrafting, custom framing, fabric, art supplies, party supplies, seasonal, floral and furniture! Hobby Lobby is the place to shop with Super Savings, Super Selection!™ 

Coupon

Easily access a new Hobby Lobby coupon every week!  Use it in-store or online.

Weekly Ad

Hobby Lobby offers customers exceptional selection and value every week.  Tap to view our weekly ad, and you are sure to find what you need.

Store Locator

Find the closest Hobby Lobby!  Each store provides an enjoyable and enriched shopping experience providing exceptional value with the widest variety of products, from home décor to craft supplies, all under one roof.


Feedback

Tell us how much you love the Hobby Lobby app.  Share the app with your family and friends!

comments: You finally fixed it, wonderful!! Thank you!

I am so hurt to have to give this app one star. Especially when Hobby Lobby is one of my favorite stores. But this is truly a lousy app. There's nowhere on the initial screen to do a search. And when you click on one of the two available categories, the keyboard doesn't work. I wasn't able to find any of the products I usually purchase. Uninstalling.

Other than the Search feature being non-user friendly, I really haven't had a problem with this app until two days ago. It will not let the internal keyboard pop up. I have always been able to click on the search bar, the keyboard pops up, and then I'm able to type in my search. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled it and it still will not let me use the keyboard on this app any longer. I checked other apps and the keyboard pops up immediately.

100% not user friendly. I LOOOOVE Hobby Lobby. But I HAAAAATE this app. I can't use my keyboard to search for anything. None of the icons on the home page of the app match up so when you click one icon to look at something, it gives you something completely different. If I get to an item after taking forever to get to a list of products I'm interested in, I cant click on it because if I do, I can't back out of that and resume looking without being kicked to the home page of the app. DELETING IT!

Clicking on categories pictures from the main home page don't match up,. You click one thing like baking and get yarn or yarn and get gift cards. When I finally get to something and try to add a specific quantity to my cart it doesn't allow me too. I'll add one thinking I can change the number in the cart, but it doesn't let do that either. Super frustrating, an app should make it easier to look or things not make it a maze and impossible to navigate. Maybe a new up date will fix it.

recentChanges: -We squashed some bugs in this update. Thanks, as always, for your feedback!
comments: It's a great app for the most part. The one and only thing that I can't stand about it is that if you put something in your cart, you cannot go back to where you were! (This happens if you click on anything but the description of an item.) Most other retailer's app take you back where you were, why can't this one?! Sorry for the rant, but it is so frustrating to have to search for items again when you should be able to go back to where you were and BE HAPPY with your experience within the app.

Very cumbersome. No easy way to get back to the page you were on after you add an item to the cart. Bait and switch big-time. It told me that I had $39 in points and only let me redeem $17 on a $65 order. No wonder their going out of business! Update..... I placed an order, and part of it was fulfilled by a 3rd party vendor. Those items never arrived, and Sears won't stand behind the order. They keep telling me to contact the vendor (theUniche)and they won't respond to me at all! STAY AWAY!
Always have access to all searches I request. A little slow but usually moves quickly. Have no regrets about this app.

App needs to be more user friendly. The features are there but the functionality on mobile devices is very much below average. Needs to be adjusted as far as the zooming in and out. While doing the aforementioned, the app has a tendency to quickly freeze. Upgrading the software of the app, I believe, would produce better ratings!

My first time using app was an exhausting experience. When I tried to go back in a second time I put in my password for the 1st time and a message came up saying I had exhausted all of my attempts to sign in! Then I had to go thru the process of resetting my password. I'm in it now and the first thing that pops up is a request to rate the app! Ok, I rated it, hopefully I can look at some items and nothing else will happen.

recentChanges:
- Ebates is now Rakuten! We’ve changed our name, logo and app icon, but everything else stays exactly the same:
- Same Services: You can still shop at more than 2,500 stores and get Cash Back rewards.
- Same Account: Your Cash Back and your account details are unchanged and as secure as ever.
- Same Team: Our top-rated Member Services team is still here to help.
comments: I really like this app. You have to stay on top of your cash back though because sometimes it misses it. I always double check after i place an order though so it's not so bad. I am upset they removed Wal-Mart and Amazon from this app because those were the two i used the most. I hope they put them back!

Waste of time. It takes weeks for cash back to be added to your account...if you are credited at all. When you submit an inquiry to see where your cashback dollars are (which is a challenge of its own), you get error messages and can't complete the process. Rakuten, If 0% back on a $500 purchase from Amazon was the special offer, you nailed it. Don't waste your time or data.

Have been using this app for a while (when it was ebates). Love that you get cash back on purchases, however for EVERY Amazon purchase, you have to manually add your purchases.. It's ALWAYS been like this. The missing cash back is quickly added to my account when submitted,, but it's just annoying because I do almost half of my online shopping on Amazon.

Bad for In-Store shopping. This app is more online based, connecting your online shopping accounts and purchases in order to give you cash back. This app also only allows one bank account to be connected, which isn't very flexible for a family. Also, if you want to take pictures of your receipts and your family's receipts, this app is not for you. There is no "receipt picture taking" option since this app is more focused on providing coupons while you shop online; then gives u cash back online.

So far so good, there is a few months in between pay periods but at least you have a chance to build up your funds towards a refund check or PayPal. U receive a small% back from shopping, while using this app before you buy. And i love that you can choose from sooo many different stores to shop at. Thank you rakuten(Ebates) app.

title: Shop Your Way
description:
Shop Your Way® is a free membership program designed to make everyday life less hectic and more rewarding. SAVE TIME with personalized services that fulfill your every need, and SAVE MONEY with access to thousands of brands, national and local partners, and deals that reward you for every purchase. We’re here to help you get more done every day so you can enjoy more of life’s moments. Let us show you!

Download the Shop Your Way app

Features:
* Membership is FREE
*  Get rewarded on every day activities like grocery shopping, dining, pumping gas and more when you sign-up for the Sears Mastercard® with Shop Your Way® 
* Create and share catalogs with your friends
* Tag & share the products you own, want and like
* Connect with Partners like Uber and fuboTV to get member exclusive deals
* Choose from dozens of services that help you get more done, like our Personal Shopper
* Shop hundreds of your favorite brands with our extensive affiliate network and get rewarded
* Enjoy FREE 2-Day Shipping with Shop Your Way MAX® and more
* Elevate your member status to Shop Your Way VIP and earn up to $500 or more in rewards and savings
* Play games & sweepstakes daily to get rewards and great prizes
* Use rewards on MILLIONS of products within our partner network

comments: Any points I win on spins arent added and the game is very glitchy. And what's up with the wheel speeding up when you push stop....if you dont want any wins..shut down the app!
Wonderful. I love it, its absolutely amazing. Keep up the great work an fast speed assistance.

Horrible. They closed all the stores in my area. I have points in my account but no matter what i try to use them on it wont let me. Item qualifys yet when i got to check out gives no option to use my points. Customer service has not been helpful. I have alot of points i cant use. Dont reccomend this program or the credit card. Ive been a card holder for 10yrs! Spent lots of money and cant use the reward. Im canceling my cards
There is way to pay your bill in the app that I could find other wise for shopping it's very good

I'm done with this... I thought linking this to GasBuddy would be a cool way to save some money. I currently have over $40 in points that I am just going to let expire because, everything I try and buy says it is not available for my zip code. Then after all of that messing around I can almost find what I am looking at for the same price as here. The search is almost impossible to find anything.
